snippet.title: Celebrities Who Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard With PROOF
snippet.description:
Celebrities Who Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard With PROOF
The court case between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard is raging on strongly, and it's anyone's guess how this is going to end. Not just because of how the case has gotten so messy, but because many people are standing up for Johnny Depp...and blasting Amber Heard at the same time. Throughout the trial/trials, Amber Heard has claimed that Johnny Depp has been abusive to her, but a lot of other people have stood up and said that Johnny "isn't the type" to do that, and some of the voices saying this have been pretty surprising. Allow us to break it down for you. Be sure to like the video and subscribe to the channel!

Click HERE To Enter The GIVEAWAY! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbiT0LUIbQj6CQScvWHJeKQ?sub_confirmation=1

And there you have it, everyone! A look at the situation with Johnny Depp and Amber Heard and how certain people have called her out over the years of the trial to say that her "views" on Johnny Depp are clearly flawed. Which of these celebs do you put the most credit in when it comes to defending Johnny Depp? Do you think that if more people stand up for him things will finally be swayed his way? snippet.title: Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Controversy Coming To An End
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Controversy Coming To An End
‚úÖ Subscribe to us ‚Üí https://www.youtube.com/c/FilmRoyalty?sub_confirmation=1
üîî Turn on notifications to never miss a new upload!
‚úÖ  Follow us on Instagram ‚Üí https://www.instagram.com/filmroyalty

About:
Four years later the couple were back in court, but this time in London. However, this was not Amber Heard's case - she had not chosen to be here. This was a libel action Depp had brought against a British newspaper, The Sun. At the heart of the case was his assertion that the allegations of physical abuse were an "elaborate hoax". Depp employed one of the best-known libel barristers in the country to try to prove the claims were untrue.
Over the next three weeks, Heard arrived at court each day and walked past her former husband's fans, who were convinced that it was their hero who was the victim and it was she who had assaulted him. In court her story, photos, memories and the accounts of her friends were all exposed to the world and said by Depp's team and supporters to be part of a plot to falsely prove that he was, as The Sun had claimed in April 2018, a "wife beater".

It was not just the fans and media who were watching carefully. Lawyers were already wondering, if he won, what impact this would have on women coming forward with claims of domestic violence. Outside, Johnny Depp would arrive each day to cheers. But his behaviour and lifestyle were also under the microscope - and a judge has now ruled that The Sun's allegations were "substantially true".

snippet.title: La Doble Vida De Amber Heard Completamente Revelada
snippet.description:
Amber Heard tiene una impresionante carrera en el cine, pero es probable que tambi√©n conozcas por su vida personal, que muchas veces fue el centro de atenci√≥n de los medios. Estas son algunas cosas que tal vez no sab√≠as sobre la vida de Amber Heard.

Heard y su ahora ex-esposo Johnny Depp se conocieron en el 2012 en el set de Diario de un Seductor y se casaron en el 2015. En mayo del 2016, Heard solicit√≥ el divorcio y lo acus√≥ de abuso dom√©stico. Heard escribi√≥ en la declaraci√≥n,

"Durante toda nuestra relaci√≥n, Johnny fue verbal y f√≠sicamente abusivo conmigo. Soport√© un excesivo abuso emocional, verbal y f√≠sico de Johnny, que ha incluido ataques furiosos, hostiles, humillantes y amenazantes hacia m√≠ cada vez que yo cuestionaba su autoridad o no estaba de acuerdo con √©l."

Heard tambi√©n present√≥ una foto en donde aparece con la cara lastimada. Afirm√≥ que la herida fue causada por un golpe de Depp con su tel√©fono. Ella le dijo al tribunal,

"Vivo con el temor de que Johnny vuelva a [nuestra casa] sin avisar para aterrorizarme, f√≠sica y emocionalmente."

Pero la polic√≠a no encontr√≥ pruebas de ninguna agresi√≥n cuando respondi√≥ a una llamada por pelea dom√©stica en la casa de la pareja en mayo del 2016, y Heard se neg√≥ a presentar una denuncia penal. El abogado de Depp le dijo a la corte,

"[Heard] est√° intentando asegurar una resoluci√≥n financiera prematura alegando abuso. Johnny no puede protegerse a s√≠ mismo ni a Amber del escrutinio de los medios."

Mientras que Heard acus√≥ a Depp de violencia dom√©stica, ella fue arrestada por presunta violencia dom√©stica contra su ex pareja, la fot√≥grafa Tasya van Ree, en septiembre del 2009. Seg√∫n TMZ, Heard y van Ree discutieron en un aeropuerto, y Heard presuntamente golpe√≥ a van Ree. Fue arrestada y fichada por un delito menor de violencia dom√©stica, pero el fiscal se neg√≥ a seguir adelante con el caso, porque ambas mujeres viv√≠an en California.

A√±os despu√©s, van Ree dijo p√∫blicamente que el incidente fue "sobresensacionalizado," y describi√≥ a los oficiales que hicieron el arresto como "homof√≥bicos" - pero en realidad la oficial es una mujer gay, y escribi√≥ en Facebook,

"¬°No soy homof√≥bica en lo absoluto! [...] El arresto se hizo porque hubo una agresi√≥n (yo lo presenci√©) y las partes involucradas estaban en una relaci√≥n dom√©stica."

Van Ree tambi√©n emiti√≥ una declaraci√≥n cuando los informes del arresto resurgieron en el 2016, diciendo,

"Es desgarrador que la integridad y la historia de Amber sean cuestionadas una vez m√°s. Amber es una mujer brillante, honesta y hermosa y tengo el mayor respeto por ella. Compartimos 5 maravillosos a√±os juntas y mantenemos contacto hasta el d√≠a de hoy."

#AmberHeard

snippet.title: Amber Heard Body Language ‚Äî Expert Analysis of Her Depp Deposition
snippet.description:
What does Amber Heard's body language in her key witness deposition tell us? Four of the world's top body language and behavior experts weigh in on Amber Heard in Johnny Depp's Libel Case to analyze and reveal the truth.

Get A Behavior Panel Mug: https://teespring.com/stores/the-behavior-panel

The Behavior Panel:
Scott Rouse: http://BodyLanguageTactics.com
Mark Bowden: http://TruthAndLies.ca
Chase Hughes: http://ChaseHughes.com 
Greg Hartley: http://BodyLanguageTactics.com

Amber Laura Heard is an American actress. Born and raised in Texas, she made her film debut in a minor supporting role in the sports drama Friday Night Lights, followed by a series of other small roles in television and film. Heard was married to her Rum Diary co-star Johnny Depp in 2015‚Äì2017. Their divorce drew significant media attention. In 2019, he sued her for defamation. Depp also sued the publishers of The Sun in a related libel suit, with Heard as a key witness for the defendants. In November 2020, the High Court of Justice of England ruled that Depp has lost his case and that the majority of Heard's allegations had been proven to a civil standard which Depp intends to appeal.

The Behavior Panel is a group made up of the world's top body language and behavior experts, Mark Bowden, Scott Rouse, Greg Hartley, and Chase Hughes. Together they analyze the body language and behavior displayed in videos in the public interest. The Behavior Panel is a non-partisan group, looking to educate and entertain the public with their interest and expertise in nonverbal communication, body language, deception detection, interrogation, and resistance to interrogation.

By looking at the gestures, facial expressions, micro-expressions, and context around what people say, this group of nonverbal behavior experts reveals the possible truth and deceptions.

This behavior profiler group, takes on the task of investigating the behavior behind the news that often force us to think and feel the way we do. The Behavior Panel is a task force made up of four of the best body language and behavior profiler experts in the world.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp begs Amber Heard to cut him in disturbing audio recording | Page Six Celebrity News
snippet.description:
In a chilling audio recording played in a UK court Friday, Johnny Depp repeatedly begged then-wife Amber Heard to cut him as he held a knife, according to reports.

‚ÄúYou wanna cut me?‚Äù the ‚ÄúPirates of the Caribean‚Äù star, 57, asked Heard in July 2016. ‚ÄúCut me wherever you want. You wanna cut me somewhere. On the arm, chest? Where you wanna start? Cut me!‚Äù

Audio of the disturbing exchange was played in London‚Äôs High Court at Depp‚Äôs explosive libel trial against The Sun newspaper ‚Äî which he says falsely branded him a ‚Äúwife beater‚Äù in a 2018 article based on Heard‚Äôs allegations.

#JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard

snippet.title: Analysing Amber Heard's Abuse Of Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
In this video I look closely at what is said between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard in a recorded conversation and compare it to the version of events she gave in court in 2016.  Amber Heard can be heard at times, agreeing with Johnny Depp's version of events, and at other times does not show any signs she sees the situation differently. From the tone of their voices we can get a sense of whether she might feel pressured to agree with him or whether she genuinely does and we can gain an understanding, from what they both say, of what happened between them that day. Amber Heard gives us insight into why she physically abused Johnny Depp and we get a sense of Amber's inability to control her emotions and the excuses she gives.

Later I look at what she said in court about the same event. Why does she claim that everything happened in the opposite way?  How does she try to encourage us to feel contempt towards Johnny Depp and to not take him seriously? And what does she say when questioned about the assaults on Johnny she previously admitted to?

I have done extensive research on narcissism and the effects of narcissistic abuse. I work as a coach specifically with people who have experienced an abusive relationship. Let me know in the comments section below what video you would like me to make about an aspect of narcissism that interests you and please subscribe to my channel!
contact@liveabusefree.com

snippet.title: Johnny Depp fans demand Amber Heard is sacked from Aquaman - producer responds ( Magazine News )
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp fans demand Amber Heard is sacked from Aquaman - producer responds ( Magazine News )

JOHNNY DEPP fans will not be successful in trying to "pressure" Aquaman 2 bosses into sacking the star's ex-wife, Amber Heard.

After Johnny Depp and Amber Heard clashed in a public court case over claims the Pirates of the Caribbean star was a "wife-beater", a petition was started. The online appeal was made by Depp's fans who called for Heard to be sacked from the upcoming DC Comics movie, Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom. The petition, titled "Remove Amber Heard from Aquaman 2", has ‚Äãgained ‚Äãmore than 1.85 million signatures at the time of writing.

In response to this petition Heard said last year: "Paid rumours and paid campaigns on social media don‚Äôt dictate [casting decisions] because they have no basis in reality.

"Only the fans actually made Aquaman and Aquaman 2 happen. I‚Äôm excited to get started next year." (Via Entertainment Weekly)

Now, the producer of Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom has responded to the popular petition.

Peter Safran ‚Äãsaid: "I don‚Äôt think we‚Äôre ever going to react to, honestly, pure fan pressure." (Via Deadline)

Safran went on: "You gotta do what‚Äôs best for the movie.

"We felt that if it‚Äôs James Wan and Jason Momoa, it should be Amber Heard. That‚Äôs really what it was."

Addressing the ongoing campaign against Heard led by Depp fans, the Hollywood executive added: "One is not unaware of what is going on in the Twitter-verse.

"But that doesn‚Äôt mean you have to react to it or take it as gospel or accede to their wishes."

Safran repeated: "You have to do what‚Äôs right for the film, and that‚Äôs really where we landed on it."

Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom is currently due out late next year, but it has already been granted a stunning cast of actors.

Not only are Momoa and Heard reprising their roles of Arthur Curry and Mera respectively, they will ‚Äãalso ‚Äãbe joined by a legendary Star Wars villain ‚Äãactor ‚Äãonce again.

Boba Fett star Temuera Morrison will be reprising his role as Arthur's father, Thomas Curry.

Earlier this year Morrison exclusively gave‚Äã Express.co.uk‚Äã the first details about his Aquaman return‚Äã.‚Äã

He revealed: "I'm coming out [to shoot] in September. I think they want to do another one... I think they start earlier."

When pressed about his storyline, Temuera would only say: "I'm not in it that long!"

The Mandalorian actor also recalled some fond memories of working on the first Aquaman movie.

Temuera said: "Yes, they gave me a wig and made me look younger! James Wan was there.

"I think I got the part because Jason [Momoa] loved [1994 film] Once Were Warriors [which Temuera starred in].

"Jason was a big mover because he wanted me to play his dad and the studio got talking and I met the casting agent... and yeah next minute I'm there."

snippet.title: 8 Times Johnny Depp Tried To WARN Us About Amber Heard!!
snippet.description:
8 Times Johnny Depp Tried To WARN Us About Amber Heard...

Subscribe to The Spotlight üëâ  https://bit.ly/3txAgy1

WATCH NEXT: ‚ñ∂Ô∏è

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YVPyBraRags

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6ag6P31kbo&t=37s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wAdTlgSW2ls&t=185s


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


RELATED VIDEOS:üëá

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GShctSD8HNg&t=117s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J1UXydaYri4&t=39s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yz-ovTEanw4

#8: The Divorce In 2016
The reasons she provided for her taking this decision involved her accusing Depp of being an abuser, which was in fact quite shocking to his fans as well as the people who worked with Depp, as this side of Johnny was never witnessed by them.  Initially, everyone was siding with Amber, but eventually, the truth about Heards violent nature came out. At the time of the divorce between the two celebs, Depp was hushed and his word meant nothing as opposed to Ambers. When Amber provided the court with such reasons, Depp denied these accusations and even stated that all this was being done by Amber in her best interests, and not his. 

#7: The Lawsuit In 2019
The messes the two of them were drowning in were further worsened by the onset of a lawsuit. And no, this time it wasn‚Äôt filed by Amber, but in fact against her! Amber Heard expressed her feelings about Johnny Depp, using explicit content in an article published by the Washington Post, injuring Depp‚Äôs reputation, which led to the beginning of the 50 million dollar suit against Amber Heard. 

#6: Leaks Of Audio 2015
The audio leaks seemed to be the turning point for Depp‚Äôs ill fate as this was one of the most solid forms of proof that helped enable him to be proved as the innocent in the messy trial.What did the leaked audio messages contain? The conversations between the two were as toxic as their marriage. It involved a lot of content that went along the lines of them being involved in domestic violence, her being the main abuser. 

#5: Severed Fingertip
If Amber truly was the one to have faced being physically harmed why was Depp‚Äôs finger left severed? According to various sources, including Johnny Depp himself, Amber Heard injured Depp‚Äôs finger due to a heated argument that broke out between the two of them, resulting in him having to rush to the emergency room to get it fixed. In an interview, she claims he was the one who would constantly hurl things at her, when in fact later on it was proved it was just quite the opposite that was happening behind closed doors. 

#4: Depp's Bruised Face 2020 & Amber's Fake Bruises
To what extent this woman went to prove her innocence is quite disgusting we must say. At one point, Amber had exposed her scarring and bruising on social media to damage Depp. On investigating further into Amber‚Äôs bruises, they seemed to be fake as the next day she made an appearance with no trace of even a single scratch on her. 

#3: Premiere of Alice Through The Looking Glass
Depp did a fabulous job in the movie Alice Through The Looking Glass. His fans were quite enlightened with his presence on the day of its premiere, but the same cannot be said about Johnny Depp! Unfortunately, we all assumed his speech to include his dark humor which he constantly brings out from time to time but indeed many believe it to be a cry for help. He mentioned being in pain, being tired, and wanting to go home.


#2: Career 2016 Onwards
It is quite a well-known fact that once someone is surrounded by constant negativity, this not only takes a toll on their mental health but also starts affecting their professional life too. Depp met Amber on the sets of The Rum Diary, and both were happily married then. Depp fell into Amber‚Äôs trap, both ending their marriages and marrying each other a few years later. Depp was quite a huge hit in Hollywood. Everyone wanted to hire him. The array of films he was getting by the year was massive and all he was doing at every award function was hoarding awards. It is quite evident that following 2016, things for him took a turn downhill professionally. 

#1: Mother
Depp‚Äôs mother was quite well known for her difficult nature. Apparently, it was said Johnny was the only person who could tolerate her cruel nature. It was till her very end that he stood by her side and tended to all of her needs. If Depp could respect such a woman till her last breath, why would he ever harm someone who he claimed to have loved? There is no answer to that question by anyone but stands as a self-explanatory form of evidence to prove Depp was not the kind of man to hurt any woman, especially Amber. #8: The Divorce In 2016
The reasons she provided for her taking this decision involved her accusing Depp of being an abuser, which was in fact quite shocking to his fans as well as the people who worked with Depp, as this side of Johnny was never witnessed by them.  Initially, everyone was siding with Amber, but eventually, the truth about Heards violent nature came out. At the time of the divorce between the two celebs, Depp was hushed and his word meant nothing as opposed to Ambers. When Amber provided the court with such reasons, Depp denied these accusations and even stated that all this was being done by Amber in her best interests, and not his. 

#7: The Lawsuit In 2019
The messes the two of them were drowning in were further worsened by the onset of a lawsuit. And no, this time it wasn‚Äôt filed by Amber, but in fact against her! Amber Heard expressed her feelings about Johnny Depp, using explicit content in an article published by the Washington Post, injuring Depp‚Äôs reputation, which led to the beginning of the 50 million dollar suit against Amber Heard. 

#6: Leaks Of Audio 2015
The audio leaks seemed to be the turning point for Depp‚Äôs ill fate as this was one of the most solid forms of proof that helped enable him to be proved as the innocent in the messy trial.What did the leaked audio messages contain? The conversations between the two were as toxic as their marriage. It involved a lot of content that went along the lines of them being involved in domestic violence, her being the main abuser. 

#5: Severed Fingertip
If Amber truly was the one to have faced being physically harmed why was Depp‚Äôs finger left severed? According to various sources, including Johnny Depp himself, Amber Heard injured Depp‚Äôs finger due to a heated argument that broke out between the two of them, resulting in him having to rush to the emergency room to get it fixed. In an interview, she claims he was the one who would constantly hurl things at her, when in fact later on it was proved it was just quite the opposite that was happening behind closed doors. 

#4: Depp's Bruised Face 2020 & Amber's Fake Bruises
To what extent this woman went to prove her innocence is quite disgusting we must say. At one point, Amber had exposed her scarring and bruising on social media to damage Depp. On investigating further into Amber‚Äôs bruises, they seemed to be fake as the next day she made an appearance with no trace of even a single scratch on her. 

#3: Premiere of Alice Through The Looking Glass
Depp did a fabulous job in the movie Alice Through The Looking Glass. His fans were quite enlightened with his presence on the day of its premiere, but the same cannot be said about Johnny Depp! Unfortunately, we all assumed his speech to include his dark humor which he constantly brings out from time to time but indeed many believe it to be a cry for help. He mentioned being in pain, being tired, and wanting to go home.


#2: Career 2016 Onwards
It is quite a well-known fact that once someone is surrounded by constant negativity, this not only takes a toll on their mental health but also starts affecting their professional life too. Depp met Amber on the sets of The Rum Diary, and both were happily married then. Depp fell into Amber‚Äôs trap, both ending their marriages and marrying each other a few years later. Depp was quite a huge hit in Hollywood. Everyone wanted to hire him. The array of films he was getting by the year was massive and all he was doing at every award function was hoarding awards. It is quite evident that following 2016, things for him took a turn downhill professionally. 

#1: Mother
Depp‚Äôs mother was quite well known for her difficult nature. Apparently, it was said Johnny was the only person who could tolerate her cruel nature. It was till her very end that he stood by her side and tended to all of her needs. If Depp could respect such a woman till her last breath, why would he ever harm someone who he claimed to have loved? There is no answer to that question by anyone but stands as a self-explanatory form of evidence to prove Depp was not the kind of man to hurt any woman, especially Amber. Does body language and the evidence prove Amber Heard is actually the worst actor in the entire world, trying to lie about Johnny Depp? Find out next.

Amber Heard is the now 34 year old Hollywood actress who played in The Rum Diary, The Ward, and how could any of us forget her smash hit I Do..Until I Don‚Äôt, and as you all know, the now 57 year old Johnny Depp is a pirate.

Amber and Johnny got married on February 3, 2015, Amber filed for divorce on May 23, 2016, and the divorce was finalized on January 13, 2017. However, both Johnny and Amber claimed spousal abuse during the divorce hearings and Depp is now suing gossip magazines for libel, slander, and defamation for perpetuating the story, which greatly negatively impact his acting career.  So we‚Äôre going to break down Amber Heard‚Äôs body language during her intense deposition, along with their recorded conversations, to find out whether these accusations against Johnny Depp appear to be true or false.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp's Alleged Disturbing Texts About Amber Heard Read In Court
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp made a surprise appearance at a London court this week. He's there for a libel suit against British tabloid The Sun, which ran a report that the actor was abusive to his ex-wife Amber Heard, who he divorced back in 2017 after an 18-month marriage. Today, disturbing texts allegedly sent by Depp were read aloud. Trial attorney Misty Marris shares her take with Access Hollywood on how damaging they could be for his case. Depp's attorney has not yet commented on the alleged texts, and Depp has denied all abuse allegations.

snippet.description:

The Johnny Depp and Amber Heard court drama made a major plot twist when Johnny Depp filed a defamation lawsuit against his ex-wife. He not only claimed that she lied in court, but also that she was wronged toward him. However, the actors will need to wait even longer to get an official court ruling. If the court rules in Johnny Depp‚Äôs favor, Amber Heard could be facing serious consequences.

The possibility of Amber Heard going to jail already has fans asking who would replace her in Aquaman 2. And even if she doesn‚Äôt get sentenced to jail time, based on the information that Johnny Depp has already released to the public, many fans have petitioned for Amber Heard to be replaced in Aquaman 2 regardless. This week, American entertainer Johnny Depp lost a defamation suit he filed in London, suing the paper The Sun for considering him a "wife-beater" in one of their articles, a reference to his relationship with ex Amber Heard. The case was terrible, hauling the two entertainers' private lives into the spotlight. It was muddled, as well; each blamed the other for misuse. 
On the Internet, it appears to be that Johnny Depp has many individuals close by. Twitter, Reddit, and different stages are being overwhelmed with images, supporting the entertainer. There are, be that as it may, the individuals who can't help contradicting them. 

On Friday, Heard, 30, was allowed a transitory limiting request against her significant other of 15 months, asserting in court archives that the 52-year-old entertainer genuinely manhandled her all through their four-year relationship. Heard additionally asserted that Depp hit her with a cell and pulled her hair last Saturday night ‚Äì presenting a new photograph of herself with what seems, by all accounts, to be a wound on her correct eye as proof. A LAPD representative revealed to PEOPLE that officials reacted to the scene however verified that "there was no proof of any wrongdoing." 

In court records reacting to Heard's cases, Depp's lawyer Laura Wasser affirmed that Heard "is endeavoring to get an untimely monetary goal by claiming misuse." As news broke of the claims, many stood up against the case, saying something regarding either side of the contention. Here's who falls where. Depp's ex Vanessa Paradis allegedly went to his safeguard, as indicated by a note acquired by TMZ. 

"In every one of these years I have known Johnny he has never been genuinely harmful to me and this looks not at all like the man I lived with for 14 awesome years," Paradis purportedly composed. 
Individuals couldn't affirm if the letter got by TMZ was really composed by Paradis. Her representative didn't quickly react to a solicitation for input. 

Vanessa's youngest sister Alysson, shared a highly contrasting legacy photograph of herself with Johnny on Sunday. "You are and will consistently be family to me. You are one of the most clever and most adoring individuals I know," she wrote in the subtitle. Depp's 22-year-old little girl Lily-Rose posted a vintage Instagram pic of her and her dad on Sunday, subtitling the photograph with a message of help. 

"My father is the best, most cherishing individual I know," the model and entertainer wrote. "He wasn't anything, nevertheless a superb dad to my younger sibling and I, and every individual who realizes him would say something very similar."

Wasser additionally affirms that Heard exploited Depp at a passionate time his mom having kicked the bucket three days before Heard petitioned for legal separation on Monday. Strolling Dead star Laurie Holden defended Depp on Twitter, in an "enthusiastic response to the attack of an individual via online media and the public objection for complete and utter rumination." "I most definitely will see Johnny Depp's new film," the 46-year-old entertainer tweeted about Alice Through the Looking Glass. "His own life is only that. Individuals. Nobody knows th
e genuine truth so zip it." 
Afterward, Holden explained her remarks, saying that she upholds survivors of homegrown maltreatment and that their claims ought to be secured under full response of the law. "My sole expectation has been basically to support those that are making killing quick judgment calls to stop," she said. 

After co-featuring with Depp in three movies ‚Äì Transcendence, The Tourist and Mortdecai ‚Äì Paul Bettany sent messages of help to Depp on Twitter.

Shiloh Nouvel Jolie-Pitt, the first biological child of Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt, recently stepped out looking much different from her usual tomboy self.

snippet.title: Justice For Johnny Depp - Amber Heard Audio Leak Reveals Truth
snippet.description:
A recorded conversation/argument between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard just got leaked. This was recorded just months before they filed for divorce in May 2016, as a therapy exercise, with both parties aware of the recording.

i play some important clips that the Daily Mail provided, but I encourage you to listen to/watch the entire video: https://youtu.be/aca0KWoHtqQ.  It seems to truly confirms who the real abuser was in this relationship, prompting an international trending topic #JusticeForJohnnyDepp

Since many media outlets aren't covering it., I felt it was important to get the word out. Please share this to ensure all sides are heard. 

What are you thoughts on this topic? Do you believe Johnny Depp was unfairly defamed by Amber Heard? Or do you still believe Amber?

snippet.localized.description:
A recorded conversation/argument between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard just got leaked. This was recorded just months before they filed for divorce in May 2016, as a therapy exercise, with both parties aware of the recording.

i play some important clips that the Daily Mail provided, but I encourage you to listen to/watch the entire video: https://youtu.be/aca0KWoHtqQ.  It seems to truly confirms who the real abuser was in this relationship, prompting an international trending topic #JusticeForJohnnyDepp

Since many media outlets aren't covering it., I felt it was important to get the word out. Please share this to ensure all sides are heard. 

What are you thoughts on this topic? Do you believe Johnny Depp was unfairly defamed by Amber Heard? Or do you still believe Amber?

----

Make sure to JOIN us LIVE! Tuesdays & Thursdays at 9PM EST / 6PM PST for Nerd Wars! You can watch older episodes here:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLuJs__-kSXPWPooZgknF2Y04bj9OupgxV

snippet.title: Johnny Depp‚Äôs lawyers say video shows Amber Heard ‚Äòattacked‚Äô sister
snippet.description:
Previously unseen reality TV footage of Amber Heard's sister after she was allegedly attacked by the actress has been shown to the High Court.

Johnny Depp‚Äôs lawyers said the video contradicts evidence given by Whitney Henriquez that Ms Heard had never been violent towards her. 

Ms Henriquez denied giving false evidence and said the fight referred to in the video was just verbal.

The case, the biggest English libel trial of the 21st century, is due to finish next week with closing submissions from both sides' legal teams on Monday and Tuesday, and a ruling expected at a later date.

snippet.title: Elon Musk CONFESSES That He's The Father of Amber Heard's Child?!
snippet.description:
Surprise surprise! Amber Heard just announced in her recent personal instagram post that she is now a mother! Well, it is inexplicably hard to believe, especially for a woman who has been the subject of many rumors and negative spotlight lately. Now she just announced that she is a mother? Just when you thought this Johnny and Amber situation cannot get any crazier, Amber gives you a pretty hard to beat plot twist! But who is the father of Amber Heard‚Äôs baby? How did she get away with having this child without the paparazzi finding out? Did this affect her Aquaman training? And most importantly, how on earth did this happen? A lot of rumors and sources are saying that Elon Musk might be the father of this baby. Well, the timeline between the mega businessman and the Aquaman star is a little messy, especially because this happened in the midst of the Johnny Depp and Amber Heard divorce process, but who knows if they might have rekindled their romance during this time period? Amber Heard had dated a series of men (and a woman) in these years after her split with Johnny Depp, but during all this time, no one really knows who the father of her newborn is. So is Elon Musk really the father of her daughter? Let‚Äôs find out in this video! But before everything else, make sure first to hit that subscribe button and notification bell for more updates. Now, let‚Äôs dive in!

First, let‚Äôs have a little recap. Amber and Johnny met in 2011, when they filmed their movie together, The Rum Diary. The former couple got married in a private ceremony, and lived their romantic marriage for over a year before everything came crashing down. In 2016, Amber decided to split with Johnny and made him out to be all sorts of bad things. This shocked a lot of people, especially fans at that time, and people were not easy to side with Johnny. This is a case that people are really sensitive about, especially with all the details involved. However, when some evidence surfaced that proved Amber wasn‚Äôt telling the truth, fans easily lost their sympathy for Amber Heard and sided with Johnny instead. This evidence included Amber having affairs with actor James Franco and multi-billionaire Elon Musk. The evidence also showed Amber admitting that she was really the one who hurt Johnny Depp, and that she never really donated her divorce settlement money to charity. But the real chaos started when first, news publisher The Sun called Johnny Depp a very bad name that affected him deeply. Johnny Depp was not just offended by this, he was furious, and so he filed a case against the news company. However, unfortunately for his team, he lost this suit in court. But this messy predicament did not end at that. After he lost this libel case, he was relieved of his recurring role as Grindelwald in the blockbuster film trilogy Fantastic Beasts. In its third installment, Johnny was banned from reprising his role. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The case between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp is one that people all over the world are becoming familiar with. Amber Heard is presenting herself to be in a bad situation that might be pretty hard to come back from. Someone also involved in this case is the Tesla billionaire, Elon Musk. Allow me to explain why Elon Musk is now a person of interest in this whole drama.

According to the Times-News source, Johnny Depp has appeared to have dragged Elon Musk into the Amber Heard saga. Just a couple of days ago it was stated that the Tesla billionaire is being brought back into Depp‚Äôs 50 million dollar libel action against his ex-wife, Amber. What some of you might not know is why. Well, Depp who had accused Elon of having an affair with Amber during their short-lasting marriage is bringing him back into the case again. However, Johnny Depp is bringing Elon into the mix for a different reason. Depp wants Elon to be interviewed and in this interview, Depp would like him to come forward and hand over the details of all the contact he has had with Amber Heard. The 57-year-old actor is suing her for 50 million dollars in Virginia over a 2019 op-ed article she wrote for the Washington Post. In the article, Amber described herself as a victim. Most of you might be aware of this, but the news about Elon being brought into the case really changes the game as there could be some new information that Elon could bring forward in order to either help Depp‚Äôs case against Amber Heard or the other way around. Johnny Depp has obtained a court order requiring Elon Musk, the 49-year-old CEO to give his testimony. This is where he will be questioned on the details about his relationship with Amber Heard. The reason for him being called forward is not to talk about their relationship or whatever they shared together, but Musk is being asked to come forward and bring forward any knowledge he has of her allegations against her ex-husband, Johnny Depp. This means that if he is aware of what the truth is in this case. Musk may be the one who holds some useful information that can make or break the case for either of the two. Depp is hoping that he comes forward and discusses the truth of what happened and not the lies that are being constantly spread. Elon is known for several different things, one of which is that he is the CEO of SpaceX, and the other being that he is the CEO of Tesla. Musk, who was estimated last month to be the world‚Äôs richest person with a worth of more than 185 billion dollars, is being required to provide details of phone calls, emails, letters, and text messages exchanged with Amber Heard during various periods in March 2015. Now, you may be thinking that this is invading Elon‚Äôs privacy but there are legitimate reasons behind it. Back when things were not so good between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, it was stated that she was going to get a restraining order against Depp. When Amber decided to do this, the one she made sure to let know was Elon Musk. As she went on to tell him about the issue, he offered to pay and provide her with 24-hour security. He also shared that he liked Amber Heard, according to what the high court had to hear. Laws said that Musk offers to arrange 24/7 security for you, adding the offer would stand even if you never wanted to see me again. Anyway, sorry for being an idiot. The radio silence hurts a lot. It only matters because I really like you, said Elon. He has also been asked to hand over any documents relating to her 7 million dollar divorce settlement which she claimed to have donated to the American civil liberties union and the children‚Äôs hospital Los Angeles. The money that she in fact came forward to state that she had yet to give her settlement money over as it was promised back when she split with Depp.In other news, back when Johnny Depp unsuccessfully sued The Sun over an article describing him in a not-so-kind manner and questioning why J.K Rowling let him appear in the fantastic beasts‚Äô film because of the allegations Amber Heard stated about Depp.The high court was told that Elon Musk became a regular late-night visitor to Amber Heard monthly.

snippet.title: Charity to reveal if Amber Heard donated $7M Johnny Depp divorce settlement
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp has snagged a victory in his court battle against ex-wife, Amber Heard, that will force a charity to reveal whether the actress lived up to her promises and donated her $7 million divorce settlement. 
The ‚ÄúPirates of Caribbean‚Äù star, 58, was granted a partial petition by a judge in New York that ordered the American Civil Liberties Union to release documents to confirm whether Heard, 35, donated the payout from their 2017 divorce, USA Today reported. 
‚ÄúMr. Depp is most gratified by the Court‚Äôs decision,‚Äù Depp‚Äôs attorney Benjamin Chew the outlet in a statement. 
His lawyers have alleged that Heard was lying about donating the entirety of her divorce settlement to the ACLU and to Children‚Äôs Hospital Los Angeles ‚Äî and may have cost him his libel case against a British newspaper in November 2020. 
His attorney, Andrew Caldecott, argued that Heard‚Äôs pledge to charity was a ‚Äúcalculated and manipulative lie‚Äù that ‚Äútipped the scales against Mr. Depp from the very beginning.‚Äù
snippet.tags: ['Filed underamber heard', 'celebrity divorces', 'celebrity lawsuits', 'johnny depp', '8/1/21']

snippet.title: Judge ENDS Amber Heard - Johnny Depp Amber Heard Lawsuit UPDATE
snippet.description:
After a whirlwind of romance since their first movie together, many fans thought that the marriage between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard would be lovely, unproblematic, and just full of sweetness and happiness --just like any other normal couple. But as it turned out, it was actually the opposite. Just a year after their private wedding ceremony, problems started spiraling in, and now, their divorce and lawsuits are even more excruciating and longer than the marriage itself. But how exactly did this happen? Well, let‚Äôs first go back to where the Johnny Depp - Amber Heard story started in the first place. 

Johnny and Amber first ignited a spark between them when they starred together in the 2011 comedy-drama film, The Rum Diary. Johnny portrayed a journalist who was immediately smitten with Amber‚Äôs character. However, this love story between the two quickly travelled from screen to real life. Amber Heard even told Vogue quickly after the release of the film that, ‚ÄúWorking with Johnny was amazing. It was better than I ever imagined, which is really saying something.‚Äù Technically, hearing these words from the actress already hinted that the two really hit it off easily during their film taping, and even though the two of them did not quickly jump into a relationship right after the film shooting, the same year that the film was released, the relationships they both were in at the time fell apart, and that suggested quite a rare coincidence. Depp was with his then-partner Vanessa Paradis whom he lived with for 14 years and whom he had two kids with, while Heard was with her then-girlfriend Tasya van Ree. After the film, and the rumors circulating about Johnny and Amber‚Äôs involvement with each other, Johnny and Vanessa‚Äôs relationship ended, while Amber ended things too with Tasya van Ree. Then, in 2012, the two officially started dating. The couple showed everyone that they were deeply in love with each other. But now, their relationship has turned out to be one of the messiest in history, considering their year-long marriage. 

In 2014, after a couple of years dating each other, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard announced their engagement. Amber was spotted wearing an engagement ring, which quickly sparked rumors about an upcoming wedding between the couple. This rumored engagement did not stay secret long enough, as Johnny himself confirmed this in an interview after discussing wedding planning and pointing out that he was wearing "a chick's ring" on his finger. In 2015, after several years of dating, Johnny married Amber in a private ceremony in their home in LA. Johnny Depp is no amateur star, and neither is Amber Heard. So this wedding did not stay secret for too long. The marriage started how everyone expected it would be --near perfect and rich with love. They were both wealthy personalities after all. But there‚Äôs a saying that goes around that says, ‚Äúyou shouldn‚Äôt really believe everything you see on picture.‚Äù 

In 2017, the couple was officially divorced, but the war they were fighting was definitely far from over. In 2018, Amber wrote an op-ed to The Washington Post entitled ‚ÄúI spoke up ‚Äì and faced our culture's wrath. That has to change,‚Äù where she explained that she was hurt, and in which she spoke about the treatment of women in these types of cases. Despite not involving Johnny‚Äôs name on her statement, Johnny‚Äôs team felt that it was pertained to him, having recently filed a complaint against him and, well, technically they just got out of their failed relationship. So, in March of 2019, the 57 year old actor took action and filed a lawsuit of $50 million against her, for defamation over the said article in the Washington Post. The suit said that Amber "is not a victim of domestic abuse, she is a perpetrator," and denied that Johnny ever abused her. At the time, Depp's lawyer called the article an "abuse of the #MeToo movement" and claimed Heard "masquerades as victim rather than abuser." And instead, the suit said that her allegations were part of an "elaborate hoax to generate positive publicity" for the actress. Johnny also testified that he was actually the one being hurt by his wife before, which was proven through recorded phone calls. Johnny also brought up Amber‚Äôs alleged cheating acts and affairs with actor James Franco and multi-billionaire Elon Musk. 

If you enjoyed this story, make sure to like, subscribe, and hit that notification bell for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

Related videos:
Amber Heard LOSES Case After All Witnesses Take Johnny Depp's Side!!! (Amber's LIES EXPOSED)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKSQk1KayeA

Amber Heard & Johnny Depp: The Real ABUSER FINALLY REVEALED!! (UNCENSORED AUDIO!)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aca0KWoHtqQ

snippet.title: Amber Heard Exposed By Her Lawyer For Ruining Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Exposed By Her Lawyer For Ruining Johnny Depp

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

Amber Heard‚Äôs Lawyer EXPOSES Her For Ruining Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/pZR2_v4UpgI

Amber Heard Denies Johnny Depp‚Äôs Claim Of Settlement ‚ÄôSham‚Äô (Report)

https://youtu.be/10t2yH8V05c

Amber Heard on the Stand in Johnny Depp's Libel Case

https://youtu.be/iT2Kiyt7-rk

Amber Heard and Johnny Depp's divorce has been a surprise to the public, and now it's
been a several years of legal battle with no end in sight. It is no secret that Johnny Depp and
Amber Heard have been in a divorce case involving domestic abuse. At one point, Amber
claimed that Johnny was abusive and he didn't do much to fight back. Later, as the
proceedings began, Johnny made statements that Amber was the abuser. We‚Äôre still seeing
the fallout of Johnny Depp‚Äòs catastrophic defeat in the British High Court last year. His libel
case brought against The Sun newspaper was intended to refute accusations that he was a
drug-addled domestic abuser and expose ex-wife Amber Heard as a fantasist. But it
backfired spectacularly, as not only was Depp‚Äôs dirty laundry aired in public, but the judge
found Heard‚Äôs testimony convincing and ruled that it isn‚Äôt libellous to describe him as a
‚Äúwife-beater.‚Äù
Consequences came fast. He was almost immediately booted off Fantastic Beasts 3, has
reportedly lost several high-profile upcoming roles, and insiders say he‚Äôs currently blacklisted
in Hollywood. But the most painful blow may come from Disney, as the studio is apparently
planning to move forward on a Pirates of the Caribbean movie without Captain Jack Sparrow
(but there‚Äôs also an information that Disney allegedly rehired Johnny Depp but no one knows
for sure). But according to the latest information, Amber Heard was exposed by her lawyer
and the body language analyst announced that Amber Heard was not honest by accusing
Johnny Depp! And it seems like things are going so great for Amber as well! Recently she
was replaced by Emilia Clarke for the role of Mera in Aquaman 2, Amber is now abandoned
by her own legal team. Which means something really serious happened as so many people
changed their minds and now they are on Johnny Depp's side. Actually, you may remember
that Amber Heard's former personal assistant claimed that she told the actress about a
violent se**al as**ult she had endured, only for Heard to ‚Äútwist" the story for her own use.
Kate James gave dramatic testimony at Johnny Depp's libel trial against a British tabloid
newspaper that accused the actor of abusing ex-wife Heard during their relationship. Believe
it or not - it is up to you, but here is something else you need to know about Amber Heard.
Anyways, the tables are turned now and many celebrities and fans support Johnny Depp,
and they believe him! Moreover, now they are accusing Amber of orchestrating a hoax to
ruin Johnny Depp‚Äôs career. And what is more, so many professionals from all walks of life
have come forward to prove that Amber is lying. And someone who showed the whole world
that Amber was not honest testifying in court against Johnny was body language analyst
Logan Portenier from the popular YouTube channel ‚ÄòOBSERVE‚Äô. According to Logan
Portenier, Amber Heard‚Äôs behaviour and facial expressions in her infamous 2016 court
deposition were strange and it was the reason why Logan decided to make a deep analysis
of Amber‚Äôs body language.
Amber Heard can be seen in a recording smirking and rolling her eyes while listening to a
recording of herself. In this video, the Aquaman star can be seen rolling her eyes and eating
what seem to be cookies. She looks totally disinterested by what‚Äôs going on in the recording.
First, fans thought she was behaving that way because she was stressed out and scared.
But body language expert is convinced that the real reason why Amber Heard looks and
sounds like she is lying is because she actually is!

In the recording Heard is listening to with the lawyers, Depp can be heard claiming that
Heard hit him with a bathroom door and then punched him in the jaw. She denies having
slammed the door in his face deliberately and then apologises for having hit Depp in the face
on purpose. She can be heard pleading: ‚ÄúI just reacted and I‚Äôm sorry. It‚Äôs below me.‚Äù But why
does she still act like she doesn‚Äôt care? At least right now, during the deposition.

#JusticeForJohnnyDepp #AmberHeard #Metoo #Timesup

Hey everyone!  This audio was first reported on by The Daily Mail.  They obtained a 31 minute recorded phone call between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard.  This was during their divorce in 2016.

This new audio comes fresh off of last weeks discovery of a separate audio conversation in which Amber admits to abusing Johnny Depp on multiple occasions (uncensored link below).  This is not the entirety of the new audio.  I chose to pick some key points to speak about and give important information about them.

However, this is a completely uncensored version.  Warning for foul language.  I will consider uploading the entire audio (uncensored) at some point.  But if you want to listen to the whole thing uninterrupted, I'll post the link to the Daily Mail article below.


Daily Mail Article:
https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-7966723/Amber-Heard-ridicules-Johnny-Depp-claiming-hes-domestic-violence-victim.html

Amber's first audio confession (uncensored)
https://youtu.be/aca0KWoHtqQ

These next 2 videos cover IO Tillett Wright's Lies mentioned in this video.
I'm probably most proud of these 2 because I really got to flex my investigation skills in them.

Amber Heard remains at the frontline of celebrity news due to his ongoing legal battles with ex husband Johnny Depp. The Johnny Depp Amber Heard court case has gotten ugly for many reasons.

While some celebrities prefer living a quiet life away from the public, others just have so many scandals following them. snippet.title: Amber Heard is Innocent 2 - Johnny Depp, Domestic Abuse, Hollywood, Hate & Equality
snippet.description:
#AmberHeard was threatened with a knife by #JohnnyDepp, was hit multiple times in #DomesticViolence and physically injured, and yet experiences online hate and discrimination. Witnesses of the domestic abuse refused to speak publicly because of the #Hollywood and cultural setting which doesn't reward helping victims - even if it's the right thing to do.

In this video, Amber Heard is threatened by Johnny Depp with a knife after she refuses to cut him when he asks her to, and he mocks her about scars and going to court. A video shows JD saying he headbutted Amber, but "that wouldn't break a nose."

A photo of missing Anthony Fox was sent by an alleged romantic partner of ex-staff saying staff are threatened with it since he wanted to testify against Depp. Similarly, #EvanRachelWood who was abused by JD's best friend #MarilynManson is shown reading a testimony that Manson threatened people if they wanted to expose him and threatened Evan with killing himself, yet at the same time violently abusing her and causing fear for numerous people.
She passed Phoenix Act: http://PhoenixAct.com

This video links Hollywood/ #LosAngeles culture (claiming women want fame and they shouldn't stand up for victims), Hate Online for being a woman and sexuality/LGBT identities, and covering up abuse with bystanders.

#Hollaback is shown encouraging interfering to stop abuse and Duty to Rescue Law to create liability for not helping others.

HUMANITARIAN WORK:
Amber Heard is a #UnitedNations Human Rights Champion, ACLU Women's Rights Ambassador, and leader.

SUPPORT HER in #Aquaman 2!: https://www.change.org/p/amber-heard-supporters-we-support-amber-heard-in-aquaman-2


Stop violence against women with technology!

From a Diary entry from Amber Heard: 
"Johnny‚Ä¶ at one point found himself with his shirt wrapped around my neck... I don‚Äôt even know how I wound up with this huge, rather annoying knot on the back of my head. F--k, I hate that..."
Article: https://www.ibtimes.com/amber-heard-details-alleged-terrible-fight-johnny-depp-now-public-diary-entry-3011531 

JD stated in leaked Audio 2 from a 2015 marriage tape that they "had a physical fight on the train" during their honeymoon as well as in San Francisco.
Video: https://youtu.be/ibiPJvTTMXA?t=77


JOURNALIST Nick Wallis is regularly live-tweeting quotes from UK COURT case of Depp vs NGN:  

A bodyguard told Amber that if he didn't interfere, then either Amber would be dead or JD would be dead, showing that deadly physical violence existed against AH: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281220109974016005

"A series of texts between AH and a friend ‚ÄúI need you - J beat me up pretty good - Rox on the couch now - I‚Äôm hurt. I don‚Äôt know what... to do" https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281248771544940545

"QC in this photo a candelabra is on the floor. you did that...
QC: in this photo on 16 Dec 2015 of Ms Heard - 2 black eyes coming up...
QC: and some injuries around her nose and mouth."
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281242906666381313

Texts between JD and AH read by QC: ‚ÄúThe only reason we go for the throat is love‚Äù and she says ‚Äúmy throat is yours‚Äù and you says ‚ÄúI have other uses for your throat that don‚Äôt involve injury‚Äù and she says ‚Äúyou‚Äôre going to be... the death of me."
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1280831219618512896

Other Quotes from Court:

Staff are there to keep things quiet and out of the press: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281218000385966081
Security did not enter during JD's damage worth 5 figures to Australian house: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281217616531591168
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281217047922446336
Scratches were seen on AH's arms after their fight in AU, acknowledged by JD: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281194747294560258
JD said in audio he harmed himself, yelling abuse to AH and blaming her for it (also in this video she later is sobbing): https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281192723387744259
JD has bloody knuckles from destroying furniture: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281161362660614144
JD kicked and damaged his trailer: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281163413993947136
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281162449849405440
Crushing injury, not related to velocity: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281227233080868866
JD says he hits objects and blacks out: 
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281161930107912193
Incorrectly timed meds only 45 min off: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281157454303297536
AH called heroic for taking care of JD: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281156000251346944


Robbie Kaplan: "... imagine what happens every single day to the millions of other women out there who have been abused or assaulted and are not famous actresses and don‚Äôt have the resources to hire lawyers to defend them." https://twitter.com/kaplanrobbie/status/1281938991953195009

#GenderEquality #LGBT #Equality #Charity #Superhero #ACLU

snippet.title: Body Cam Footage PROVING Amber  Heard LIED about Johnny Depp!
snippet.description:
Never-before-seen bodycam footage obtained by DailyMail.com shows a tidy apartment at Amber Heard and Johnny Depp's apartment in 2016

Depp says this 'proves' Heard is lying about the blowout fight that ended their toxic 18-month marriage

Heard has given evidence in multiple legal cases saying Depp hurled a phone at her face and trashed their penthouse kitchen during the May 2016 dust-up

Four different LAPD officers visited the stylish, loft-style apartment in downtown Los Angeles within the space of two hours¬†

The first two cops have given new depositions reiterating that they swept the $1.5million property but didn't see any injuries, vandalism or evidence of a crime

The other cops don't appear to spot anything suspicious in the footage and there are no obvious signs of damage, disarray or staining to the floors or carpets

'Amber and her friends described a chaotic, messy crime scene but the newly released LAPD bodycam unambiguously show that the penthouse was utterly undamaged and that their testimony was one more grandiose lie,' Depp's lawyer tells DailyMail.com

snippet.title: Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

The Downfall Of Amber Heard: LAPD Footage That Exposed Her

https://youtu.be/U8kIY_JREHk

Related videos:

Amber Heard Officially Charged With Perjury & Faces 4 Years In Prison

https://youtu.be/IqJ7xx-RY1E

Amber Heard Facing 10 Years In Prison For Fake Johnny Depp Accusations!?

https://youtu.be/tybOcw3gQzc

Amber Heard Faces 10 Years In Prison For Accusations Against Johnny Depp!!!

https://youtu.be/UvsHWTGHmts

Amber Heard and Johnny Depp have been involved in major legal battles for years now and
it seems that this drama is coming to an end now with new revelations and plot twists. It is
not easy to keep up with Johnny and Amber's case but what is most important here is that
Amber Heard is potentially facing jail time.
The court drama made a major plot twist when Johnny Depp filed a defamation lawsuit
against his ex-wife. He not only claimed that she lied in court, but also that she was abusive
toward him. However, the actors will need to wait even longer to get an official court ruling. If
the court rules in Johnny Depp‚Äôs favor, Amber Heard could be facing up to three years of jail
time.
Basically, Amber Heard claimed that Johnny Depp had physically and emotionally abused
her. Their original court drama in 2015 resulted in a restraining order against Johnny Depp,
but that‚Äôs also where the blurry lines began. Johnny claims that Amber had faked her black
eye seen at the court, and Amber Heard‚Äôs stylist corroborated this.
She stated, ‚ÄúThroughout the day of December 16, 2015, I could see clearly that Amber
Heard did not have any visible marks, bruises, cuts, or injuries to her face or any other part
of her body.‚Äù
But this was not the only time Amber Heard lied and was caught lying. Why would she do
that all the time? It was her strategy. She wanted to play a victim and she was good at it until
the truth came out. Even in 2017 she still managed to convince everyone that in this
situation she suffered from Johnny Depp's actions against her. Amber Heard made people
trust her and, moreover, she almost ruined Johnny Depp‚Äôs career, as the publicity called him
a ‚Äòwife beater‚Äô and supported Amber and sympathized with her.
While nothing could be proven, Amber Heard‚Äôs accusations against Johnny Depp were
enough to significantly damage Johnny‚Äôs reputation and acting career. The story also almost
derailed the latest Pirates of the Caribbean movie, Dead Men Tell No Tales, Johnny Depp
has faced significant levels of hate and ostracizing over the past five years. But then things
have changed.
The first thing which ruined Amber Heard's vicious plan was the leaked audio. And since the
audio leak, the internet has already returned to Johnny Depp's side of the issue. Johnny
Depp filed a defamation lawsuit against his ex-wife just over a year ago, and Amber Heard
attempted to get the case dismissed but her request was denied.
Johnny Depp initially filed the suit to sue Amber Heard for $50 million. But now it appears
that she could not only be forced to pay the sum, but she could also be facing jail time.
According to the International Business Times:
‚ÄúIf Heard will be proven guilty of faking her bruises, she could face three years of
imprisonment. According to the Wallin & Klarich Law Firm, the California Penal Code Section
141 PC stated that it is illegal to alter, modify, plant, place, conceal, manufacture or move
any physical matter with the intention of causing someone to be charged with a crime. Some
would face felony charges for this‚Äù.
But it doesn‚Äôt stop there. Amber Heard could also be charged with offering false evidence.
These are also considered felony crimes and each carry a maximum sentence of up to three
years.
And again, it doesn‚Äôt stop here. More and more evidence has come forward to showcase
that Amber Heard was the one who abused Johnny Depp and that she had a strategy of
making people think she was innocent. The number of times Amber lied is impressive: she
was caught lying in court (the audio recording situation), she asked or even forced people to
lie for her in court and she stole her assistant‚Äôs s*xual assault story and used it as her own.
Later it turned out that Amber Heard has a history of violence.
...
And now I want to know your opinion about this situation. Do you think Amber Heard is
facing jail time? And what‚Äôs gonna happen with Johnny Depp‚Äôs career? Let me know your
opinion in the comments section down below.

Binge Watch - Binge Watch is the best source of the latest celebrity news. Want to see what's trending today in the Hollywood life or hear about the newest celeb gossip? You're in the right place. 

Consider subscribing to not miss out on what's trending today in the life of the world's biggest stars.

#JusticeForJohnnyDepp #news #BingeWatch

the truth came out. Even in 2017 she still managed to convince everyone that in this
situation she suffered from Johnny Depp's actions against her. Amber Heard made people
trust her and, moreover, she almost ruined Johnny Depp‚Äôs career, as the publicity called him
a ‚Äòwife beater‚Äô and supported Amber and sympathized with her.
While nothing could be proven, Amber Heard‚Äôs accusations against Johnny Depp were
enough to significantly damage Johnny‚Äôs reputation and acting career. The story also almost
derailed the latest Pirates of the Caribbean movie, Dead Men Tell No Tales, Johnny Depp
has faced significant levels of hate and ostracizing over the past five years. But then things
have changed.
The first thing which ruined Amber Heard's vicious plan was the leaked audio. And since the
audio leak, the internet has already returned to Johnny Depp's side of the issue. Johnny
Depp filed a defamation lawsuit against his ex-wife just over a year ago, and Amber Heard
attempted to get the case dismissed but her request was denied.
Johnny Depp initially filed the suit to sue Amber Heard for $50 million. But now it appears
that she could not only be forced to pay the sum, but she could also be facing jail time.
According to the International Business Times:
‚ÄúIf Heard will be proven guilty of faking her bruises, she could face three years of
imprisonment. According to the Wallin & Klarich Law Firm, the California Penal Code Section
141 PC stated that it is illegal to alter, modify, plant, place, conceal, manufacture or move
any physical matter with the intention of causing someone to be charged with a crime. Some
would face felony charges for this‚Äù.
But it doesn‚Äôt stop there. Amber Heard could also be charged with offering false evidence.
These are also considered felony crimes and each carry a maximum sentence of up to three
years.
And again, it doesn‚Äôt stop here. More and more evidence has come forward to showcase
that Amber Heard was the one who abused Johnny Depp and that she had a strategy of
making people think she was innocent. The number of times Amber lied is impressive: she
was caught lying in court (the audio recording situation), she asked or even forced people to
lie for her in court and she stole her assistant‚Äôs s*xual assault story and used it as her own.
Later it turned out that Amber Heard has a history of violence.
...
And now I want to know your opinion about this situation. Do you think Amber Heard is
facing jail time? And what‚Äôs gonna happen with Johnny Depp‚Äôs career? Let me know your
opinion in the comments section down below.

snippet.title: Elon Musk Speaks Against Amber Heard  and DEFENDS Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
Elon Musk Speaks Against Amber Heard  and DEFENDS Johnny Depp

In yet another twist, a concierge has claimed via written witness statement in court that Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk regularly visited Amber Heard at her ex-husband and Hollywood actor Johnny Depp's Los Angeles penthouse while they were still together, the media reported. A written statement from Alejandro Romero, a concierge at the building Depp and Heard were living in, alleged that the Tesla founder "frequently visited the 'Aquaman' star late at night whenever Depp wasn't home."

Because of these reports, Elon Musk has spoken up about this issue and speaks against his ex-partner Amber Heard and somehow defended Johnny Depp. If you are curious about his claims, be sure to watch the whole video because it‚Äôs pretty crazy! snippet.title: Amber Heard's Friends Choose Johnny Depp‚Äôs Side After This‚Ä¶
snippet.description:
Amber Heard's Friends Choose Johnny Depp‚Äôs Side After This‚Ä¶

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

Amber Heard Friends Testify AGAINST Her & Side With Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/IfZzdVZrPuI

Amber Heard‚Äôs Lawyer QUITS & EXPOSES Amber For Ruining Johnny Depp!?

https://youtu.be/nEyBc2Ie2MU

Body Language Analyst REACTS to Amber Heard's CRINGE Deposition | Faces Episode 15

https://youtu.be/hQFFm_X2lps

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been battling in court over the validity of
her accusations of domestic violence. However, this story took an even juicier
side when Amber Heard's friends started supporting Johnny Depp and testifying
against Amber Heard.
Make sure you stay till the end to see which Amber Heard‚Äôs friends sided with
Johnny Depp and what they have to say about Amber.
Despite the fact that Amber Heard‚Äôs vicious plan to ruin Johnny Depp‚Äôs career
was pretty successful lately, it seems like right now the tables have turned. As
you may already know, there have been several times when Amber Heard was
caught lying or using other people to stay in the driver's seat in this case. She
allegedly bribed her own sister, and used her assistant‚Äôs s*xual assault story.
Basically, things got very dirty and it seems like her fans, friends and some
other people don‚Äôt want to be linked to the perfect liar.
So, let‚Äôs start with Twitter and some fans‚Äô thoughts on Amber Heard‚Äôs lies.
When Amber Heard said it out loud that Johnny Depp was an ab*ser and even
showed bruises, fans couldn‚Äôt help but bombarded Amber with tweets and
comments. Among the Twitter users was Adam Waldman - a former member of
Johnny's legal team - who tweeted a picture of the actress as he tried to discount
her allegations against her ex-husband.
Alongside the images he wrote: ‚Äú12/15/15 allegation 'I had bruised ribs. Bruises
all over my body, bruises on my forearms from trying to defend the blows. I had
2 black eyes. I had a broken nose. I had a broken lip. Justice Nichols - I believe
her. UK Appeals Court - we believe him. But oops ... PHOTO SHOOT!‚Äù
Responding to the post, the actress said: ‚ÄúYes Mr Waldman, I may be wearing
makeup on this occasion but on every occasion you will still be short.‚Äù
Then another Twitter user commented, ‚ÄúI'd rather be short than an abusive gold
digger Woman shrugging‚Äù, Amber hit back, ‚ÄúIt's good to be realistic with your
goals‚Äù. Then, there was another tweet, written in Spanish that read, ‚ÄúAmber
Heard talking to Johnny Deep's lawyer regarding a set of photos where she
claims she was made wearing makeup to cover hit marks, a broken nostril,

bruises and more made by Johnny...but...‚Äù, the actress replied, ‚ÄúAnd so?‚Äù Looks
like Amber Heard is having fun and doesn't care what people say about her.
Amber Heard could expect such a reaction from people and, probably, that is
why she is so calm and confident. But what she did not expect was that her
friends sided with Johnny Depp. You have to wonder who and why betrayed
Amber Heard, and we are going to break it down for you in a minute.
Amber Heard was shocked when Laura Divenere (interior decorator to the stars)
and Amber‚Äôs former friend testified against her. Laura Divenere worked for
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard as their interior decorator in downtown LA in
the Eastern Columbia Building from July 2014 to sometime in 2016. And after
the pair splitted up Laura continued to work for Amber. She explains, "I have
been and continue to consider myself a friend of Amber's. I remain in regular
contact with Amber. I have not communicated with Mr. Depp since 2016." It is
an interesting ally in this case for Johnny Depp as she is the first person in the
case to identify as a friend of Amber Heard's but give testimony in support of
Johnny.

Plus I want to know your opinion about Amber Heard‚Äôs friends taking Johnny
Depp‚Äôs side. Do you think they just don‚Äôt want to be linked to Amber Heard
because she is a liar? Let me know your opinion in the comments section down
below. Thanks for watching this video and don‚Äôt forget to hit that subscribe
button.

like Amber Heard is having fun and doesn't care what people say about her.
Amber Heard could expect such a reaction from people and, probably, that is
why she is so calm and confident. But what she did not expect was that her
friends sided with Johnny Depp. You have to wonder who and why betrayed
Amber Heard, and we are going to break it down for you in a minute.
Amber Heard was shocked when Laura Divenere (interior decorator to the stars)
and Amber‚Äôs former friend testified against her. Laura Divenere worked for
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard as their interior decorator in downtown LA in
the Eastern Columbia Building from July 2014 to sometime in 2016. And after
the pair splitted up Laura continued to work for Amber. She explains, "I have
been and continue to consider myself a friend of Amber's. I remain in regular
contact with Amber. I have not communicated with Mr. Depp since 2016." It is
an interesting ally in this case for Johnny Depp as she is the first person in the
case to identify as a friend of Amber Heard's but give testimony in support of
Johnny.

Plus I want to know your opinion about Amber Heard‚Äôs friends taking Johnny
Depp‚Äôs side. Do you think they just don‚Äôt want to be linked to Amber Heard
because she is a liar? Let me know your opinion in the comments section down
below. Thanks for watching this video and don‚Äôt forget to hit that subscribe
button.

About Johnny Depp: John Christopher Depp II (born June 9, 1963) is an American actor, producer, and musician. He has been nominated for 10 Golden Globe Awards, winning one for Best Actor for his performance of the title role in Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2008), and has been nominated for three Academy Awards for Best Actor, among other accolades. He is regarded as one of the world's biggest film stars.[1][2]

Depp rose to prominence on the 1980s television series 21 Jump Street, becoming a teen idol. He has gained critical praise for his portrayals of inept screenwriter-director Ed Wood in the film of the same name, undercover FBI agent Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco, author J. M. Barrie in Finding Neverland, and Boston gangster Whitey Bulger in Black Mass. Depp is the third highest-grossing actor worldwide, as films featuring Depp have grossed over US$3.7 billion at the United States box office and over US$10 billion worldwide.[3] He has been listed in the 2012 Guinness World Records as the world's highest-paid actor, with earnings of US$75 million.[4] His most commercially successful films are the Pirates of the Caribbean series, which grossed US$4.5 billion, the Fantastic Beasts film series, which grossed US$1.3 billion, Alice in Wonderland, which grossed US$1 billion, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, which grossed US$474 million, and The Tourist, which grossed US$278 million.
Depp had a supporting role in Oliver Stone's 1986 Vietnam War film Platoon and played the title character in the 1990 romantic dark fantasy Edward Scissorhands. He later found box office success in the adventure film Sleepy Hollow (1999), the swashbuckler film series Pirates of the Caribbean (2003‚Äìpresent), the fantasy films Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (2005) and Alice in Wonderland (2010), the animated comedy western Rango (2011) (in which he voiced the title character), and most recently Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald (2018). Depp has collaborated on nine films with director, producer and friend Tim Burton. Depp was inducted as a Disney Legend in 2015.[8] He has performed in numerous musical groups, including forming the rock supergroup Hollywood Vampires along with Alice Cooper and Joe Perry.

snippet.title: Linguist Analyzes Amber Heard‚Äôs Unreliable Statements About Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
Statement & Conversation Analysis of Amber Heard‚Äôs words in a 2016 deposition. This analysis focuses on Heard‚Äôs statements about her and Depp‚Äôs relationship. Want to help support this channel? 1) Thumbs up & Subscribe. 2) Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/martindecoder

Your support on Patreon is much appreciated for the time-consuming task it is to make these analyses. Thank you for supporting for whatever amount of time you‚Äôre able to.

I‚Äôm a Danish linguist, educated in Statement Analysis (SA) & Conversation Analysis (CA). In these methods, it‚Äôs understood that people subconsciously want to tell the truth, which is why the truth is revealed in their language use.

Literature that I use in my job as external lecturer and that I recommend, if you want to know more about Conversation Analysis and Narrative Analysis:

Hutchby, Ian (2006): ‚ÄòMedia Talk ‚Äì Conversation Analysis and the Study of Broadcasting‚Äô. Maidenhead: Open University Press. (Basic Principles + Conversation Analysis of News Interviews)

Rowland, Robert (2009). ‚ÄúThe narrative perspective‚Äù. Kuypers, Jim A. (ed.): ‚ÄòRhetorical criticism ‚Äì perspectives in action‚Äô. Plymouth, MA: Lexington Books, p. 117-141. (The Basics of Narrative Analysis)

This video is made according to the terms of ‚Äòfair use‚Äô.

#johnnydepp #amberheard

snippet.title: 10 Times Johnny Depp HATED Amber Heard...
snippet.description:
10 Times Johnny Depp UPSET Over Amber Heard

Subscribe to the channel ‚á® https://rb.gy/gae7u0

WATCH NEXT ‚á©

https://youtu.be/RksqotDUV48

https://youtu.be/OXcfMTyyuPA


RELATED VIDEOS‚á©

10 Times Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us About AH
https://youtu.be/GShctSD8HNg

10 Celebrities That Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard
https://youtu.be/gECq8x8b6bo

Disney Apologizes To Johnny Depp After Firing Him...
https://youtu.be/siGE-fVUHG4

Johnny Depp FINALLY Speaks On How Amber Heard Tried To Ruin Him
https://youtu.be/tdXBUL9WunQ

Johnny Depp RESPONDS To Amber Heard's Apology... (Court Case Updates!!!)
https://youtu.be/buSAIbP7dnA

Johnny DEPP v Amber HEARD (The Sun UK): The Appeal Hearing
https://youtu.be/07h7unV55NE


Johnny Depp has become a household name throughout his career, especially lately with the very public divorce with Amber Heard. This divorce is explosive in every way that is affecting their image, celebrity status, and finances. Johnny Depp has been in the public eye since his first experience in the acting world in 1984 when he made an appearance in Nightmare on Elm Street. This movie was just the start of his career, and he is seen as one the most prominent film stars of all time. Not only is he an actor, but he is a producer and musician as well. His resume is long and vast, but his marriage to Amber Heard has been a short and destructive ride. 
Johnny Depp's early life was not cut and dry with a happy little childhood. He was quiet and withdrawn with drug use and self-harm starting at the age of 12, and this pattern has set a stage that will only worsen and affect his behavior in all areas of his life. His life only got worse when his parents split up, giving Johnny the responsibility at 15 to collect the child support since he was the youngest. These events are creating the pattern of failing relationships and mental health that are currently bringing him down. 
Johnny Depp has had various romantic relationships, actresses, and models, and not all ended disastrously as his current legal battle. The relationship before Amber Heard was with Vanessa Paradis, his partner for 14 years, and they share two children. There are many speculated reasons for this split, and none of them are centering around any abuse claims. The reports are Vanessa's dislike of his mother, Depp became bored, and a potential relationship with Amber Heard. Their relationship did start the same period as Depp and Paradis's separation. Again I will say in this relationship of 14 years, and there were no allegations of abusive behavior. 
Amber Heard files for divorce under irreconcilable differences on May 23rd,2016, just three days after his mother's death, but this rocky marriage of 15 months has many sides to it. Heard was seeking spousal payments and claiming verbal and physical abuse but this divorce and court proceedings go beyond civilized and straight revenge starts. Depp's behavior has become erratic throughout their marriage, and his silent cries for help are finally being seen and heard. Depp denies all allegations and states he will not respond to lies about his personal life, but this is far from the end. 

Celeb Trending is the #1 Youtube to get caught up on the latest news and trends about your favorite actors, athletes, political figures, and more! In this channel, you will never miss your fix on the most trending celebrities!
#JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard #Celebtrending

Amber Heard files for divorce under irreconcilable differences on May 23rd,2016, just three days after his mother's death, but this rocky marriage of 15 months has many sides to it. Heard was seeking spousal payments and claiming verbal and physical abuse but this divorce and court proceedings go beyond civilized and straight revenge starts. Depp's behavior has become erratic throughout their marriage, and his silent cries for help are finally being seen and heard. Depp denies all allegations and states he will not respond to lies about his personal life, but this is far from the end.
