snippet.title: Judge STOPS LISTENING To Amber Heard! - Johnny Depp Amber Heard Lawsuit!
snippet.description:
From a sweep-you-off-your-feet kind of romance, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard‚Äôs love story has taken a messy turn in just a few years. It seemed like the couple‚Äôs burning desire for each other turned into a burning dislike as quickly as it started. Five years after Amber Heard filed for divorce, the fight between the former couple is still ongoing. And even though the divorce had been finalized four years ago, the chaos that their marriage brought is far from over. But since the latest court hearing for the former couple‚Äôs defamation lawsuit will take place soon, there have been many major changes and happenings that just surfaced, and that includes a huge win for Johnny‚Äôs case. It seems like the Virginian judge handling their case is tired of Amber‚Äôs lies and is not willing to listen to her anymore. How did that happen? Well, it is a pretty detailed case but in this video, we‚Äôll lay out everything you need to know. But before that, make sure to smash that subscribe button first and hit that notification bell for more updates. Let‚Äôs dive in!

Before everything else, let‚Äôs go back to the beginning of this case. Johnny and Amber first ignited a spark between them when they starred together at the 2011 comedy-drama film, The Rum Diary. This love story between the two had quickly travelled from screen to real life. Johnny was then sharing his life with partner Vanessa Paradis, a French actress and singer, whom he lived with for 14 years and whom he had two kids with, while Amber was with her then girlfriend Tasya van Ree. Shortly after the film‚Äôs release, the two broke off their current relationships and officially started dating. Their relationship was something you can describe as romantic and utterly beautiful. But today, it‚Äôs now one of the messiest in history. Amber Heard filed for divorce in 2016. Along the divorce filing was her request for a temporary restraining order against Johnny, accusing him of physically hurting her. Johnny, up to this day, vehemently denies the allegation. Even though the couple‚Äôs divorce was finalized in 2017, lawsuits have been made due to Amber‚Äôs concerning allegations against Depp. She also alleged that at the time of her filing for divorce, Johnny threw a phone at her which caused her to bruise her face, an accusation that Johnny denied, and investigators found false. Turns out, the photos were staged. Not so cool, Amber. Aside from this, the Aquaman actress also stressed that Johnny was hurtful towards his former lovers, which Johnny‚Äôs ex-wife and ex-fiancee proved false.

But despite the police‚Äôs information, news publication The Sun still called Johnny Depp a very bad name which angered the actor, causing him to file a libel lawsuit against the publication. Sadly enough, Johnny lost this lawsuit, which resulted in his career‚Äôs downfall as major production company Warner Bros. fired him from his role as Grindelwald in the upcoming third installment of the series Fantastic Beasts. Clearly, this broke Johnny‚Äôs heart. 

But even though her name became pretty big during this case, it is undeniable that Johnny‚Äôs name in the industry is a lot bigger. So, Amber started to lose her supporters‚Äô trust, especially when more and more evidence against her was turning up, including the phone calls she made with Johnny admitting that she did hit him, her alleged affairs, and even her false claims that she donated her $7 million dollar divorce settlement to charity. Until now, Amber couldn‚Äôt provide any proof that she did donate her settlement money, which she publicly promised before. 

You might be wondering why Johnny Depp filed for a lawsuit in the state of Virginia when neither him nor Amber lives in the state. snippet.title: Johnny Depp looking uneasy around abuser Amber Heard
snippet.description: This isn't the only time he looked at her for approval in past videos and seemed generally uncomfortable around her. This one stuck out for me... it was at a premiere for Mortdecai. Mind you this is only 2 minutes yet...there was something odd going on. You have to look carefully at his body language: In the beginning, he mouths "Stop" to Amber (twice!) because she obviously didn't want him to do an interview. He then shook his head "no" then proceeded with the interview. Notice he backed little after locking eyes with Amber, fearing he upset her by going against her wishes. Notice he had a plaster on his finger too...not sure if she injured it but she certainly injured his middle finger a couple of months after this. While answering questions, he kept checking to see if she was okay with it. She pretended she was, knowing they were being watched. He perhaps unintentionally used words like 'out of control' and 'difficult' to reflect the situation back then. At the end he asked, "can we go?" Why should he even ask for her permission? She treated him like a dog throughout their whole relationship.

snippet.title: How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career
snippet.description:
How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career

https://youtu.be/-qHw0PtrdQI

Amber Heard‚Äôs Lawyer EXPOSES Her For Ruining Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/pZR2_v4UpgI

Amber Heard Officially FIRED From Aquaman 2 Role! (REACTIONS)

https://youtu.be/QBCEXSVjBrM

Amber Heard was extremely successful after divorcing Johnny Depp: she got cast in the
biggest movie franchise of her career - DC's 'Aquaman' - became the spokesperson of
cosmetics giant L'Or√©al Paris, as well as American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) ambassador
for women's rights with a focus on gender-based violence.
So many people even claimed they have never heard about Amber until this infamous
divorce: ‚ÄúHad no idea who she was until that divorce. I didn‚Äôt even know that it was her who
played Mara!‚Äù - one fan said.
However, the tables have turned and now Amber Heard is finding that her career as an A-list
Hollywood actress might be over. She has reportedly been kicked from Aquaman 2 and she
is about to lose the contract with L'oreal Paris.
So what was the reason for all of these problematic events for Amber Heard? Apparently,
her well-planned strategy to ruin Johnny Depp‚Äôs life has been shattered. And now no one
believes that Amber is an innocent victim as Johnny showed in a court undeniable evidence
of Amber being an abuser (audio, text messages and so on).
Heard lost the appeal to dismiss Johnny Depp‚Äôs $50 million defamation lawsuit and we
learned that the Aquaman star could be facing up to 3 years of jail time if found guilty of
manipulating evidence against her then-husband. But even beyond the former couple‚Äôs
seemingly never-ending legal battle, Heard has come under a lot of fire after evidence
presented to the court as part of the lawsuit revealed that she‚Äôs physically and emotionally
harassed Depp while twisting the narrative in her favor and painting the Pirates of the
Caribbean actor as a domestic abuser.
In fact, the petition to remove her from Aquaman 2 recently reached a whopping 400,000
signatures and is on its way to passing the half-million threshold. This is essentially the same
kind of backlash and blacklisting that Depp had to endure a couple of years ago, so you can
see why fans of the legendary star are asking for justice with such fervency. And now,
according to a new report by Cosmic Book News, Warner Bros. has gone forward with firing
Heard from Aquaman 2 by buying out her contract.
Also there was one more petition against Amber Heard. ‚ÄúA liar and an abuser, a shame for
women,‚Äù begins one of two Change.org campaigns to remove Amber Heard, 33, from her
role as global spokesperson for cosmetics brand L‚ÄôOr√©al.
And yet, she has claimed in her court declaration countering ex-husband's $50 million
defamation suit against her that her career took a serious hit and she received death threats
that forced her to constantly keep on changing her contact details.
Here is what Amber declared in her motion to dismiss Johnny Depp‚Äôs lawsuit filed in Fairfax
County, Virginia Circuit Court:
"Following my highly-publicized separation from Johnny, I read accounts in the media
referring to me as a victim of domestic violence. In response, many people called me a liar

(without ever hearing my story). I was dropped from a global fashion brand's upcoming
campaign. I lost a part of a movie in which I had already been cast. People I have never met
or spoken to threatened me with violence. I received so many death threats I had to change
my phone number on a near-weekly basis.‚Äù
Isn‚Äôt it fair that her career might be over with Johnny as it started with him?
As reported by MEAWW earlier, although Heard's career in the entertainment industry began
in 2003 when she appeared in two music videos - Kenny Chesney's 'There Goes My Life'
and Eisley's 'I Wasn't Prepared," and went onto star in an array of TV shows and movies, her
career really took off in 2015 ‚Äî the same year when she married Depp ‚Äî when she had
prominent roles in four mainstream movies.


Now I want to know your opinion. Do you think Amber Heard‚Äôs career will be over soon as
she destroyed it on her own? Let me know what you think in the comments section down
below.

Binge Watch - Binge Watch is the best source of the latest celebrity news. Want to see what's trending today in the Hollywood life or hear about the newest celeb gossip? You're in the right place. 

Consider subscribing to not miss out on what's trending today in the life of the world's biggest stars.

snippet.title: [REUPLOAD] Johnny Depp vs. Amber Heard | The Full Story of a Toxic Relationship & Abuse
snippet.description:
Reuploading to try and fix the name censoring. I received threats from the ex mentioned because of this video so I'm just trying to protect myself. Please don't go look him up and don't go send him hate. He honestly just love attention so please just let him fade into irrelevancy where he belongs please.  I've reported him to the police now and they'll be issuing him with a warning and, thankfully,  this information will be available to any future partners of his who request information via Clare‚Äôs Law. 

---------------


Today we're going to look at the whole timeline of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's relationship and discuss it from the perspective of someone who just got out of an abusive relationship themselves. snippet.title: Johnny Depp Amber Heard Controversy Explained in Twenty Minutes
snippet.description:
I explain the Johnny Depp / Amber Heard controversy and allegations, starting at the beginning of it all from their initial meeting years ago to the upcoming trial. Amber Heard has been in the news recently because she didn't donate any money to charity (ACLU and Children's Hospital) even though she promised to donate her $7 million divorce settlement that she received from Johnny Depp. 

This video is like Cliff's notes and there's lots I had to leave out to keep this under twenty minutes (such as the dog smuggling, allegations/evidence of Amber cheating on Johnny, the staged cell phone incident with Rocky and IO,  Amber's mysterious disappearing bruises that many claim she faked, and of course her failure to pay the money she said she donated to charity). 

There's so much more to discuss, SO I'VE UPLOADED A SECOND VIDEO WITH ADDITIONAL ANALYSIS AT https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tp_xhpK6Okc 

I forgot to add the picture of Amber doing her walk of shame outside court, so here it is. As I said, this "bruise" mysteriously disappeared in other photos around the same time, damaging her credibility: https://www.eonline.com/news/768562/amber-heard-leaves-court-visibly-bruised-after-judge-grants-johnny-depp-restraining-order

PLEASE CLICK LIKE AND SUBSCRIBE. I PLAN TO START PUTTING OUT VIDEOS ON DEPP VS. HEARD AND OTHER INTERESTING TOPICS. MY OTHER VIDEOS HAVE PHOTOS AND INTERVIEW CLIPS. 

For more details on the controversy, see the videos of Incredibly Average (Brian McPherson) here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg0C-N_MPYYOXyF4T3jMxNQ

I'M NOT MONETIZED YET ON YOUTUBE, BUT HERE'S MY PATREON IF YOU WANT TO TIP. NOT REQUIRED OR EXPECTED :)  https://www.patreon.com/colonelkurtz‚Äã

snippet.title: AMBER HEARD CLAPS BACK As She REACTS TO THE HORRIBLE Reviews For Her New Movie | The Gossipy
snippet.description:
AMBER HEARD CLAPS BACK As She REACTS TO THE HORRIBLE Reviews For Her New Movie | The Gossipy

Amber Heard knows how to get that money. She remains in the celebrity news and headlines as Aquaman 2 is set to make Amber Heard one of the highest paid actresses in Hollywood today. The Johnny Depp Amber Heard Court case continues and remains at the top of celeb news. 

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Apologies to Johnny Depp after Losing ALL Her Movie Roles
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Apologies to Johnny Depp after Losing ALL Her Movie Roles
Some believe Amber's first deceit began when she met Johnny Depp at the premiere of The Rum Diary. When they met, they claimed to have a very tight relationship and that they had finally moved on and left their separate companions for each other. While they appear to get along, others believe Amber Heard has never actually liked Johnny Depp.

üíó Hope you liked the video and would consider leaving a like and telling us what you thought in the comments!

Amber Heard has filed a lawsuit against her ex-husband Johnny Depp, claiming that he abused her verbally and physically. Depp filed a defamation case against Heard after evidence of his innocence appeared in the form of a leaked tape from 2015 and a statement from her hairdresser. snippet.title: Johnny Depp snagged a victory in his court battle against ex-wife Amber Heard #Shorts
snippet.description:
Title: Charity to reveal if Amber Heard donated $7M Johnny Depp divorce settlement #Shorts

Read More Stories Here: www.haveitalldaily.com 

Description: 
Amber Heard publicly made a promise to give her $7m divorce settlement from Johnny Depp to charity but nothing was ever confirmed. Well Johnny Depp isn‚Äôt one to give up and has been granted a partial petition by a judge in New York that has ordered the American Civil Liberties Union to release documents to confirm whether Heard donated the 2017 divorce payout. 

‚ÄúMr. Depp is most gratified by the Court‚Äôs decision,‚Äù Depp‚Äôs attorney Benhamin Chew told USA Today. 

His lawyers claim that Amber was lying about donating all of her divorce settlement to ACLU and the Children‚Äôs Hospital Los Angeles and may have cost him his libel case against a British newspaper in November 2020.

His attorney Andrew Caldecott claimed that Amber‚Äôs claim of donating money to charity was ‚Äúcalculated and manipulative lie‚Äù that ‚Äútipped the scales against Mr. Depp from the very beginning.‚Äù 

Lawyers for News Group Newspapers claim, Amber had intended to pay it out over 10 years and had not lied.

Amber Heard publicly made a promise to give her $7m divorce settlement from Johnny Depp to charity but nothing was ever confirmed. Well Johnny Depp isn‚Äôt one to give up and has been granted a partial petition by a judge in New York that has ordered the American Civil Liberties Union to release documents to confirm whether Heard donated the 2017 divorce payout. 

‚ÄúMr. Depp is most gratified by the Court‚Äôs decision,‚Äù Depp‚Äôs attorney Benhamin Chew told USA Today. 

His lawyers claim that Amber was lying about donating all of her divorce settlement to ACLU and the Children‚Äôs Hospital Los Angeles and may have cost him his libel case against a British newspaper in November 2020.

His attorney Andrew Caldecott claimed that Amber‚Äôs claim of donating money to charity was ‚Äúcalculated and manipulative lie‚Äù that ‚Äútipped the scales against Mr. Depp from the very beginning.‚Äù 

Lawyers for News Group Newspapers claim, Amber had intended to pay it out over 10 years and had not lied.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Tells Amber Heard To Remind Him Not To Hurt Her / EXCLUSIVE
snippet.description:
Hi there! This video is a clip which was excluded from the cut-up, edited and leaked recording by Johnny Depp‚Äôs team in January.  The full version was recorded by Johnny Depp and Amber Heard during their marriage (September 2015). The full recording is being used as evidence in the Johnny Depp v The Sun UK libel case. Depp decided to sue The Sun for publishing an article where they brand him a ‚Äòwife-beater‚Äô, for abusing his then wife, Amber Heard. 

When the cut-up/edited 46 minute version leaked in January by Depp‚Äôs team, it was made to portray a certain narrative and was used as propaganda. It was leaked 6 months before the trial began and used to lead people and potential jurors to believe that it was somehow an official piece of evidence, which it was not. It was incomplete.

If you‚Äôd like to read the official case documents, they can be found here: https://www.nickwallis.com/depp-trial

This recording was obtained through CourtTV and can be found here: https://www.courttv.com/news/amber-heard-witness-statements-depp-blamed-the-monster-for-physical-verbal-abuse/

You can listen to the FULL recording here: https://youtu.be/k9pbrBmHI58

Comments are disabled to combat abuse.

snippet.title: Emilia Clarke REPLACING Amber Heard In Aquaman 2?!
snippet.description:
Although it is pretty obvious that Amber Heard should be fired from the Aquaman 2 sequel, the DC Extended Universe‚Äôs film production company that was supposed to make this decision, seems to have missed the obvious. Now, they are getting huge media backlash, thanks to the negative comments against one of their lead actresses, Amber Heard. Before the whole Aquaman 2 filming even began, we all knew, and if you didn‚Äôt then you should listen to this next fact, that millions of fans were against Amber‚Äôs role reprisal in the upcoming Aquaman second installment that stars Jason Momoa and other huge stars such as Nicole Kidman, Patrick Wilson, Willem Defoe, and Randall Park. Such a big cast ensemble, and that alone proves that Warner Bros. can pay huge stars for their roles. Now, what‚Äôs up with recasting Amber Heard? You may remember that a huge number of supporters filed for a petition to be signed with the aim to request Warner Brothers to fire Amber from her role as Queen Mera, the same way they forced Johnny to leave Fantastic Beasts. However, even after garnering more than 1.6 million signatures, Warner Brothers still pushed through, having Amber reprise her role. A lot of fans were upset by this, and we mean UPSET. Everywhere you look on social media, there were mean comments about Amber, and sadly, about the upcoming Aquaman film itself. There‚Äôs no doubt that the first Aquaman directed by James Wan was a huge hit, and it deserved every inch of success because it‚Äôs aesthetically and cinematically beautiful in many, many aspects. Yet, during the promotion period, it had been noticeable that people were planning to not watch the movie and even campaign for others to boycott it too, in honor of their support for Johnny Depp, who has been let go from his role as Grindelwald in the Fantastic Beasts film series. Both movies are set to premiere in 2022, and both movies are going to be under Warner Brothers.

But what is keeping Warner Bros. head over heels for this actress who is currently dealing with a huge lawsuit in front of her, and a number of pieces of evidence against her proving that she is not all that she claims to be? With everything that‚Äôs going on in Johnny and Amber‚Äôs post-divorce chaos, it is indeed safe to say that Amber‚Äôs name is in the hot seat, and not in a positive way. Well, it turns out they are obviously risking it. Several people are slowing turning to Johnny‚Äôs side. So, in the middle of this all, fans can‚Äôt help but make their own bets on who would be the suitable replacement for her cast as Queen Mera. There are tons of different actresses that would fit the role, but it seems like in the last few months while this situation against casting Amber is happening, fans‚Äô eyes are falling on Emilia Clarke.

But why do we think Emilia would be the perfect person to play Queen Mera? Well, there‚Äôs a number of reasons, from rekindling her romance with Game of Thrones co-star Jason Momoa. Stay tuned because we are about to enumerate all the reasons for you. But first, make sure to hit that subscribe button and smash that notification bell for more updates. So, here are some of the biggest reasons why Emilia Clarke is the best female celeb to replace Amber Heard in Aquaman 2.

1. She is one of the biggest and most celebrated female stars today
Widely known as Daenerys Targaryen, 

2. Fans would love to see Jason Momoa and Emilia Clarke back as an on screen pair
It is never easy to replace a cast member, especially a well-loved cast member, in a film‚Äôs second installment. However, if Warner Bros. did this decision as easily with Johnny Depp, considering how it might agitate his fans, then it must also be an easy feat for the production company to replace Amber Heard as well especially in the midst of her. While it is never easy with the fans (but in this case of course it is) when an actor is replaced in a franchise, it may go down better with viewers when they see Jason and Emilia reunite as an on-screen pair. The biggest reason why Emilia Clarke is a good replacement for Amber Heard in ‚ÄòAquaman 2‚Äô is that she is a fan-favorite since her past role with Jason Momoa.

3. Emilia‚Äôs siren-like physique can surely rock the Queen Mera suit
Amidst this chaos between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard, fans are already eyeing Emilia Clarke as the latter‚Äôs replacement in Aquaman 2.

But given that all these will remain merely fantasies for fans, we‚Äôll just wait for 2022 and see how Aquaman 2 goes. That‚Äôs all for today, we hope you enjoyed that video, and if you did, make sure you like, subscribe, and hit that notification bell for more videos like this.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp speaks about his finger injury | IMPORTANT INFO IN DESCRIPTION
snippet.description:
As you guys must know a pretty nasty fight happened in March, 2015, Australia.

Approximately one month after they married, Heard threw multiple objects at him, including two vodka bottles that severed his finger. He said in court documents that the attack started after he told her she'd have to sign a prenup. 

And this video is part of the deposition of the 30M lawsuit against his ex lawyers. Because the attorney Bryan Freedman, brought the injury up because Bloom‚Äôs law firm had prepared the post-nup agreement that Heard was asked to sign the night before the fight, as Depp claimed.

He also stated multiple times in these court documents  that he lied to protect her, saying that he had cut his own finger by accident.


Here a few things you need to know:

Amber changed the history behind the incident multiple times.

I. First she claimed she was in UK, on the phone with Johnny while he threw a punch at some glass, severing his finger
https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3741910/amp/Photo-Johnny-Depp-s-ghastly-finger-cut-tip-fit-rage-wrote-blood-wall-Amber-Heard-affair-Billy-Bob-Thornton.html


II. Then she claimed he punched a wall, severing his fingertip
https://variety.com/2016/film/news/johnny-depp-hand-injury-amber-heard-fight-1201786023/


III. Then, that he repeatedly smashed a plastic phone and that caused the injury
https://metro.co.uk/2019/04/15/johnny-depp-scrawled-jealous-messages-amber-heard-oil-paint-blood-severing-finger-9204710/amp/


IV. She admits she was in Australia, but didn't throw a bottle or anything at him. https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/5835867-Amber-Heard-Motion-to-Dismiss.html


V. And recently, in a record obtained by Daily Mail, she admitted that she "never meant to hurt him" in Australia. Heard repeatedly says she didn't did it on purpose while crying and afraid she'll lose him. All this happening while doctors were searching for Depp's finger in what looked like a crime scene, just a few hours after the Incident. Which debunk all her initial claims once again. https://t.co/YVvnKXRisQ

snippet.title: AMBER CHEATED ON JOHNNY - Proof Amber Heard Cheated On Johnny Depp With Elon Musk | Celebrity Craze
snippet.description:
AMBER CHEATED ON JOHNNY - Proof Amber Heard Cheated On Johnny Depp With Elon Musk | Celebrity Craze

Elon Musk just keeps getting dragged back into the Johnny Depp Amber Heard celeb drama. Elon Musk, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are back on the frontlines of celebrity news. Amber Heard just had a baby girl and rumors are swirling on who the baby's father is. 

Many are saying it is Johnny Depp. Some are saying is Elon Musk himself. Elon Musk and Amber Heard are past lovers and rumors are swirling that Elon Musk paid Amber Heard's 7 million donation to the ACLU back in 2016. So these two have a history together.

But no public statements have been made in this regard by either Elon Musk, Johnny Depp or Amber Heard. So no one knows for sure yet. In this video, we breakdown the story in detail. This celebrity drama goes down while the Johnny Depp Amber Heard civil court case rages on.

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are back on the frontlines of celebrity news. Amber Heard just had a baby girl and rumors are swirling on who the baby's father is. Many are saying it is Johnny Depp. But no public statements have been made in this regard by either Johnny Depp or Amber Heard. So no one knows for sure yet. In this video, we breakdown the story in detail. This celebrity drama goes down while the Johnny Depp Amber Heard civil court case rages on.  

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. snippet.title: Johnny Depp Wants Proof That Amber Heard's Divorce Settlement Was Donated
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp continues to claim that his ex-wife Amber Heard has not donated her $7 million divorce settlement to charity.  After the exes‚Äô finalized their split, Amber pledged to donate the entire settlement and split it between two charities, the ACLU and Children‚Äôs Hospital of Los Angeles. Now, the ‚ÄúPirates of the Caribbean‚Äù actor and his lawyer have filed papers asking both organizations to share how much Amber has donated. In the court papers Johnny quote ‚Äúrespectfully requests that this Court enter an order directing the ACLU Witnesses to fully comply with the Subpoenas." Amber‚Äôs legal team insist that the ‚ÄúAquaman‚Äù actress has done ‚Äúnothing dishonest‚Äù with her donations and that she ‚Äúpledged to pay over 10 years." They also said she has been ‚Äúdelayed in that goal‚Äù because she‚Äôs ‚Äúbeen forced to spend millions of dollars defending‚Äù herself amid Depp‚Äôs multiple lawsuits.

snippet.title: Audio Proof Johnny Depp did not Abuse Ex Wife Amber Heard. *She Admits It*
snippet.description:
Here's the audio where Amber Heard mocks Johnny Depp for calling for help while she was abusing him, she then loses her temper and fully admits to abusing him but proceeds to shame him again. 

Fans of movie star Johnny Depp have demanded their idol‚Äôs name be cleared, after his ex-wife Amber Heard apparently admitted to hitting and throwing objects at him in a leaked audio tape. Heard has accused Depp of domestic abuse.

In an audio confession leaked to the Daily Mail, Heard admits to hitting Depp with pans, pots and vases. The conversation took place during a therapy session in 2015, as the tinseltown pair attempted to save their tumultuous marriage.

‚ÄúI'm sorry that I didn't, uh, uh, hit you across the face in a proper slap, but I was hitting you, it was not punching you. Babe, you're not punched,‚Äù Heard tells Depp, attempting to explain a violent outburst the night before 

Typical abuser behavior. #JusticeForJohnnyDepp #TimesUp #MeToo #Abuse #AmberHeard

Watch the full 1 hour video here https://youtu.be/aca0KWoHtqQ



Share The Joy

snippet.title: Celebrities Reaction To Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Fight! (Video)
snippet.description:
Celebrities React To The Amber Heard and Johnny Depp Fight Video!

‚úÖ Like & Subscribe for more Celebrity Content!

The lawsuit against Johnny Depp has dragged on far too long. As Depp attempts to repair his reputation in the middle of all the charges leveled against him by his ex-wife Amber, despite several pieces of evidence pointing to Amber as the true abuser, she has yet managed to gain the support of the court and even Hollywood. snippet.title: 10 Celebrities Who Defended Johnny Depp AGAINST Amber Heard...
snippet.description:
10 Celebrities Who Defended Johnny Depp AGAINST Amber Heard...

We all are quite familiar with how marriages work in Hollywood. With just a handful of marriages that work out, the majority of the alliances end in despair and divorce. One notable and controversial divorce is the one between Amber and Depp. 

Though Amber is clearly in the wrong, Depp is the one who seems to be losing his battles at court. To prove Depp to be the victim, many have voiced their opinions in his defense. In today‚Äôs video, we‚Äôll be listing down the Top 10 Celebs who stood up for the injustice and defended Depp.

Jason Momoa is a name that is buzzing and has been buzzing in the world of showbiz for quite some time. In fact, when Aquaman was released earlier in the year 2018, he was the only talk of Hollywood! Following that, he was given the opportunity to play a variety of roles in different movies leaving us to wonder when we would see this heartthrob on the big screens again!

Due to Aquaman‚Äôs major success, soon after its release, the second sequel to the movie was announced to be premiered in the year 2022. Unfortunately, with the Me Too movement targeting so many A-listers, one of the cast members was accused of being a part of this bandwagon. Any guesses on who fell off the wagon and joined in amongst the list of abusers? Yes, it was Amber Heard!

Amber Heard has been making headlines regularly for almost 2 years now, especially after her divorce from Johnny Depp. Initially, people assumed her to be the poor victim in the chaotic scenario she had going on with Johnny Depp. At one point, we were pretty convinced that she was the victim after she posted her pictures of the scars that she had obtained due to being a victim of domestic violence. 
 
What were Amber‚Äôs claims?

Amber Heard proved to be the biggest victim of the year, with her constant rants on social media as well as her claiming Johnny Depp to be an evil man with anger issues. She kept throwing out lies until one day Depp was forced to sue her, hence causing the famous chaotic court case to make repeated headlines.

How did Ambers Claims backfire?
 
Johnny Depp was proven innocent to his ex-wife‚Äôs claims after a leaked conversation between the two was released, proving that in fact, it was Johnny Depp who was being victimized. This surely didn‚Äôt save the mess he was in but made the likes of big platforms such as Disney apologize to him for believing the allegations.

How did this news worsen?

The Me Too movement was trending and each day a new celeb was being called out for inappropriate behaviour of misconduct with the co-workers, especially the female ones. Due to this being embedded in the minds of all, Depp was the most likely candidate to get abuser-bashed for his immoral actions.

Due to her alleged accusations, Johnny Depp‚Äôs career was quite miserable. In fact, the production teams that loved working with his massive talent started to reject his role in the movies. And all this was due to the fault of Amber and her bunch of lies. Imagine not having Jack Sparrow in the next Pirates of the Caribbean sequel!

Was Momoa and Heard compatible in real life as much as they seemed on screen?

Rumor has it that the Momoa and Heard were not as compatible as they seemed on the screen. With them being actors from two different worlds, it is sure to be quite a clash in the studios. But others state that they were actually good together since they were complete opposites and that opposites attract. Even though they seem great together on the red carpet, always having fun, the truth behind this fact is still left unknown!

Would Momoa‚Äôs word and stance on this scenario change the fate of who plays the role of Mera?

Most probably, yes. Without Jason, there is no Aquaman. In fact, the entire success behind Aquaman was 90% due to Jason Momoa‚Äôs efforts in making the storyline as lively. Without him, reaching this milestone would have been highly impossible. On a serious note, it‚Äôs highly possible that rather than risking their biggest asset, Warner Bros. would not sacrifice their king for the sake of Amber! clevver news celebrity news amber heard aquaman 2 johnny depp elon musk amber heard fight video top 10

snippet.title: Amber Heard & Johnny Depp: The FULL Unedited, Uncut, Uninterrupted Audio / EXCLUSIVE
snippet.description:
Hi there! This video includes the full unedited, uncut, uninterrupted 2 hour recording made my Johnny Depp and Amber Heard during their marriage (September 2015). This recording is being used as evidence in the Johnny Depp v The Sun UK libel case. Depp decided to sue The Sun for publishing an article where they brand him a ‚Äòwife-beater‚Äô, for abusing his then wife, Amber Heard. 

When the cut-up/edited 46 minute version leaked in January by Depp‚Äôs team, it was made to portray a certain narrative and was used as propaganda. It was leaked 6 months before the trial began and used to lead people and potential jurors to believe that it was somehow an official piece of evidence, which it was not. It was incomplete.

If you‚Äôd like to read the official case documents, they can be found here: https://www.nickwallis.com/depp-trial

This recording was obtained through CourtTV and can be found here: https://www.courttv.com/news/amber-heard-witness-statements-depp-blamed-the-monster-for-physical-verbal-abuse/

Comments are disabled to combat abuse.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Gaslights Amber Heard / AUDIO
snippet.description:
This video is a clip which was excluded from the cut-up, edited and leaked recording by Johnny Depp‚Äôs team in January.  The full version was recorded by Johnny Depp and Amber Heard during their marriage (September 2015). The full recording is being used as evidence in the Johnny Depp v The Sun UK libel case. Depp decided to sue The Sun for publishing an article where they brand him a ‚Äòwife-beater‚Äô, for abusing his then wife, Amber Heard. 

When the cut-up/edited 46 minute version leaked in January by Depp‚Äôs team, it was made to portray a certain narrative and was used as propaganda. It was leaked 6 months before the trial began and used to lead people and potential jurors to believe that it was somehow an official piece of evidence, which it was not. It was incomplete.

If you‚Äôd like to read the official case documents, they can be found here: https://www.nickwallis.com/depp-trial

This recording was obtained through CourtTV and can be found here: https://www.courttv.com/news/amber-heard-witness-statements-depp-blamed-the-monster-for-physical-verbal-abuse/

You can listen to the FULL recording here: https://youtu.be/k9pbrBmHI58

Comments are disabled to combat abuse.

According to Amber Heard‚Äôs , Johnny Depp stateside 50 million defamation against Amber Heard should be dismissed. The UK judgment should be considered and regard should be given to the op-ed publications too, Depp did commit domestic violence against Heard repeatedly which resulted in Amber Heard threatened for her life and causing a huge trauma. 

This declares a supplemental plea. For the matter of , Johnny Depp cannot win on any of his claims, thereby Depp‚Äôs complaint against Heard should be dismissed as its whole.  This appeared in the Fairfax county docket in a filling on the 13th of April. 

Now, this matter has been brought forward from April 11, 2020, Amber Heard has apparently requested for the hearing which is to be held on the 28th of May, in front of Penney Azcarate. He was assigned the case by Chief judge Bruce White.

As Amber Heard was unsuccessful in shutting Johnny‚Äôs Depp‚Äôs suit in the past, this time she is trying to see far ahead with the new strategy. At the moment, Heard has nothing to lose and help her gain a sure-footed move in the US . 

Most of the factual information that was precluded cannot allow Johnny Depp to relitigate them. These statements cannot be claimed false either, nor can they be claimed actionable by Johnny Depp, this falls under the Virginia Defamation .  Therefore his claims are obstructed due to the and the plea filing states. 

In this case, both the cases were different, one was defamation and the other was a case. The main difference between the two is that of the written word and of the spoken word. When it comes to Amber Heard, she left no stone unturned to prove Johnny wrong, and that‚Äôs she has done both of them. She has also on many occasions spoken about Johnny and the domestic violence she faced because of him. 

One of the new pieces of evidence that were revealed later is the Bodycam footage from the cops that Amber Heard had called on Johnny Depp. This bodycam is from the rampage that occurred in May 2016. In the , many of Amber Heard‚Äôs allies and friends have given evidence from the incident. 

They said that Johnny Depp hurled a phone at her face and had also thrashed the penthouse‚Äôs kitchen. What Amber Heard‚Äôs have claimed to be depictions of the damage done by Johnny Depp are quite different from what the police had observed and addressed.

Amber Heard‚Äôs friends had dialed 9-1-1 mistakenly twice, the first cops to arrive have given some new depositions since the last month, claiming that they had seen no signs of vandalism, injuries, or crime scene. 

Johnny Depp‚Äôs attorney addressed this cover-up and countered Amber Heard‚Äôs allegation the night of the rampage, a chaotic, messy crime had been reported by Amber Heard and her allies although the LAPD‚Äôs bodycam proved the testimony wrong, he had stated. 

This leads us to another point which is that Amber Heard has made a lot of cover-ups. The rampage night was not the only cover-up by Amber Heard, she has exaggerated and on many occasions made false claims. 

The bodycam is the lead that tells us that Amber Heard has been provided by her team with all the stories.The UK case can be noted as having a few flawed logic in the verdict, the appeal had been denied partly, the reason being that Johnny‚Äôs team failed to present the evidence early. 

This incident has always been highlighted by Amber Heard and she has voiced her views on the same, saying that Johnny Depp was in a rage, beat her, and tore the house apart. When the police arrived, she didn‚Äôt look like she was assaulted nor did the house look ‚Äòtorn apart. 

The dismissal is a possibility however shocking it is, however, Depp‚Äôs team can go about it with the new set of evidence to fight the .  

Whenever the audience speculates and forms their opinions on the legal battle between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp that‚Äôs when a twist hits, this seems like a loop. 

The date for the main defamation date is in April 2022, this again leaves us on such an open note. If the two reach a mutual settlement, then we may see an abrupt end to the entire situation clevver news yellowflash 2 information overload adam waldman thatumbrellaguy

snippet.title: Judge LOSES IT After Amber Heard Tries to Get Case Dismissed For the THIRD TIME!
snippet.description:
Just when fans thought Amber Heard would finally stop all her unexpected stunts to try and get away with her wrongdoings during her marriage with legendary star Johnny Depp, she sinks even lower just recently, after trying to have her case with Johnny get dismissed again by the court, for the third time. But what did really go down over there? Are the Virginian judges actually considering this move by Amber‚Äôs legal team? Let‚Äôs find out in this video. But before anything else, make sure first to hit that subscribe button and smash that notification bell for more updates on this. So, let‚Äôs dive in! 

Being a celebrity is a tricky thing, as your personal relationships can become very public affairs. Amber Heard and Johnny Depp know this all too well, as the former couple is consistently making headlines due to their ongoing legal situation. Amber Heard and Johnny Depp have been duking it out in court for years, and are showing no signs of slowing down. It has been an excruciatingly long time since Johnny had filed a suit against Amber Heard‚Äôs team after his former wife wrote details about their previous and failed marriage in an Op Ed article at The Washington Post, which then ended Johnny‚Äôs chances of getting back on his most famous Disney film franchise, the Pirates of the Caribbean series, and basically ruined his entire career. Even though the article was not directly mentioning Johnny‚Äôs name in it, it was obviously pertaining to him as Amber said, detailed, and explained that she was physically maltreated, and in which she spoke about the treatment of women in cases such as hers. So, in March of 2019, the 57 year old actor took action and filed a lawsuit of $50 million against her, for things said over the aforementioned article in the Washington Post. The suit said that Amber "is not a product of domestic maltreatment, she is a perpetrator," and denied that Johnny ever hurt her physically. At the time, Depp's lawyer called the article an "overuse of the women empowerment movement". And instead, the suit said that her words were part of an "elaborate stunt to generate positive publicity" for the actress. And then of course the #NeverForget $7 million dollar‚Äôs worth of divorce settlement she got from her wealthy ex husband, Johnny, which she vowed to donate to charity but who knows what really happened to it now? A Virginian judge scolded Amber Heard for quote ‚Äúwasting the court‚Äôs time‚Äù. 

But anyway, after all these, you might think she's done. But nope, it seems like the end is a long way ahead yet for Amber‚Äôs eyes. For the second time a few months ago, Amber tried to have her case with Johnny dismissed, pulling out her ‚Äúhe lost the case with The Sun card‚Äù, which was honestly a little low. Not cool, Amber. You may remember that before this lawsuit with Amber, Johnny had already fought for a lawsuit against new publisher The Sun, after the company called him a very bad name. 

 And after that, she then surprised the whole world with her own baby! It was born out of surrogate, and yes, no one knows who the father is, but it may actually be an important twist in the hearings to come. For the third time! Wow, being inside Amber Heard‚Äôs head might be tough. 

This latest update comes to us from Court House News, which revealed how the proceedings in court went down yesterday. One of Amber Heard‚Äôs lawyers attempted to use the verdict in the U.K. as an indication that she shouldn‚Äôt be hit with a lawsuit. Obviously Depp‚Äôs team has clapped back, so it remains to be seen if the third attempt for the case to be dismissed is successful. According to the CourtHouse News, ‚ÄúAn attorney for actress Amber Heard on Thursday asked a Virginia judge to embrace findings from a U.K. court that Johnny Depp, Heard's ex husband.

Johnny‚Äôs lawyers have challenged back, once again, stating that the cases cannot be connected. Depp's lawyer, Ben Chew of Brown Rudnick, characterized the motion for dismissal as futile and frivolous. However, after trying to dismiss her lawsuit one too many times, Ben Chow also called out for Amber Heard's legal team to halt before Johnny asks them to be abided by law, pushing for Heard and her team to receive consequences for their repeated claims in court. 

What upsets most fans is the fact that Amber will still star alongside Jason Momoa in the latest DCEU installment of Aquaman, despite many supporters‚Äô request for Warner Brothers to do otherwise.

What about you? Will you be watching Aquaman 2? Do you think it's fair for Johnny‚Äôs famous case to be dismissed because of the lost libel case years ago in a different continent?  See you next time!

Related videos:
Depp WINS BIG as FANTASTIC BEASTS FAILS! Warner's RUNNING SCARED!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OrK7O1ES-gs

Heard BEGS the COURT to STOP as even the MEDIA BACKS DEPP?!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3YHmbJEvn40

snippet.title: Amber Heard says it was ‚Äòincredibly painful‚Äô to relive Johnny Depp break-up in bombshell trial
snippet.description:
Amber Heard today said it was "incredibly painful" to relieve the "traumatic" details of her split with Johnny Depp at the end of the explosive three-week trial.

The Aquaman star, 34, read a statement outside the High Court where she has accused Depp, 57, of attacking her 14 times over three years.

Wearing a black skirt and top, Heard said she just "wanted to move on with my life" and described her pain at the "traumatic and intimate details" of her life being "broadcast to the entire world". 

The actress also said she stands by her testimony as she thanked her legal team, police and the "outpouring" of support from around the world.

It comes after Depp earlier gave out handwritten notes thanking fans for supporting him during the high-profile case.

The brown envelopes contained a black and white bandana similar to the one he has been sporting during the case.

Read more
Emotional Amber Heard says it was ‚Äòincredibly painful‚Äô to relive Johnny Depp break-up in bombshell trial
https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/uknews/12243271/amber-heard-court-final-day-trial-johnny-depp/

snippet.title: "We Were Wrong" Disney Rehires Johnny Depp After Beating Amber Heard!
snippet.description:
Disney Publicly Apologized And Rehires Johnny Depp After Winning The Lawsuit Against Amber Heard!

As the seas are starting to calm down after the dubious Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard trial from 2020, it is now clear to see that Johnny Depp was the victim and big studios are reportedly interested in the actor once again. Disney might have just rehired Johnny Depp to return as Jack Sparrow in Pirates of the Caribbean 6 movie. It is alleged that Walt Disney is standing firmly behind Johnny Depp in his legal battle against his ex-wife Amber Heard despite the company distancing themselves from the actor last year and ‚Äúblocking him‚Äù from returning as a cameo in The Pirates of The Caribbean reboot starring none other than Margot Robbie. But is Johnny actually going to be rehired, or is it all just speculation? And will Johnny's life be back to normal once the whole Amber Heard lawsuit blows over or will this be stuck on him and affect his career until he retires?

In this video, we are going to talk about Johnny Depp and Amber Heard, who have been on each other‚Äôs throats ever since they split up and how Amber Heard might be facing jail time for one mistake she made in all this.

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. snippet.title: Johnny Depp Reacts To Amber Heard Being In Aquaman 2
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp Reacts To Amber Heard Being In Aquaman 2

Amber Heard has been giving a sneak peek of her prep for Aquaman 2 for a while now. The actress has been intensively training for her revival as Mera.
She‚Äôs gotten back on sets today for the shoot but the news hasn‚Äôt gone down well with Johnny Depp and his fans. However, Twitter is witnessing #JusticeForJohnnyDepp trending with over 10K tweets in a few minutes after her revival was announced.

Johnny Depp's fans are trending #JusticeforJohnnyDepp as they are expressing anger over the same studio that fired the actor and is continuing to employ Amber Heard. Johnny, who was expected to return as Gellert Grindelwald in Fantastic Beasts 3, sadly came under scrutiny recently during his highly publicised divorce from Amber Heard. Johnny was accused of domestic abuse. Although he denied the allegation, he lost a high profile case against a newspaper who dubbed him as a wife beater. Due to allegations against him, Warner Bros asked him to step down from the role as Grindelwald in The Fantastic Beasts franchise. Johnny lost another most prominent role as Captain Jack Sparrow in Disney's Pirates of the Caribbean. On the other hand, Amber Heard began filming for Aquaman 2. Now Johnny's fans have expressed anger over the same and want justice to be served for the actor. The online hate for Amber Heard‚Äôs removal from Aquaman 2 is largely based on various unproven allegations that have been levelled against her over the years. Johnny's lawyers had also accused the actress of a calculated and manipulative lie.

snippet.title: Amber Heard's 2016 Deposition Against Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
A clip of a 2016 deposition with Amber Heard was played in court during the libel case between Johnny Depp and publishers of The Sun newspaper for an article that labelled him a "wife beater".

In the clip, Heard speaks about an incident with Depp when police were called to her home and she said in the video: "They said I looked hurt."

Depp strongly denies abusing Heard, was at the court to hear his ex-wife's evidence.

Report by Lucy Jones

#JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard #JohnnyDeppCourtCase

One of the biggest Hollywood debacles going on right now is the rather ugly
divorce proceedings between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard. Still, it is pretty

considers her as a liar and now her father has been accused of threatening to
shoot Johnny Depp. How far can Amber Heard go for the money? And is it true
that her father was ab*sive towards her when she was a kid?
Make sure you stay till the end to figure out the real reason for Amber Heard‚Äôs
father wanting to kill Johnny Depp.
But before we start with Amber Heard‚Äôs father threatens to kill Johnny Depp,
let‚Äôs got back to 2020 to see the whole picture which shows that being agressive
and violent towards people is not something which happens for the first time in
Amber Heard‚Äôs family. Back in 2020 the actress revealed to a UK court that she
previously witnessed violence at home growing up and said that Johnny Depp
‚Äúmakes dad look like a saint when he falls off the wagon‚Äù.
Amber Heard told the court that her father, David, ‚Äústruggled with alcohol and
drug abuse issues his whole life.‚Äù ‚ÄúHe is an addict and an alcoholic and he was
very violent but I love him very much,‚Äù she said.
Amber Heard said she reached out to her mom after one of Johnny Depp‚Äôs
alleged benders in March 2015 because she wanted ‚Äúsomeone to talk to who
might understand first hand how it was.‚Äù
‚ÄúMy father was violent to my mother growing up,‚Äù Amber Heard told the court.
‚ÄúThey loved each other but he was very violent to her until the end ... she
passed away.‚Äù
Amber Heard told her mom the ‚ÄúPirates of the Caribbean‚Äù actor was a
‚Äúmadman‚Äù - but insisted he was not physically abusive with her. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs ok mom.
He‚Äôs not being violent with me. He‚Äôs just even raging in general,‚Äù she wrote.
The actress, however, denied in court that she was being truthful with her
mother, saying she ‚Äújust didn‚Äôt want her to tell my dad.‚Äù

‚ÄúI felt safe to tell my mother, but I didn‚Äôt know how my dad would react,‚Äù she
said. ‚ÄúI had never been in this situation before and I didn‚Äôt know if he would
react violently ... to Johnny.‚Äù And now. Here we are. It seems like Amber

made accusations that Johnny Depp was ruining his daughter‚Äôs career. Amber‚Äôs
father said about Johnny: ‚ÄúThat f**ing piece of s**t is f**ing me too because
I‚Äôm supposed to get 10% of the money and without it I can‚Äôt produce the movie
I was gunna make!...He is ruining my baby girl‚Äôs career and blackballing her in
Hollywood‚Äù. Seems like the money is the biggest reason for the Heards to
attack Johnny Depp back and forth. The threat only seemed to escalate further
when guns were brought into the conversation, with David saying: ‚ÄúAnd when I
get to him I‚Äôm going to beat the s**t out of him...I‚Äôm from Texas, and men
from Texas carry 45‚Äôs and Johnny is going to meet the f**ing end of mine!‚Äù
So, what was going on there and who was the witness? According to the report,
David Killackey, the owner of Performance Allison Transmissions who worked
on both Amber and Johnny‚Äòs classic cars, claimed that Amber became abusive
towards him and that her father made ‚Äúdeath threats‚Äù towards Johnny in a phone
call.
...
And now I want to know your opinion. What do you think about Amber and her

snippet.title: "Shut Your Mouth!" Judge Silences Amber Heard In Court!
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Is Silenced And Warned In Court For Her Inappropriate Behavior Towards Johnny And The Judge!

‚úÖ Subscribe & HIT that notification bell for more Celebrity Content!

From being Hollywood‚Äôs favorite couple to being one of the worst and most toxic couples to be in the spotlight, Amber Heard and Johnny Depp have been on the front page of news outlets for years now after Amber filed for divorce claiming Johnny was an abuser. What started as a romantic and cute relationship quickly turned violent and messy. But now 5 years after the initial divorce announcement, the couple is still in ongoing court battles and lawsuits even though the original divorce was actually concluded.

However recently, just a few weeks prior to their next defamation case court hearing, many things have started to come to light and there have been lots of changes in the situation. Which includes a massive win for Johnny Depp, apart from the most recent one where bodycam footage confirmed Amber was lying. This time it seems the Virginia judge who handles their case has had enough of Amber‚Äôs lies and doesn‚Äôt want to hear a single more. But what happened for her to reach this point? 

#AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp

Amber and Johnny got married on February 3, 2015, Amber filed for divorce on May 23, 2016, and the divorce was finalized on January 13, 2017. snippet.title: Johnny Depp Thanks Wife Amber Heard For Putting Up With Him | Palm Springs Film Festival 2016
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp admitted that he was just going to "wing it" when he took the stage at the Palm Springs International Film Festival's gala ceremony on Saturday night. The superstar snagged the Desert Palm Achievement Award for Actor for his portrayal of gangster Whitey Bulger in Black Mass, and though he said he's "not good" at giving speeches, he had some heartfelt words for the movie's director ‚Äî and his wife, Amber Heard.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Abuse Claims (and the lies not talked about)
snippet.description:
#johnnydepp #amberheard #metoo

NOTE: Sorry for the low audio volume.  You might have to crank up the volume.

Hey everyone!  This is the first video I've ever made for YouTube so I know the quality isn't the best, but I feel the content is solid.

Oddly enough, this video doesn't, directly, have much to do with Johnny Depp and Amber Heard, but rather a friend and witness of Ambers.  Basically, I wanted to share information that isn't really being talked about.  Yet, it seems like important information.

I'm not trying to sway anyone's opinion.  I know minds are mostly made up at this point, but figured everyone would at least like to be operating with the most information possible.

This video uses a lot of facts to back up what is, ultimately, my opinion.  Thanks for watching!

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard: 5 Times When Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us 

APOLOGY VIDEO
When Amber Heard smuggled their two pet dogs to Australia, which goes against the country‚Äôs laws- the pair came out with an apology video to address the situation. But, to a lot of people the video seemed weird. Although it was Heard herself who did the activity, Depp appeared to be quite off in the video and some even remarked that it looked like he was being forced to show up in front of the camera. We will let you be the judge of it.

PREMIERE OF ALICE THROUGH THE LOOKING GLASS
In 2016, when Johnny and Amber‚Äôs divorce were in the works, he attended a movie premiere at London. When asked if he had any message for his fans, Depp said some lines that sounded extremely weird and even funny to his fans and the audience. However, when we look back now- the message seems almost cryptic, as if he was trying to ask for help. Watch the interview for yourself.

snippet.title: Amber Heard and Johnny Depp laugh and joke on Thanksgiving 2015
snippet.description:
Ms Heard alleges that Mr Depp also¬†ripped her shirt and left her with a 'busted' lip and a¬†'lump' on the back of her head on Thanksgiving in November 2015. Today two videos were played in court from the holiday weekend where people can be heard talking excitedly and laughing with Heard and Depp, who filmed the group enjoying themselves. When asked by Eleanor Laws, Mr Depp's QC,  to explain the footage, which showed no violence taking place, Heard replied: 'Our fights never happened in front of the family. They typically happened after everyone had gone to bed.' Ms Laws alleged that Heard was lying about the entire incident and said: 'You are making up this up as you go along'. Not all the faces of those in the darkened video are visible, but Heard can be seen picking up a drink and revealed that she could tell that Marilyn Manson was present after recognising his fingernails.¬† She also told the court that others present were her friend Rocky Pennington, Depp and his son Jack, Heard's father David and Erin Boerum, Heard's nurse and friend. Amber has claimed that her megastar ex-husband would blame his 'alter ego' called 'the monster' for the alleged violence while intoxicated with copious amounts of drink and drugs. In the film Depp can be heard joking with Jack Depp about a monster being in the room while Amber exclaims to a guest: 'What are you doing? Get away get away'.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Reacts to The Court STOPPED Listening To Her‚Ä¶
snippet.description:
Judge Stops Listening To Amber Heard - (Johnny Depp Amber Heard Lawsuit)
The ongoing court case/war between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp is very much at a standstill for various reasons. Not the least of which is that the main case is now taking place in Virginia and the pandemic backed up so many cases that theirs went from being done in April this year to being in May NEXT year!  So yeah, we got a bit of a wait in front of us. But for Amber Heard, she's been working hard in the last month to try and get things sped up and the judge isn't having it. Allow us to break it down for. Be sure to like the video and subscribe to the channel!

And there you have it, everyone! A look at the latest updates in the case between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard and whether anything is going anywhere anytime soon. snippet.title: Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Abuse Claims: Questions you should be asking (Part 1)
snippet.description:
Part 2:  https://youtu.be/0G22UXfpm9s
#johnnydepp #amberheard #metoo

Hey everyone!  Welcome to my channel.  If you've been here before, welcome back and thanks for stopping by.

Note: I am aware that Johnny is now suing Amber for defamation.  That news broke as I was constructing this video.  However, I still feel this video contains some very important information, maybe now more than ever.

This is Part 1 of a video focusing mainly on the night of May 21st, 2016.  I should be finishing Part 2 in the next few days, so please be patient.  This has taken longer than I anticipated.

These videos (part 1 and 2) will play like one large video when watched back to back.  So until part 2 is uploaded, please try to not jump ahead with any reckless speculation.  Whereas part 1 exposes some lies and inconsistencies in stories told, part 2 really brings it all full circle and will expose (what I believe to be) some really big lies.  So again, patience.

This video may come off as a little more speculative.  For that, I apologize.  However, like always, it is all rooted and backed by plenty of research and facts.

Thanks for watching!

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Goes Off on Amber Heard... Hurls Wine Glass | TMZ
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp went crazy on Amber Heard in their kitchen, throwing a wine bottle and glass ... and she videotaped it. 
We're told the video was shot months before the May 21 incident in which Amber claims Johnny struck her.
Amber asks Johnny if he drank a bottle of wine and tries to calm him down. She says she was sorry for something although she was not specific.   
Johnny isn't having it, and appears out of control. After throwing the glass and bottle, you see him swiping at Amber's phone ... trying to get it from her.

Full Story: http://www.tmz.com/2016/08/12/johnny-depp-amber-heard-throws-wine-glass-domestic-violence-video/

Amber Heard is an American actress, a blonde with a classic Hollywood appearance, who became famous not only for her roles, but also for her daring character. This beauty with blue eyes managed the impossible - to marry Johnny Depp, and then scandalously divorce him. Next, we will tell you how Amber Heard lives and how she cheated on Johnny Depp. 

#AmberHeard#JohnnyDepp#cheated#Aquaman#AquamanMera#

snippet.title: Amber Heard & Johnny Depp: The Real ABUSER FINALLY REVEALED!! (UNCENSORED AUDIO!) #JUSTICEFORJOHNNY
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard: Australian biosecurity
snippet.description:
Australia has very strict biosecurity laws to protect the health of our people, animals and plants. Everyone entering the country must truthfully declare if they are carrying any items listed on the Incoming Passenger Card.

Ms Amber Heard appeared in the Southport Magistrates Court in Queensland on 18 April 2016 to answer charges alleging the illegal importation of her two dogs into Australia in April 2015.

Ms Heard pleaded guilty to one count of producing a false document (her Incoming Passenger Card).

Ms Heard also offered to publicly state her contrition with the support of her husband ‚Äì this video is that statement.

Captions courtesy of Michael and Lyn Lockrey.

snippet.title: Amber Heard is Innocent - Domestic Violence with Johnny Depp (Documentary)
snippet.description:
Amber Heard is Innocent (Documentary) in domestic abuse with Johnny Depp. We would stop and prevent violence against women, including with technology and social media. 
As seen, Amber Heard was and is still abused by her ex-husband and his followers.

Sign to Support Amber as Mera in Aquaman 2!
See her Positive Background of Humanitarian Work, Activism, and Leadership here: https://www.change.org/p/amber-heard-supporters-we-support-amber-heard-in-aquaman-2

Despite her strong evidence, humanitarianism, charity, and leadership, she is questioned online by incited hate and a "Wild West" online cyberspace.

If you see something, do something!
This is a road map of Amber's innocence in her case. For example, her arguing, speaking up, or yelling led to 3 physical fights as retaliation by JD against her in the 1 1/2-2 months before audio leak 1.

We support Amber Heard! Interfere online! Recently L'Oreal which supports Amber Heard endorsed Hollaback's mission to stop harassment. We think technology should be used to help people, and false information and hate is harmful.

Amber Heard wrote in the Washington Post about how she had to change her phone number weekly due to death threats from Depp fans and how she supports rights: "Amber Heard: I spoke up against sexual violence ‚Äî and faced our culture‚Äôs wrath. That has to change.": https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/ive-seen-how-institutions-protect-men-accused-of-abuse-heres-what-we-can-do/2018/12/18/71fd876a-02ed-11e9-b5df-5d3874f1ac36_story.html

Amber showed photos and detailed descriptions of violence from Depp in her dismissal: https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/5835867-Amber-Heard-Motion-to-Dismiss.html

IO Tillett witnessed blood on a pillow and was the first to call 911 to protect Amber from her husband: https://www.latimes.com/entertainment/gossip/la-et-mg-amber-heard-io-tillett-911-call-20160608-snap-story.html

More Evidence on Her Side:
Coercion of and led witnesses by Adam Waldman: https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/6811708-Laura.html

Some of this Video's Sources:
JD: "Beat the F* out of them" Red Carpet News: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpRtMU4v00M
Amber Heard Opens Up for PSA by NowThis: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6SMtB2Tampw
JD's texts read in UK court: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5U8BReZwOcg
AH's Side of Audio 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WX27126jVLQ
AH's Side of Audio 1: https://youtu.be/ibiPJvTTMXA
Released Videos of Amber describing violence: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8apBIc1Doc4_tg7oln5NrQ/search?query=amber+heard
Video with JD kicking and smashing kitchen: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H1oOXLt4r1k
United Nations Human Rights Champion: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K-gbjnRnkug
AH at United Nations Social Good Summit: https://youtu.be/2YVF841hxhQ
AH at One Young World Summit: https://youtu.be/G-J-meIboCo
AH Economist Interview: https://youtu.be/vOOwz_6l88E
AH with Richard Dawkins: https://youtu.be/_lG8cpUq7RQ

More Causes Amber Heard Supports:
Free Businesswoman Marsha Lazareva with the UN: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZBI0oc80p3g
World Identity Network for Togetherband on SDG16 with UN: https://youtu.be/70XVyFd6TlY

Although the New York Times and Washington Post support Amber Heard, as well as do other legitimate sources, it's a fight against cyber violence in the "Wild West" online space.

How Technology Companies Refuse to Make Policies to Stop Violence Against Women:
https://www.genderit.org/sites/default/files/flow_corporate_policies_formatted_final_1.pdf
Social Media Companies Are Not Removing Hate or Trolls:
Anti-Defamation League - https://www.adl.org/trollsharassment

Why Hate Campaigns Online are Not Valid and Dangerous for People:
Logan Lynn and sexuality equality/LGBT forced off social media because of hate - https://toplevel.design/blog/2020/2/8/rejecting-the-status-quo
Journalism has been reduced. Hate via social media and false news has increased: https://openmarketsinstitute.org/op-eds-and-articles/tech-companies-destroying-democracy-free-press/

Men's Rights Reddit immediately promoted the hate campaign against Amber Heard, and it is listed as a hate group by Southern Poverty Law Center: https://www.splcenter.org/fighting-hate/intelligence-report/2012/misogyny-sites

Amber Heard is a public figure taking numerous stances and alliances that put her into the crossfire of hate, not only about Women's Rights, but also sexuality, journalism, United Nations, politics, international relations, stopping cyberabuse with SHIELD Act, supporting other business leaders, and most of all, the entertainment industry where groups know it's highly influential to speak up.

We Stand by Amber Heard!

#AmberHeard #StopDomesticViolence #Aquaman #UnitedNations #NotABystander #ACLU #Film #DomesticAbuse #Journalism #Journalist #Hollywood #WomensRights #Politics #EndVAW #MakeADifference #Charity #Philanthropy #Nonprofits #ElonMusk #Tesla #Mera #Leadership #Reporter #News #BeTheChange #Movie #Motivational

Men's Rights Reddit immediately promoted the hate campaign against Amber Heard, and it is listed as a hate group by Southern Poverty Law Center: https://www.splcenter.org/fighting-hate/intelligence-report/2012/misogyny-sites

Amber Heard is a public figure taking numerous stances and alliances that put her into the crossfire of hate, not only about Women's Rights, but also sexuality, journalism, United Nations, politics, international relations, stopping cyberabuse with SHIELD Act, supporting other business leaders, and most of all, the entertainment industry where groups know it's highly influential to speak up.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Abuse Claims:  Amber Admits to Multiple Violent Attacks!
snippet.description:
#johnnydepp #amberheard #metoo #timesup

Hey everyone!  Welcome back!  Or if you're here for the first time, I welcome you just the same!

This is a pretty straight forward video, not so much the analytical breakdowns I usually do.  Although there is a little bit of that in this one as well.

This video is exactly what the title states.  Amber Heard, during her 2016 deposition, admitted to multiple violent assaults against Johnny Depp.  Admissions she was probably hoping would never see the light of day.  I use official court sworn transcriptions of her own words, so there leaves no doubt.

This video will be referenced in my future videos, so if you plan to watch any of those, please give this one a watch as well.  Future videos will be breaking down individual moments of alleged abuse (some of which link directly to her admissions here) and will include evidence, witness testimony, and anything else that helps us get closer to the truth.

My previous videos and Twitter handle will be linked below.  When I'm active making videos, I'm not as active on Twitter and vice versa.

Thanks for checking this one out!  I really appreciate it.  Feel free to like and share.  Take care!

snippet.title: Johnny Depp About To Win Against Amber Heard Because of This?!
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp About To Win Against Amber Heard Because of This?!

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

Johnny Depp WINS Against Amber Heard In Defamation Case...!!!?

https://youtu.be/vNCZ8Zy7J5U

Huge Win For Johnny Depp | Truth Always Wins

https://youtu.be/QSWHT8p62lQ

Amber Heard Friends Testify AGAINST Her & Side With Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/IfZzdVZrPuI

Celebs divorces are box-office gold for the media, so the legal fight between
movie stars Johnny Depp and Amber Heard lasts for 5 years already. So far, the
trial has featured testimony about: violent, shrieking rows. Massive
consumption of drugs and drink. Wild punches and trashed rooms, lopped off
fingertip, and many other things. But is it true that Johnny Depp is so close to
defeating Amber Heard in a defamation case?
Make sure you stay till the end to know Johnny Depp's odds of winning the
case.
The fact that Johnny Depp recently failed to secure an appeal in the ‚Äúwife
beater‚Äù verdict against him in Britain is causing consequences on his other legal
battles in the US. Amber Heard's lawyers state that Johnny Depp's Stateside $50
million defamation lawsuit against Amber Heard should be dismissed.
Amber Heard's legal team (Heard and Charlson Bredehoft Cohen & Brown, PC
and Woods Rogers PC attorneys) declares a supplemental plea in bar, stating:
‚ÄúGiving full effect to the UK Judgments necessitates a finding that statements in
the op-ed published in the Washington Post are true ‚Äì Mr. Depp committed
domestic violence against Ms. Heard on many occasions, causing her to fear for
her life.‚Äù ‚ÄúTherefore, as a matter of law, Depp cannot prevail on any of his
claims, and Depp‚Äôs Complaint against Ms. Heard should be dismissed in its
entirety,‚Äù adds the April 13 filing that recently appeared on the Fairfax County
docket.
As the more than two-year-old matter crawls toward its new-ish April 11, 2022,
trial start date, Amber Heard has requested a May 28 hearing on her plea filing
in front of Judge Penney Azcarate, who was assigned to the case last month by
Chief Judge Bruce White.
Amber Heard's failed plan to destroy Johnny Depp in the past probably made
her try some new ideas. Now she is looking far ahead with a new strategy,
probably will help her gain a sure-footed move in the US court. The actress
seems to be absolutely desperate as she‚Äôs got nothing to lose. She has already

made so many mistakes and lied several times (and almost every time she was
caught lying). But what if her plan can actually work?
Because for now, it seems like her legal team is a little bit pushing. According to
all the testimony and evidence presented at that trial and Justice Nicol‚Äôs decree,
Amber Heard‚Äôs team believes once again that the March 2019-filed Virginia suit
should be DOA. ‚ÄúDepp cannot relitigate these factual issues, and as a result of
their preclusion, he cannot claim that the statements are false and ‚Äòactionable‚Äô
under Virginia defamation law, so his claims are barred as a matter of law,‚Äù the
plea filing states.
...
The court date for the main defamation date is in April 2022 and we will make
sure to be the first ones to deliver the latest news to you. Thanks for watching
this video and don‚Äôt forget to hit that subscribe button.

Consider subscribing to not miss out on what's trending today in the life of the world's biggest stars.

snippet.title: 10 Times Johnny Depp Warned Us About Amber Heard
snippet.description:
10 Times Johnny Depp Warned Us About Amber Heard

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

10 Times Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us About Amber Heard

https://youtu.be/jQTD2pDwoz4

10 MORE Times Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us About AH!!!

https://youtu.be/J1UXydaYri4

Top 10 Celebrities Who Tried To Warn Us About Amber Heard

https://youtu.be/OFO6sMJGjHc

Few celebrity breakups are as controversial as the ever-unfolding drama between Johnny
Depp and Amber Heard. Most people I know are either ‚ÄúTeam Johnny‚Äù or ‚ÄúTeam Amber,‚Äù
and they‚Äôve spent a lot of time discussing who the real abuser in the troubled relationship
must have been. However, Johnny Depp was trying to warn everyone about Amber Heard
and who she is for real.
Over the past several months, we‚Äôve heard from Depp‚Äôs friends, fans, and exes who all claim
he could have never mistreated Amber because of his sweet and gentle nature. And there
have been many doubts cast upon Heard, leading people to think she‚Äôs the core abuser, a
narcissistic gold digger, and ultimately, a liar. Adding to this we have Johnny Depp‚Äôs hints
and attempts to tell the truth about his ex wife.
Amber Heard is not an obvious abuser
We like to imagine that the real abuser is always some sort of obvious monster, and that
we‚Äôre not going to be manipulated by any wolves in sheep‚Äôs clothing. Do you remember that
‚Äòmessage‚Äô to Johnny Depp‚Äôs fans when he was ‚Äòjokingly‚Äô saying: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm scared to death, I‚Äôm
frightened and I don‚Äôt know what to do, I am confused and I want to go home‚Äù. This phrase
made everyone laugh but what if it was Johnny‚Äôs cry for help? He couldn‚Äôt tell anyone what
was going on between him and Amber Heard (before the legal fight) as he is a good person
and he didn‚Äôt want to show people their dirty laundry.
Amber Heard pretended to be a victim
The myth of the obvious abuser was very convenient for Amber Heard and of course
eventually it did more harm than good, even for Amber. People easily wind up defending
their guilty friends and blaming the victims. We might mistake self-defense and coping
mechanisms by victims as "proof" of their crimes. Victims of domestic violence may even
use violence themselves against their abusers, and it can be very difficult for outsiders to
establish which person is the primary abuser and which person is the primary victim. Johnny
Depp was trying to warn everyone she was a liar but he couldn‚Äôt prove he wasn‚Äôt guilty.
Amber Heard had a strong tactic - to lie in a court. But eventually body language experts
analysed the video back in 2016 court deposition. First everyone thought Amber Heard
behaved really weird because she was stressed and scared. But according to body
language experts, she just behaved like a typical liar.
Severed Finger
Being a real man Johnny Depp didn‚Äôt tell anyone what happened with his finger for real and
was even trying to hide the facts and lied to his friends about the incident! Obviously, he
wanted to protect Amber Heard. During the Venice Film Festival 2015 conference Dakota
Johnson obviously asked Johnny Depp about his finger, Johnny answered vaguely, he
avoided the question with the joke but it seems Dakota didn‚Äôt believe him. She knew:
something was wrong. Just notice, Dakota gave him a look that says that she knows more
than he lets on.

Amber Heard made him lie for her
You may remember the story about Amber Heard‚Äôs dogs and that she had some problems
with them. In July 2015 Amber Heard brought Yorkshire terriers Pistol and Boo to the
country illegally. And to avoid problems Amber Heard asked her former employee Kevin
Murphy to lie under oath after she was charged with bringing her two dogs to Australia
illegally. Murphy claimed Heard pressured him to commit perjury about the travelling terriers
or risk losing his job. ‚ÄúShe wanted me to say essentially that it was my fault in one way or
another that the paperwork wasn‚Äôt completed, so that I could take the blame for her,‚Äù Murphy
said. And of course, she asked Johnny Depp to help with this problem. Isn‚Äôt it a warning sign
of ab**se? But probably Johnny Depp had to go along with everything Amber wanted
because he truly loved her. But she literally forced Johnny to help her with the problem and
he got in trouble as a result.
