Johnny Depp Can WIN Amber Heard COURT CASE AFTER THIS BIG REVEAL | The Gossipy

To say the Amber Heard Johnny Depp Court case has been ruthless, scandalous, and bitter would an understatement. Johnny Depp has been fired from big roles. Amber Heard has been fired from big roles too. But the court battle rolls. New evidence and documents are being brought up all the time now. Today we have update on new crucial evidence. We break it down in the video. Let's get into it.

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

snippet.title: "AMBER HAS GONE CRAZY" Amber Heard Thinks SHE IS THE DAD Of Her Newborn Baby | Celebrity Craze
snippet.description:
"AMBER HAS GONE CRAZY" Amber Heard Thinks SHE IS THE DAD Of Her Newborn Baby | Celebrity Craze

Can Amber Heard do anything out of the kindness of her own heart? I guess not. Amber Heard is clearly up to her schemes again. Even when it comes to her newborn daughter. A daughter who maybe might have Elon Musk or Johnny Depp as the father.

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are back on the frontlines of celebrity news. Amber Heard just had a baby girl and rumors are swirling on who the baby's father is. Many are saying it is Johnny Depp. But no public statements have been made in this regard by either Johnny Depp or Amber Heard. So no one knows for sure yet. In this video, we breakdown the story in detail. This celebrity drama goes down while the Johnny Depp Amber Heard civil court case rages on.  

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

#JohnnyIsTheFather #AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #JusticeForJohnny
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

snippet.title: Johnny Depp & Amber Heard apologise for illegally bringing dogs to Australia
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard apologised for bringing their dogs in to Australia and affirmed the importance of the country‚Äôs biosecurity in a video posted to the Facebook page of the Deputy Prime Minister of Australia, Barnaby Joyce.

Depp and Heard appeared in a Gold Coast court on Monday, April 18, where Heard pleaded guilty to falsifying quarantine documents before flying their two Yorkshire terriers, Pistol and Boo, into Australia on their private jet in April 2015, to visit Depp while he was filming Pirates of the Caribbean. Heard received a one month good behaviour bond without conviction.

snippet.localized.title: Johnny Depp & Amber Heard apologise for illegally bringing dogs to Australia
snippet.localized.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard apologised for bringing their dogs in to Australia and affirmed the importance of the country‚Äôs biosecurity in a video posted to the Facebook page of the Deputy Prime Minister of Australia, Barnaby Joyce.

Depp and Heard appeared in a Gold Coast court on Monday, April 18, where Heard pleaded guilty to falsifying quarantine documents before flying their two Yorkshire terriers, Pistol and Boo, into Australia on their private jet in April 2015, to visit Depp while he was filming Pirates of the Caribbean. Heard received a one month good behaviour bond without conviction.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Had ELON MUSK'S BABY - SHOCKING PROOF Johnny Depp WAS RIGHT | The Gossipy
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Had ELON MUSK'S BABY - SHOCKING PROOF Johnny Depp WAS RIGHT | The Gossipy

Elon Musk just keeps getting dragged back into the Johnny Depp Amber Heard celeb drama. Elon Musk, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are back on the frontlines of celebrity news. Amber Heard just had a baby girl and rumors are swirling on who the baby's father is. 

Many are saying it is Johnny Depp. Some are saying is Elon Musk himself. Elon Musk and Amber Heard are past lovers and rumors are swirling that Elon Musk paid Amber Heard's 7 million donation to the ACLU back in 2016. So these two have a history together.

But no public statements have been made in this regard by either Elon Musk, Johnny Depp or Amber Heard. So no one knows for sure yet. In this video, we breakdown the story in detail. This celebrity drama goes down while the Johnny Depp Amber Heard civil court case rages on.

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

#AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #JusticeForJohnny

snippet.title: Judge sides with Johnny Depp ACLU must reveal if Amber Heard donated $7M
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp has notched a victory in his lengthy legal battle against ex-wife Amber Heard. A New York judge has partially granted a petition from the "Pirates of the Caribbean" star to determine if Heard donated the entirety of her $7 million divorce settlement to the American Civil Liberties Union and to Children's Hospital Los Angeles, as she pledged. As a result of the ruling, the ACLU must release documents that confirm whether or not Heard followed through on the donation promise, which has become a point of contention in the former couple's legal saga.‚ÄúMr. Depp is most gratified by the Court‚Äôs decision," Depp's attorney Benjamin Chew said in a statement to USA TODAY. USA TODAY has reached out to Heard's attorney and to the ACLU for comment. In November, Depp lost a libel lawsuit in London against the publisher of The Sun tabloid, which had labeled him a "wife beater" in a 2018 headline after Heard accused him of abuse in Los Angeles in 2016 as they were ending their short, volatile marriage. The case pitted Depp against a powerful tabloid and its editor, with Heard as their star witness. In March, Depp was refused an appeal after his lawyer Andrew Caldecott argued that Heard's donation pledge was a ‚Äúcalculated and manipulative lie" that "tipped the scales against Mr. Depp from the very beginning."Caldecott also alleged one of Heard's intended charitable beneficiaries, Children's Hospital Los Angeles, wrote to Depp's business adviser in 2019 saying Heard had not made any payments. Lawyers for The Sun's publisher rejected the arguments in court in March, saying Heard did not lie about the donations because she was pledging to pay the sums over 10 years. She had made ‚Äúa number of payments already in pursuance of these pledges," said Adam Wolanski, representing News Group Newspapers. Johnny Depp loses bid to appeal UK court ruling that he assaulted ex-wife Amber HeardThe High Court ruling came after a three-week circus-like trial in July, during which Depp and Heard both took the stand and both were damaged by lurid testimony about drinking, drug use, fighting and room-trashing. The judge ruled that "the great majority" of Heard's claims of abuse, as presented by the tabloid's publisher in its defense, were mostly true. Proceedings now move to Virginia, where a separate case arose after Heard published a column in the Washington Post in December 2018, proclaiming herself a victim of domestic abuse and suggesting, without actually using his name, that Depp was the alleged abuser. Three months later, Depp filed a lawsuit in Fairfax County (where the Post is printed) seeking $50 million and accusing his ex-wife of defaming him with "hoax" allegations of domestic abuse. Heard shot back by filing more than 300 pages of documents in Virginia, expanding on the abuse allegations she lodged against Depp during their divorce in 2016, claiming Depp regularly beat her up before she married him in 2015 and continued to do so during their 18-month marriage.


All data is taken from the source: http://usatoday.com
Article Link: https://www.usatoday.com/story/entert...


#depp #newsdaily #usanewstoday #bbcworldnewstoday #newstodayabc #cnnnewstoday #

snippet.title: AMBER HEARD IS DONE - Aquaman 2 ACTORS HATED Filming With Amber - Support Depp | Celebrity Craze
snippet.description:
AMBER HEARD IS DONE - Aquaman 2 ACTORS HATED Filming With Amber - Support Johnny Depp | Celebrity Craze

Did Amber Heard just get booted for Aquaman 2? This would be great news to Johnny Depp and Aquaman fans around the world. The #FireAmberHeard movement is going strong. It seems the Aquaman 2 director, James Wan, does not even want Amber Heard in the movie. 

It seems like everyone is turning against Amber Heard. Including the actors in the movie such as Jason Momoa, Nicole Kidman, William Dafoe, etc. The Johnny Depp Amber Heard legal battle is still at the forefront of celebrity news. 

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

#AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #JusticeForJohnny

snippet.title: Amber Heard Is FINISHED! Why She's Losing ALL Her Supporters! Amber Heard Johnny Depp Lawsuit UPDATE
snippet.description:
As Johnny Depp and Amber Heard get deeper into their $50 million dollar lawsuit, lots and lots of fans, people, and even previous Amber Heard supporters are strolling away from her side and are choosing to side with Johnny Depp instead. You may remember that after losing his libel case against the news publisher ‚ÄúThe Sun‚Äù, who gave him a very bad lable following Amber‚Äôs claims that he had hurt her, Johnny lost his chance to reprise his major role as Grindelwald in the upcoming third installment of the trilogy ‚ÄúFantastic Beasts‚Äù, a prequel series to Harry Potter. Because of this, a huge volume of Johnny Depp fans around the globe were upset and angered, which led them to sign a petition for Warner Bros. to fire Amber from her role in the upcoming Aquaman sequel as well. However, despite reaching and even going over 1.6 million votes, the production company chose to let Amber stay in the movie. So how does Amber lose such a tremendous amount of supporters during the time that she needed them the most? What could Amber possibly have done to make her supporters lose interest in her? Well, let‚Äôs find out in this video. But before anything else, make sure to hit that subscribe button first and smash that notification bell for more updates. Let‚Äôs dive in!

Johnny and Amber‚Äôs romance started well, if one may say, before it all went down into ashes. There are those kinds of divorces that are amicable splits, while there are also divorce cases that are messy. Johnny and Amber‚Äôs divorce may be one of the messiest and chaotic in history. But how did it all come down to this? Let‚Äôs go back to the beginning. Johnny and Amber first ignited a spark between them when they starred together in the 2011 comedy-drama film, The Rum Diary. Johnny played a journalist who was immediately smitten with Amber‚Äôs character. However, this love story between the two quickly travelled from the screen to real life. Amber Heard even told Vogue quickly after the release of the film that, ‚ÄúWorking with Johnny was torture. It was better than I ever imagined, which is really saying something.‚Äù Technically, hearing these words from the actress already hinted that the two really hit it off easily during their film taping, and even though the two of them did not quickly jump into a relationship right after the film shooting, the same year that the film was released, the relationships they both were in at the time fell apart, and that suggested quite a rare coincidence. Just a year after the film‚Äôs release, the two officially started dating. Their relationship seemed quite beautiful, and as a proof of this, in 2014, just a couple of months into dating, Amber was spotted wearing an engagement ring, where Johnny also made an announcement about their upcoming wedding. Another year after, the couple held a private wedding ceremony at their home in LA. Fans were really happy about how things were going between the two.

In 2016, Amber Heard filed for divorce. It shocked many people, especially their fans who thought they were living the best days of their married life, but turned out it wasn‚Äôt the case at all. Along with filing for divorce, Amber also accused Johnny of physically hurting her, providing some photos as evidence of Johnny‚Äôs acts. However, these incidents were proven to be fabricated by the police. She also applied for a restraining order against Johnny, which made many people at that time believe that she was telling the truth. Many fans supported her, and it was then as well that she used her newfound acclaim and victimhood to front as one of the most public faces of the #MeToo movement, and subsequently, to serve as ambassador and speaker for various entities, organizations, and companies, many of whom rewarded Amber financially for her time, image, and story. BUT, Johnny Depp‚Äôs team and a lot of fans as well, saw this as Amber‚Äôs way to manipulate people into thinking she is a victim rather than a perpetrator. In line with this, Amber also penned an article in the Washington Post.

Apart from this, fans and supporters of Amber also started to lose the courage to defend and support her as evidence of her extra marital affairs surfaced, showing her with actor James Franco and multi-billionaire Elon Musk. Elon had been issued a subpoena by Johnny Depp‚Äôs team.

As of now, despite all the chaos swirling around the their case, Amber‚Äôs team has tried to dismiss it twice already. 

That‚Äôs all for today, if you enjoyed that, make sure to hit that notification bell and subscribe button for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

Related videos:
Heard SUPPORT FAILS as EVERYONE GIVES UP?! It's FINALLY GAME OVER?!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X3VNrAHdzuo

Hollywood Insider EXPOSES HEARD in BOMBSHELL letter! THIS IS HUGE!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=evTNFz3H_xo

snippet.title: The Rum Diary - Official Trailer (2011) HD Johnny Depp New Movie
snippet.description:
Based on the debut novel by Hunter S. Thompson, "The Rum Diary" tells the increasingly unhinged story of itinerant journalist Paul Kemp (Johnny Depp). Tiring of the noise and madness of New York and the crushing conventions of late Eisenhower-era America, Kemp travels to the pristine island of Puerto Rico to write for a local newspaper, The San Juan Star, run by downtrodden editor Lotterman (Richard Jenkins). Adopting the rum-soaked life of the island, Paul soon becomes obsessed with Chenault (Amber Heard), the wildly attractive Connecticut-born fianc√©e of Sanderson (Aaron Eckhart). Sanderson, a businessman involved in shady property development deals, is one of a growing number of American entrepreneurs who are determined to convert Puerto Rico into a capitalist paradise in service of the wealthy. When Kemp is recruited by Sanderson to write favorably about his latest unsavory scheme, the journalist is presented with a choice: to use his words for the corrupt businessmen's financial benefit, or use them to take the bastards down.

Filming began in Puerto Rico in March 2009. It is currently set to be released on October 28, 2011.

Production
Hunter S. Thompson wrote the novel The Rum Diary in 1961, but the novel was not published until 1998. The independent production companies Shooting Gallery and SPi Films sought to adapt the novel into a film in 2000, and actor Johnny Depp was signed to star and to serve as executive producer. Nick Nolte was also signed to star alongside Depp. The project did not move past the development stage. During this stage, Hunter S. Thompson became so frustrated as to fire off an obscenity-laden letter calling the process a "waterhead fuckaround".

In 2002, a new producer sought the project, and Benicio del Toro and Josh Hartnett were signed to star in the film adaptation. The second incarnation also did not move past the development stage. In 2007, producer Graham King acquired all rights to the novel and sought to film the adaptation under Warner Independent Pictures. Depp, who previously starred in the 1998 film adaptation of Thompson's novel Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, was cast as the freelance journalist Paul Kemp. Amber Heard is reported to have won the role out over Scarlett Johansson and Keira Knightley. Bruce Robinson joined to write the screenplay and to direct The Rum Diary. In 2009, Depp's production company Infinitum Nihil took on the project with the financial backing of King and his production company GK Films. Principal photography began in Puerto Rico on March 25, 2009. Composer Christopher Young has signed on to compose the film's soundtrack.

The alcoholic Robinson had been sober for six-and-a-half years before he started writing the screenplay for The Rum Diary. The filmmaker found himself suffering from writer's block. He started drinking again, a bottle of alcohol a day until he finished the script and then he quit drinking again. He spent a year filming in Puerto Rico, Mexico and Hollywood and resisted drinking until they arrived in Fajardo. Robinson remembers, "It was 100 degrees at two in the morning and very humid. Everyone's drenched in sweat. One of the prop guys goes by with a barrow-load of ice and Coronas. I said: 'Johnny, this doesn't mean anything.' And reached for a Corona." ... Some savage drinking took place. When I was no longer in Johnny's environment I went back to sobriety."
snippet.tags: ['Johnny Depp', 'Hunter S. Thompson Movie', 'The Rum Diary', 'The Rum Diary Movie', 'The Rum Diary Trailer', 'Paul Kemp', 'Richard Jenkins', 'New Johnny Depp Movie', 'movieclips', 'movieclipsdotcom', 'trailer', 'movie']

snippet.title: Johnny Depp 'is no wife beater', his lawyers tell High Court in Amber Heard libel case | ITV News
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp is "no wife beater" and it is his ex-wife, Amber Heard, who was the ‚Äúabuser‚Äù in the relationship, the actor‚Äôs lawyers have told the High Court.

Recordings between the couple show that the Aquaman actress has a "propensity for violence", the Hollywood star‚Äôs legal team alleged.

In closing submissions on the final day of what is the biggest English libel trial of the 21st century, Mr Depp‚Äôs barrister, David Sherborne, said the court needed to decide whether the allegation that the Pirates Of The Caribbean actor was ‚Äúguilty of serious assault on Ms Heard, causing her significant injuries, is true or not‚Äù.

Mr Depp is suing News Group Newspapers (NGN), publisher of The Sun newspaper, and its executive editor Dan Wootton over a 2018 article which alleged he was violent towards Ms Heard, 34, and labelled him a ‚Äúwife beater‚Äù.

snippet.title: 10 Celebrities That Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard
snippet.description:
10 Celebrities That Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career

https://youtu.be/gEfWUbRfFR8

Related videos:

10 Celebrities That Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard

https://youtu.be/gECq8x8b6bo

MORE Celebrities Who Defended Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard!!!

https://youtu.be/TzqAslwfhig

Top 10 Celebrities Who Defended Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/uJ9KUTXlulw

The never ending fight between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard seems to last forever. Every
day the press reveals new facts and new details about the situation but no one knows how it
all going to end and who is the victim and who is the liar. But the only thing which left for us -
is to analyze the facts. After ex-wife Amber Heard accused him of committing domestic
violence during their marriage, multiple celebrities with ties to Johnny Depp have come
forward in his defense. This is really impressive but Depp‚Äôs other ex-wife and mother of his
two children, Vanessa Paradis, Depp‚Äôs ex-fiance Winona Ryder, and his former co-star
Penelope Cruz have all testified in the actor‚Äôs defense. It should be noted that though all
three women insist Depp was never violent in their presence, the only ones for certain who
know the intimate details of Heard and Depp‚Äôs marriage are Depp and Heard. Anyways, let‚Äôs
listen to what many celebrities had to say about the entire situation and why they defend
Johnny Depp.
10. Winona Ryder
Winona Ryder is The Blast, Depp‚Äôs Edward Scissorhands‚Äò co-star and his ex-girlfriend. She
declared that she had never experienced any of the behavior that Heard detailed. She said:
‚ÄúFrom my experience, which was so wildly different, I was absolutely shocked, confused and
upset when I heard the accusations against him.‚Äù Ryder continued as part of her statement
in defense of Depp‚Äôs character, ‚ÄúThe idea that he is an incredibly violent person is the
farthest thing from Johnny I knew and loved. I cannot wrap my head around these
accusations.‚Äù Winona Ryder went on to say that Johnny Depp was ‚Äúnever, never‚Äù violent or
abusive towards her or ‚Äútowards anybody I have seen.‚Äù She also said that she‚Äôd always ‚Äúfelt
so very, very safe with him.‚Äù
9. Sharon Osbourne
Speaking on US daytime hit The Talk, Sharon compared the pair's relationship to her violent
marriage to Ozzy saying: "She gave him as good as she got." The former X Factor judge
said: "Do you know what I think? It takes two to Tango. I think they had a very vulnerable
relationship. I think they're both as bad as each other." Sharon continued: "She gave him as
good as she got. It wasn't just like a little mouse in the corner being battered. She gave him
back. Speaking about Depp and Heard on The Talk this week, Sharon insisted: "If there is
enough love you work through it with help. But there obviously wasn't that love to keep them
together. "He was defending himself, she was defending herself. Whatever went on only
those two know. They both hurt each other‚Äù.
8. Laura Wasser
Depp‚Äôs high-powered divorce attorney Laura Wasser, who has also represented clients like
Agelina Jolie and allegedly works with Kim Kardashian, responded to Heard‚Äôs restraining
order request in court documents, saying the actress is ‚Äúattempting to secure a premature
financial resolution by alleging abuse.‚Äù ‚ÄúHer current application for a temporary restraining
order along with her financial requests appears to be in response to the negative media
attention she received earlier this week after filing for divorce,‚Äù Wasser wrote. ‚ÄúYet Johnny
cannot protect himself or Amber from media scrutiny, and Amber‚Äôs anger certainly cannot

drive this dissolution proceeding.‚Äù Wasser also alleges that Heard took advantage of Depp at
an emotional time ‚Äì his mother having died three days before Heard filed for divorce on
Monday.
7. Laurie Holden
Walking Dead star Laurie Holden defended Depp on Twitter, in an ‚Äúimpassioned reaction to
the vilification of a human being on social media and the public outcry for complete and utter
rumination.‚Äù
‚ÄúI, for one, am going to see Johnny Depp‚Äôs new movie,‚Äù the 46-year-old actress tweeted
about Alice Through the Looking Glass. ‚ÄúHis personal life is just that. Personal. No one
knows the real truth so just zip it.‚Äù ‚ÄúTo be clear: I am just saying DON‚ÄôT JUMP TO
CONCLUSIONS,‚Äù she added. ‚ÄúEven a pic might not be telling the whole story....‚Äù
...

What‚Äôs your opinion on the entire situation?
Do you think Johnny Depp's camp is telling the truth and an actor would never harm Amber
Heard? Let me know your opinion in the comments section down below.

snippet.title: Disney Apologizes To Johnny Depp After This...
snippet.description:
Disney Apologizes To Johnny Depp After Firing Him...

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

Disney OFFICIALLY Apologizes To Johnny Depp After Firing Him!!!

https://youtu.be/WLgXd5H6Q2A

Disney Sends Lawyers To DEFEND Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard In Lawsuit

https://youtu.be/CYlIamQCWJ4

"You Saved Me" Johnny Depp Thanks His Supporters For Defending Him (VIDEO)

https://youtu.be/GWUMe-u9zKE

Robert Downey Jr. Steps Up For Johnny Depp Since Disney Won't

https://youtu.be/YG2dPHN3NsE

The fact that Johnny Depp was fired from his role in the Pirates of the Caribbean is not
something new. But still, the fans were absolutelly upset and mad as they can't imagine their
favorite movie without Johnny. Moreover, many people believe that it was just unfair to fire
him as Johnny Depp has had a long working relationship with Disney. The main reason
which made kids‚Äô favorite channel cut ties with Johnny was his recent court cases in both the
U.K. and the U.S.. The problems between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard made a lot of
mess and as a result, Amber‚Äôs allegations of domestic violence and ongoing legal troubles
reportedly cost Johnny Depp his Oscar-nominated, starring role in the multibillion-dollar
grossing Pirates of the Caribbean franchise.
It‚Äôs been already said a lot about how difficult Johnny Depp and Amber Heard‚Äôs break up is
as the nightmare for these two began in 2016. Since that year they've been legally fighting
against each other, accusing each other in inappropriate behavior, violence,
libel and many other things. Moreover, 2020 wasn't really easy for Johnny Depp. It was full
of libel trials against News Group Newspapers, the publisher of The Sun, in court over a
2018 article in which they called him a "wife beater". During the trial Depp denied he's being
violent to Amber and also accused Heard of having extra-marital affairs with James Franco
and Elon Musk, which Heard also denies. However, no matter how Depp tried, the court
ruled against Depp in the libel trial.
Due to recently highlighted personal issues and allegations made against the famed actor,
Depp has been dumped by many major film studios. It all began with the fact Depp
announced that he had been 'asked to resign' from his role as Grindewald in 'Fantastic
Beasts 3'. He posted on his Instagram: "I wish to let you know that I have been asked to
resign by Warner Bros. from my role as Grindelwald in 'Fantastic Beasts' and I have
respected and agreed to that request." He continued, "... I intend to prove that the
allegations against me are false," Depp added. "My life and career will not be defined by this
moment in time."
And then Walt Disney Pictures who said ‚Äògoodbye‚Äô to Johnny Depp. According to a
Washington Post report, Disney is said to have dropped Depp from the Pirates franchise just
four days after Heard‚Äôs incendiary 2018 op-ed in the same publication, in which she claimed,
without naming Depp, that she was the victim of domestic violence. Depp‚Äôs lawyers claimed
that the actor‚Äôs removal from the multibillion-dollar grossing franchise was because of her
allegations.
In 2018, Disney production chief Sean Bailey confirmed that Depp was no longer a part of
the franchise‚Äôs future plans. He told The Hollywood Reporter, ‚ÄúWe want to bring in a new
energy and vitality. I love the Pirates movies, but part of the reason writers Paul Wernick and
Rhett Reese are so interesting is that we want to give it a kick in the pants. And that‚Äôs what
I‚Äôve tasked them with.‚Äù
Moreover, some people think it was not the only reason for Disney to ‚Äòbreak up‚Äô Johnny
Depp. Another reason for his removal could be the fact that Disney couldn‚Äôt afford him
anymore. According to Forbes, Depp‚Äôs salary, including a healthy profit percentage, reaches
close to $100 million per Pirates film. Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales, the

series‚Äô fifth film, registered a box office haul of almost $800 million, well below the over $1
billion totals of the franchise‚Äôs second and fourth films, and the $963 million haul of the third
one. Disney is looking to save $90 million by recasting Depp, the report said.
...
Now I want to know your opinion. Let me know in the comments section down below do you
believe that there‚Äôs a chance for fans to see Johnny Depp as a Captain Jack Sparrow?

Consider subscribing to not miss out on what's trending today in the life of the world's biggest stars.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp's Lawyer's Epic Closing Statement
snippet.description:
Here is the Epic Closing Statement From Johnny Depp's Lawyer

SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE : http://bit.ly/32rc7vI
___________________________________________

Now we all know; Heard and Depp began dating around the end of 2011 or the start of 2012. It was also in 2012 that Depp and long-time partner Paradis publicly announced their separation after 14 years of dating. Depp and Heard married in a very private ceremony in their home in LA, in 2015. On May 23, 2016, Heard filed for divorce from Depp and also obtained a temporary restraining order against the him. She alleged that Depp had physically abused her during their relationship, and said it was usually while under the influence of drugs or alcohol. However, a police spokesman told People that an investigation into the domestic incident radio call found that no crime had taken place. Depp denied these accusations and through his representatives said Heard was "attempting to secure a premature financial resolution by alleging abuse." And you know the rest.



Music In This Video : 

Track: Odessa ‚Äî LiQWYD & Scandinavianz
Music provided by Audio Library Plus
Watch: https://youtu.be/jNy-Dp3lgcg

snippet.title: Video muestra reacci√≥n violenta de Johnny Depp contra Amber Heard
snippet.description:
El proceso de divorcio de Amber Heard y Johnny Depp est√° tomando tintes truculentos con la salida de unas im√°genes que muestran al actor en su faceta m√°s violenta.

El video publicado por el portal TMZ muestra a Depp tirando las puertas de los muebles de la cocina y dando voces sin que sepamos por qu√© lo hace. Fuentes citadas por el mismo medio indican que el video puede haber sido editado y que no salen im√°genes de Heard presuntamente provocando a Depp.

Procedente de Londres, la actriz no ha querido confirmar o desmentir si ha sido ella la que ha filtrado el material.

Posteriormente su equipo ha dicho que no fueron ellos los que filtraron estas im√°genes, elemento que podr√≠a marcar el sino del juicio.
Lo que si hemos podido ver ha sido unas marcas en los brazos de Amber que dan mucho qu√© pensar. ¬øSe trata de m√°s pruebas para demostrar el presunto maltrato de Depp?
¬øEs posible que sean resultado del duro trabajo de la actriz durante los d√≠as que estuvo en Londres?
Lo cierto es que el equipo legal de Heard ha indicado que est√°n buscando un acuerdo con Johnny tan pronto como sea posible.

El listado de testigos de Heard es de 7 personas. Por el lado de Johnny Depp, son 23 incluyendo 
a su ex mujer, Vanessa Paradis, quienes hacen parte de sus testigos.
Amber ya ha declarado pero a√∫n es pronto para sacar conclusiones.
-----------------------------------
Vis√≠tenos en www.celebmas.com

snippet.title: Amber Heard FORCES Judge To Dismiss Lawsuit  - Johnny Depp Amber Heard Lawsuit UPDATE
snippet.description:
As we all know now, famous actor Johnny Depp, who played numerous roles in the past, and his then wife Amber Heard, who had recently appeared in the DC movie Aquaman, are now in the middle of a preposterous chaos that all stemmed from their past marriage, broken vows, and well, a lot of ‚Äúphysical‚Äù, problems. But how did all of this frenzy start? How did the romantic private wedding go down this badly? And what were the actions taken by Amber Heard that were angering the judges so much? Let‚Äôs all find out in this video. But before we go any further, make sure to hit that subscribe button and notification bell first for more updates. So, let‚Äôs begin!

If you remember, Johnny Depp has been at the height of his career in the industry for many, many years now. He started acting as early as the 1980‚Äôs, when he first appeared in the horror-slash-thriller film ‚ÄúA Nightmare on Elm Street '', and played a minor role as the boyfriend of the main character. This helped Johnny begin his acting career, landing more minor roles and then major ones. Later on, he became a popular star of the classic, eccentric director Tim Burton‚Äôs films, where he portrayed various roles that all have these similarities: unique, bizarre, and kinda creepy in their own ways. In the romantic fantasy film ‚ÄúEdward Scissorhands‚Äù, he met his ex-partner Winona Ryder, whom we all see now in the sci-fi series Stranger Things. The two of them dated for four years, and even though the couple ended things between them in the 90‚Äôs, Winona still defended Johnny against Amber Heard on her recent allegations of abuse. He also played a few roles with Helena Bonham Carter in many Tim Burton films such as Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Alice in Wonderland and Alice Through the Looking Glass, Corpse Bride, Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, and Dark Shadows. One of the most widely-known appearances of Johnny Depp that perhaps brought him the largest commercial and critical success was the Disney media franchise ‚ÄúPirates of the Carribean‚Äù series, where he landed and reprised his lead role for all five movies that ran from 2003 to 2017. 

Amber Heard, on the other hand, started her acting career in 2003, first by appearing in two music videos, and then later on landing small supporting roles in three various television series. This then later on elevated her to more film and television roles, both in the supporting and lead actress roles. Her latest film that hit commercial success was the 2018 DC movie ‚ÄúAquaman‚Äù, where she co-starred alongside Jason Momoa as Mera, the Atlantean Queen. However, even amidst the controversies circling her divorce with Johnny Depp, she managed to keep and reprise her role in the 2021 superhero film ‚ÄúZack Snyder‚Äôs Justice League'', a director‚Äôs cut of the 2017 film. Not only that, but she also starred in the post-apocalyptic miniseries ‚ÄúThe Stand‚Äù, which was based on Stephen King‚Äôs novel of the same name. Here, she co-starred alongside Alexander Skarsg√•rd, James Marden, and Odessa Young, and it premiered in December 2020. This upset fans because as Johnny was being banned from reprising his role as Grindelwald, Amber got to star in more films and series, and not only that, she was also reported to reappear as Mera in the sequel of the DC movie Aquaman which is set to start filming in July of 2021. Many fans saw this as an unfair treatment, given that both actors slash ex-lovers are facing the ongoing lawsuits between them.

And just recently, there has been a new occurrence in the ongoing defamation case against Amber‚Äôs article on The Washington Post, and it seems like Johnny‚Äôs side is stepping a little ahead of the game.

Amber Heard has been looking into Disney and what the company knew about Johnny‚Äôs actions and behavior during his time on the Pirates of the Caribbean films. For his part, Johnny has asserted Amber has lied on several occasions, including saying she would give their divorce settlement to charity but didn‚Äôt, and also said she had asserted he was violent once, when police body cam footage allegedly showed otherwise. Not so cool, Amber. Her lawyer has also said that the Aquaman 2 actress has not been able to pay out the full divorce settlement to charity.

That‚Äôs all for our latest updates for today. If you enjoyed that video, you can check out our video about the celebrities who defended Johnny Depp in his lawsuit against Amber Heard, and how a Virginian judge scolded Amber in her recent defamation case. Be sure to smash that like and subscribe buttons and hit that notification bell for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

Related videos:
Amber Heard LOSES Case After All Witnesses Take Johnny Depp's Side!!! (Amber's LIES EXPOSED)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKSQk1KayeA

Amber Heard & Johnny Depp: The Real ABUSER FINALLY REVEALED!! (UNCENSORED AUDIO!)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aca0KWoHtqQ

Amber Heard first accused Johnny Depp of being violent towards her back in 2016 when she filed a court petition claiming. 
Amber‚Äôs accusations came at the height of the #MeToo movement, and the actress was hailed as a ‚Äúhero‚Äù for speaking up about the alleged violence she endured during her relationship with Johnny.

So why do fans think Johnny is the real #MeToo victim?

snippet.title: Amber Heard FIRED From Aquaman 2 after Johnny Depp Lawsuit?!
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard‚Äôs case started years ago, when the latter filed for divorce and accused Johnny of hurting her. However, their feud that rooted from their messy marriage did not end there, and now, the case is swirling once again as their latest court trial is about to come in July this year. As the trials are coming near, the issue that has somehow been buried deep in the internet has recently surfaced once again, and guess who‚Äôs been the subject of ridicule these past few weeks? You guessed that right, Amber Heard. Amber seemed to have been losing more and more of her supporters due to more and more evidence surfacing in the media, including the fact that she couldn‚Äôt provide proof that she donated the money she got from her divorce settlement, which she promised to donate to charity. But where is it now?  Then there was evidence of her having affairs with actor, James Franco and multi-billionaire, Elon Musk. But what angered most people was the fact that Johnny Depp was forced to step down from his role as Grindelwald in the upcoming third franchise of the film trilogy ‚ÄúFantastic Beasts‚Äù. Now, the trilogy is quite a big deal in the entertainment industry, considering that it is the prequel series to one of the most prominent film series of all time, ‚ÄúHarry Potter‚Äù. And aside from this, Johnny is actually an incredibly big name in the industry as well, and not just because of his very famous role as Jack Sparrow, but also because he has starred in countless movies too. But now that Johnny had been removed from his role, people‚Äôs fury shot directly at Amber Heard, as she was going back to reprise her role in the second installment of the DC Extended Universe film Aquaman, despite the lawsuits she is currently facing. Many, many fans were enraged by this, and some even started a petition to request Warner Bros. to fire Amber Heard, the same way they did to Johnny. But after a very long deliberation, did these people who fought for Johnny Depp‚Äôs equal treatment in the industry actually succeed? Had Warner Bros. finally come to their senses and fired Amber Heard from their newest DC film? Well, let‚Äôs find out in this video. But before everything else, make sure to hit that subscribe button first and smash that notification bell for more updates. So, let‚Äôs begin!

Let‚Äôs backtrack a little bit into Johnny and Amber‚Äôs career. Johnny Depp has been at the height of his career in the industry for many, many years now, and despite everything he is going through, he is nowhere close to a stop. He started acting as early as the 1980‚Äôs, when he first appeared in the horror-slash-thriller film ‚ÄúA Nightmare on Elm Street '', and played a minor role as the boyfriend of the main character. This helped Johnny begin his acting career, landing more minor roles and then major ones, including in the 2010 romantic thriller film ‚ÄúThe Tourist‚Äù in which he co-starred with respected actress Angelina Jolie.

After many more roles, Johnny landed one of his biggest commercial films, the critically acclaimed Disney media franchise, the ‚ÄúPirates of the Carribean‚Äù series, which is one of the major projects that really skyrocketed Johnny‚Äôs career into its highest point. In this series, he worked with numerous legendary actors and actresses, and worked on the lead role of Jack Sparrow, which earned him a remarkably huge fan following, as he reprised his role in all five movies that ran from 2003 to 2017. Some people even call him Jack Sparrow more often than his real name. Needless to say, he was and still is, a legend in the film industry. But we can‚Äôt say that now in his 2011 comedy drama film ‚ÄúThe Rum Diary‚Äù which we can now safely say was not the brightest decision he made, as this was the film where he met his ex-wife, Amber Heard.

On the other hand, Amber Heard started her acting career in 2003, first by appearing in two music videos, and then later in landing small supporting roles in three various television series. This then later on elevated her to more film and television roles as both a supporting and lead actress. Her latest film that hit commercial success was the 2018 DCEU movie ‚ÄúAquaman‚Äù, where she co-starred alongside Jason Momoa as Mera, the Atlantean Queen. 

Above all these, Amber Heard manages to keep her name in the headlines as many more issues come up. She even angered a judge in Virginia once, warning her not to waste the court‚Äôs time. 

That‚Äôs all for today, we hope you enjoyed that video and if you did, don‚Äôt forget to subscribe and hit that notification bell for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

"The Judge EXPOSED Me" Amber Heard Official Apology
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-sdg2agIxg

https://youtu.be/UM75AvnffEQ

Elon Musk Speaks Against Amber Heard & Defends Johnny Depp!!!

https://youtu.be/Bu1uOt5Tyoc

Amber Heard ‚Äì a lot of people had no idea who she was until her divorce from Johnny Depp.
Her biggest role by far is that of Mera, in Aquaman ‚Äì the love interest of none other than
Aquaman himself.
The mess between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp is still ongoing, but when it first started
making headlines Amber had released a phone video making Johnny appear to be a
drunken ab**er.
As time went on and court trials ensued, eventually the public learned that Amber was the
toxic component of the former celebrity couple. People started thinking deeply and realized
the irony of Amber Heard‚Äôs career. She wasn‚Äôt exactly the most well- known actress, until
she met the man who was already extremely popular in Hollywood. It made so many fans
think that Amber Heard benefited from marrying Johnny. Amber started to gain more
attention in the public eye via her appearances in movies like ‚ÄòJustice League‚Äô and
‚ÄòAquaman‚Äô and she actually started getting more and more great roles than ever before.
Amber and Johnny dated for years before finally getting married in 2015, but that‚Äôs when
things started to reveal their true nature. It also made people suspicious as their marriage
lasted only one year.
Jealousy, anger, ab**se, lies - the things which filled this marriage from the start and
obviously, that‚Äôs not a good combination for those who want to be a happy couple. But things
started to get intense in the worst way, when in 2016 Amber filed for divorce from Johnny
and also obtained a temporary restraining order against him. She alleged that Johnny had
physically ab**ed her during their relationship, and said it was usually while under the
influence of dr**gs or alc***ol.
She alleged that at the time of filing for divorce, an incident had recently taken place in which
Johnny Depp threw his phone at her, leaving her with a bruised face.
Johnny Depp denied these accusations and through his representatives said Amber Heard
was "attempting to secure a premature financial resolution by alleging ab*se." But by that
time no one believed Johnny Depp and his career started falling apart.
In December 2018, Amber Heard wrote an op-ed for The Washington Post saying she was
ab*sed. In this op-ed for The Washington Post she spoke about the treatment of women in
domestic ab*se cases.
She wrote: "I became a public figure representing domestic ab*se, and I felt the full force of
our culture's wrath for women who speak out." After that the newspapers labeled him as an
‚Äòab*ser‚Äô and ‚Äòwife beater‚Äô And In 2019, Johnny Depp sued Amber Heard for $50 million for
defamation over the WaPo article.
The suit said that Amber Heard "is not a victim of domestic ab*se, she is a perpetrator," and
denied that Johnny Depp ever ab*sed her. Instead, the suit said that Amber Heard's
allegations were part of an "elaborate hoax to generate positive publicity" for the actress.

Johnny Depp's lawyers said: "The op-ed depended on the central premise that Ms. Heard
was a domestic abuse victim and that Mr. Depp perpetrated domestic violence against her."
And that‚Äôs when things really got intense and Amber‚Äôs true nature started to reveal itself.
Finally, Amber Heard‚Äôs claims of ab*se started to be revealed as false one by one. First of
all, the police spokesman revealed that an investigation into the domestic incident ‚Äòradio call‚Äô
which Amber Heard stated previously, found that no crime had taken place.
Plus,Johnny Depp had his own proof that Amber was lying. Mainly, Johnny had a recording of a time when Amber ab*sed him.
In January, phone recordings obtained by the Daily Mail were released. In these recordings,
Amber Heard admitted to "hitting" Johnny Depp.
Amber is heard saying: "I'm sorry that I didn't ... hit you across the face in a proper slap, but I
was hitting you, it was not punching you. Babe, you're not punched.
"I don't know what the motion of my actual hand was, but you're fine, I did not hurt you, I did
not punch you, I was hitting you."
...
Now I want to hear your opinion about Amber Heard. Do you think she is the one who played
the victim card to get sympathy and tried to frame an innocent man? Let me know what you
think in the comments section down below.

snippet.title: Celebrities Who SUPPORTED Johnny Depp OVER Amber Heard!
snippet.description:
Perhaps the whole internet or even the whole world are either following the case of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard‚Äôs tumultuous relationship, or at least know something about it. Johnny and Amber‚Äôs story started in flames when the two met on the set of the movie ‚ÄúThe Rum Diary‚Äù, in which Johnny played a journalist who was immediately smitten with Amber‚Äôs character. However, this spark portrayed in the film continued off-screen, where Amber Heard told Vogue ‚Äúworking with Johnny was something else. It was better than I ever imagined, which is really saying something.‚Äù After the end of the said film, the two started dating. Depp was then sharing his life with partner Vanessa Paradis whom he lived with for 14 years and whom he had two kids with, while Heard was with her then girlfriend Tasya van Ree. When Johnny and Amber started dating in 2012, they both ended their previous relationships. The start of their romance seemed quite good, but where and how did it end up so messy? And who were the people who bravely took a stand to help Johnny Depp? Let‚Äôs find out, but first, make sure that you hit that subscribe button, smash that like button and hit the notification bell for more updates. Now, let‚Äôs have a short recap of Amber and Johnny‚Äôs roller-coaster ride on lover‚Äôs lane.

In 2014, Amber was spotted wearing an engagement ring, stirring rumors. This rumored engagement did not stay secret long enough, as Johnny himself confirmed this in an interview. In 2015, after several years of dating, Johnny married Amber in a very private ceremony in their home in Los Angeles. However, their married life did not seem to go as well as expected, as Amber filed for divorce just after a year after their marriage, and accused Johnny Depp of physical abuse. Well, that‚Äôs what you call ‚Äúdisappearing as fast as it came‚Äù. Together with the divorce filed, Amber also filed a temporary restraining order against Johnny, saying that the actor usually hurt her while under the influence. She also alleged that while filing for divorce, Johnny threw a phone at her, bruising her face, an accusation that Johnny denied, and investigators found false. 

The divorce was finalized in 2017, a year after Amber filed for it. However, the former couple‚Äôs lawsuits were far from over. In 2018, Amber wrote an op-ed to The Washington Post saying that she was mistreated, and in which she spoke about the treatment of women in these types of court cases. 
He was asked to resign from his role as Grindelwald in the Fantastic Beasts 3.  Due to this, other actors perceived this as ‚Äúunfair‚Äù treatment of Depp and many stars stepped out to defend him. Many fans, friends, and co-stars defended him and what was shocking was that his previous lovers and wives stepped up to speak for him. Here are some of the stars who stepped up to defend Johnny Depp on his lawsuits against Amber Heard.

1. J.K. Rowling
J.K. Rowling is a famous writer, and even though you are not a fan of books, you sure are familiar with her masterpiece, the Harry Potter series. Her works on the series escalated her name to the top and even made her one of the richest and most influential writers today. 

2. Winona Ryder
Perhaps one of the most shocking faces to see in the line of those who defended Johnny was Winona Ryder, his ex-fiancee. Winona had been engaged to Johnny during their four-year relationship in the 1990s, a pair that had been the center of admiration during their time. She wrote that she was aware of the allegations against his ex-lover, and that she knew him very well, counting their relationship as one of the most significant in her life. ‚ÄúI understand that it is very important that I speak from my own experience, as I obviously was not there during his marriage to Amber, but, from my experience, which was so wildly different, I was absolutely shocked, confused and upset when I heard the accusations against him,‚Äù the Stranger Things actress said. 

3. Vanessa Paradis
Johnny Depp has been involved with many actresses throughout his career, he is indeed a very handsome and career-driven man after all. But if there‚Äôs someone whom he lasted more than a decade with, it‚Äôs the mother of his two kids, renowned French actress Vanessa Paradis. Johnny and Vanessa were in a relationship for 14 years, and separated just before he and Amber were together. 

4. Javier Bardem
Although the statements previously given by his ex-lovers and many of his friends and co-stars had a huge bearing on the case, 

That‚Äôs all for today, and if you enjoyed this video, make sure to smash that subscribe button and notification bell for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

2020 has not been an easy year for anyone especially not for Johnny Depp. From his loss against the high-profile libel case involving the Sun and his ex-wife Amber Heard, one can say that Depp has really been in an intense battle throughout the year. snippet.title: Amber Heard Exposed After Leaked LAPD Footage Surfaced‚Ä¶
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Exposed After Leaked LAPD Footage‚Ä¶

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career

https://youtu.be/gEfWUbRfFR8

Related videos:

Body Cam Footage PROVING Amber Heard LIED about Johnny Depp!

https://youtu.be/dEhhgg43AiI

Amber Heard OFFICIALLY Faces 4 Years In PRISON For Lying In Court...

https://youtu.be/dEhhgg43AiI

The FBI Is Coming For Amber Heard - BREAKING! - Justice (Finally?!) For Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/QR9_W4jVEcQ

The various court cases involving Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been all
over the news over the last several months and still it is unclear who's right and
who's wrong. But this time there's never-seen-before evidence: body cam
footage from the Los Angeles police department (LAPD) officers who
responded to the 911 call and this evidence seems to change the compilation of
the case.
Make sure you stay till the end to see the final downfall of Amber Heard. This
time she is exposed for real. So, what was on the bodycam footage and why it
could change the whole case.
Nobody expected this was coming but Johnny Depp's attorneys claim that
never-before-seen body cam footage from the Los Angeles police department
(LAPD) officers who responded to the second of two 911 calls proves that
Johnny Depp did not have the violent altercation with his ex-wife! Moreover, it
proves that Amber Heard lied about the alleged brawl that took place in May
2016.
However, it's not the first time that Amber Heard lied. Let‚Äôs look back at the
following things: donating the entirety of the divorce settlement money to a
children‚Äôs charity, an abuse story that she stole from her former colleague, the
‚Äòdogs story‚Äô, never hitting Johnny Depp, and many other things. Amber Heard
lied about all of these things while under oath in the UK high courts. Now
there‚Äôs even more evidence that she lied.
And now, ahead of Johnny Depp's upcoming $50 million defamation lawsuit
against his ex-wife, which will take place in Virginia in April 2022, the actor's
lawyers are revealing depositions from the officers and body camera footage
from them and the attorneys are claiming that cops do not support Amber
Heard's allegations.
Giving testimony, Amber Heard claimed that Johnny Depp hit her in the face
with a phone and tore out clumps of her hair in an extended altercation that took
place throughout their shared home at the time. Amber Heard and her friend,
Rocky Pennington, both gave depositions about the incident and each of them

described the scene as a violent mess. Rocky Pennington described it as, "They
have a big kitchen island in the middle of the kitchen and on there, there's
candles and like fruit and, you know, glass, like jars and vases and things like
that. And he just was hitting everything with the wine bottle, just smashing it all
off. So there was fruit on the floor and baskets and, you know, glass bottles and
flowers."
Amber Heard's description was, "We have huge heavy silver candlesticks,
candelabra sticks. Those were on the floor broken. Baskets of fruit that we had
on the kitchen island. There ... fruit everywhere. Baskets on the ground. The
containers holding the spoons and forks, kitchen utensils, those were spilled. He
broke a lot of glass things that left glass on the floor ... when he walked out into
the hallway, you could see wine spilled all over the ground and wine on the
walls and ... and so I knew that at least he had gone through there and was like
sloshing wine anywhere."
Right now we have a chance to take a look at what really happened that night!
...
And now I want to know your opinion of the matter. Do you think this evidence
will help Johnny Depp to prove that he is not the ab*ser? And do you think
Amber Heard will continue to put up the fight? Let me know your opinion in the
comments section down below and make sure you hit the subscribe button.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp OFFICIALLY LOSES Case Against Amber Heard?!!
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp OFFICIALLY LOSES Case Against Amber Heard?!!

Subscribe to The Spotlight üëâ  https://bit.ly/3txAgy1

WATCH NEXT: ‚ñ∂Ô∏è

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q32tzepkrj4

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lRgawOgSsbw&t=62s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YVPyBraRags&t=132s

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


RELATED VIDEOS:üëá

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2A0tXMEXrX8

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9ZaUwfDvg4

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DkRFRQA2nk8

Johnny had requested for an appeal to open up the case, which last week was denied by the judges. This challenge that Johnny offered was rejected by Lord Justice Underhill and Lord Justice Dingemans with their reasoning being that they felt going through the case a second time has a high chance of turning out just like the first one.

Depp has been denied the chance to stand up in the libel case against the newspaper as well as one of its journalists. Even with him having proof of him being the victim of abuse by Amber Heard, Johnny was facing the brunt. 

Lord Justice Underhill has also stated that it is hard to convince the jury to vote for his side of the case due to the fact that purely factual questions were not enough to turn the case around.

Amber had promised to give away the divorce settlement of 7 million dollars that she had received from Johnny Depp, to two associations one being the ACLU and the other being the Children‚Äôs Hospital, Los Angeles. 

The truth about this came out when Johnny‚Äôs team did some digging and found out that she hadn‚Äôt donated the money and only had contributed $100,000 towards the organizations. 

Amber has refuted back that she would pay off the donations in time and that all the money that she had, had gone into the lawsuit case, defending herself. But Johnny also did say that the money that she got was being used to sway the judge towards her favour, which is probably what happened. After knowing her nature, it is quite hard to think of her otherwise. 

Sadly, Johnny cannot go back and fend for himself this time. This is due to the fact that the same crime cannot be tried twice and thus the newspapers have taken a deep breath due to their narrow escape from the case getting messier.

In fact, it was the perfect press strategy. Looking at the situation holistically, the overall benefit that Amber has is much higher now. But why? Well, once one rules you out from being the winner of the case, it is hard for other and judged to not agree with his side of the case too.

What did The Sun have to say about this after the verdict was out?
First of all, they were pretty glad that they got out of such a rut of a situation. Secondly, the attorney from The Sun had stated that the winning of the was a big deal as it was a true representation of how strong Amber is to stand up to the face of Mr Depp. 

This whole situation according to them stood as a great example for those suffering from domestic violence and that they are being heard and must be strong enough to stand up for their rights. 

This libel trial of the century had 12 files of evidence that were looked into with evidence also been taken from around 30 witnesses. The  does not wish to proceed on with this case and is hoping this to be the final end to this prolonged case. 

During the first case that he was involved with, the loss that he endured cost him a major chunk of his career. Two of the biggest roles he was holding at that point in time, one being the role of Jack Sparrow from the Pirates of the Caribbean and Gellert Grindelwald from the Fantastic Beasts franchise, both went down the drain after his loss. 

No one wanted to work with him and ruin the reputation of working with an individual who was involved in domestic abuse. 

The only thing left to look forward to is Depp‚Äôs defamation lawsuit that would take place in the United States of America. How that would play out and when it would happen is quite unpredictable at this point in time. 

The pandemic has made things all the more worse by dragging out the events of the case. The case that was to be heard out at in April this year, has been postponed to May next year, which is quite a lot of time.

Joelle Rich from Shilling Partners in London has spoken up on behalf of Johnny Depp stating that he still has hopes of winning. In fact, he still thinks that the in the US may actually see things from his perspective and that he may actually be proved not guilty. amber heard aquaman 2 jason momoa clevver news informoverload amber heard elon musk viral vision

snippet.title: A friend of Johnny Depp has called Amber Heard injury photos 'phoney baloney'
snippet.description:
An artist friend of Johnny Depp has dismissed images of Amber Heard with injuries as 'phoney baloney' at the High Court, and accused the actress of filing a 'fraudulent' domestic violence claim to 'extort and blackmail' the actor.

Isaac Baruch, who the court heard lived rent-free in one of Depp's Los Angeles apartments, was the first witness to give evidence on Friday - day nine of the Hollywood star's libel action against the publishers of The Sun and the paper's executive editor Dan Wootton over a 2018 article labelling him a 'wife beater'.

Mr Baruch described Depp as a 'noble mensch' and 'a true honest guy'. Speaking about 'phoney baloney pictures in People magazine' of Heard with injuries, he said they did not compare with what he had ever seen.

snippet.localized.title: A friend of Johnny Depp has called Amber Heard injury photos 'phoney baloney'
snippet.localized.description:
An artist friend of Johnny Depp has dismissed images of Amber Heard with injuries as 'phoney baloney' at the High Court, and accused the actress of filing a 'fraudulent' domestic violence claim to 'extort and blackmail' the actor.

Isaac Baruch, who the court heard lived rent-free in one of Depp's Los Angeles apartments, was the first witness to give evidence on Friday - day nine of the Hollywood star's libel action against the publishers of The Sun and the paper's executive editor Dan Wootton over a 2018 article labelling him a 'wife beater'.

Mr Baruch described Depp as a 'noble mensch' and 'a true honest guy'. Speaking about 'phoney baloney pictures in People magazine' of Heard with injuries, he said they did not compare with what he had ever seen.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp PRAISES Amber Heard For Being So Caring / AUDIO
snippet.description:
This video is a clip which was excluded from the cut-up, edited and leaked recording by Johnny Depp‚Äôs team in January.  The full version was recorded by Johnny Depp and Amber Heard during their marriage (September 2015). The full recording is being used as evidence in the Johnny Depp v The Sun UK libel case. Depp decided to sue The Sun for publishing an article where they brand him a ‚Äòwife-beater‚Äô, for abusing his then wife, Amber Heard. 

When the cut-up/edited 46 minute version leaked in January by Depp‚Äôs team, it was made to portray a certain narrative and was used as propaganda. It was leaked 6 months before the trial began and used to lead people and potential jurors to believe that it was somehow an official piece of evidence, which it was not. It was incomplete.

If you‚Äôd like to read the official case documents, they can be found here: https://www.nickwallis.com/depp-trial

This recording was obtained through CourtTV and can be found here: https://www.courttv.com/news/amber-heard-witness-statements-depp-blamed-the-monster-for-physical-verbal-abuse/

You can listen to the FULL recording here: https://youtu.be/k9pbrBmHI58

Comments are disabled to combat abuse.

snippet.localized.title: Johnny Depp PRAISES Amber Heard For Being So Caring / AUDIO
snippet.localized.description:
This video is a clip which was excluded from the cut-up, edited and leaked recording by Johnny Depp‚Äôs team in January.  The full version was recorded by Johnny Depp and Amber Heard during their marriage (September 2015). The full recording is being used as evidence in the Johnny Depp v The Sun UK libel case. Depp decided to sue The Sun for publishing an article where they brand him a ‚Äòwife-beater‚Äô, for abusing his then wife, Amber Heard. 

When the cut-up/edited 46 minute version leaked in January by Depp‚Äôs team, it was made to portray a certain narrative and was used as propaganda. It was leaked 6 months before the trial began and used to lead people and potential jurors to believe that it was somehow an official piece of evidence, which it was not. It was incomplete.

If you‚Äôd like to read the official case documents, they can be found here: https://www.nickwallis.com/depp-trial

This recording was obtained through CourtTV and can be found here: https://www.courttv.com/news/amber-heard-witness-statements-depp-blamed-the-monster-for-physical-verbal-abuse/

You can listen to the FULL recording here: https://youtu.be/k9pbrBmHI58

Comments are disabled to combat abuse.
contentDetails.caption: false

snippet.title: High Court hears 'violent' details of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's marriage | ITV News
snippet.description:
The stark and unvarnished details charting the disintegration of Johnny Depp's marriage to model and actor Amber Heard has once again been laid bare at the High Court.  

The evidence today centred around allegations of violent rows after Ms Heard's 30th birthday party.  

The evidence is being heard as part of the Hollywood star's libel action against The Sun Newspaper.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Sentenced In Court After Shocking Details Surface‚Ä¶
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Sentenced In Court After Shocking Details Surface‚Ä¶

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Disney Apologizes To Johnny Depp After This...

https://youtu.be/siGE-fVUHG4

Related videos:

Judge Has Officially Sentenced Amber Heard In US Court...

https://youtu.be/al07kyPdM78

Amber Heard OFFICIALLY Gets Sentenced To Four Years In Prison!!! (Johnny Depp Victory)

https://youtu.be/M1lxGj_KkyQ

Amber Heard Faces 10 Years In Prison For Accusations Against Johnny Depp!!!

https://youtu.be/UvsHWTGHmts

The saga of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp‚Äôs messy divorce continues. But this
time things went really harsh for Amber Heard. According to the latest reports,
Amber Heard is at risk of facing jail time because now she is under
investigation by the LAPD for perjury concerning the 2016 incident in which
Depp allegedly hit his then-wife in the face. For now, Amber Heard is trying to
get the case dismissed officially.
I‚Äôm going to break it down for you, but before we start, hit that subscribe button
and make sure you stay till the end to know if the game is over for Amber
Heard.
After Johnny Deepp's defeat in the British High Court last year, his legal team
has plans to appeal. But this is more difficult than it seems because Amber
Heard‚Äôs legal team has tried to get the U.S.-based lawsuit dismissed, arguing
that the findings in the U.K. libel suit should be adopted. As for Johnny Depp‚Äôs
lawyer? He‚Äôs calling it a ‚Äúhail Mary.‚Äù
Apparently, Amber Heard's legal team doesn't want to give up without a fight
and they've filed a motion to stay discovery on the defamation claims and also a
memorandum in support of her motion for leave. Her team believes that due to
the libel case results, which found in favor of The Sun after that outlet called
Johnny Depp a ‚Äúwife beater,‚Äù that the judgment rendered should be applicable
in the US as well. The motion reads:
With the finality of the Judgment, rendered after Mr. Depp presented his best
evidence and arguments on the exact same factual issues assessed here, Mr.
Depp should be precluded from seeking yet another bite of the apple, where he
has fully adjudicated his dispute and lost. Because of the UK Judgment, the
entire world may now say, forever, that Mr. Depp is a ‚Äòwife beater‚Äô and has
committed at least 12 acts of domestic violence against Amber Heard, causing
her to be in fear for her life. In short, the UK Judgement, now final, permits this
court to end the litigation.
According to Johnny Depp‚Äôs lawyer, Benjamin Chew, however, this is not the
first time Amber Heard‚Äôs legal team has tried to get the $50 million defamation

lawsuit dismissed. He noted (via Courthouse News) that this is just ‚Äúthe latest
Hail Mary‚Äù from Amber Heard‚Äôs legal team and that her team has tried to get
the defamation lawsuit thrown out three times over the past two years. Johnny
Depp's team believes Amber Heard's Op Ed in the Washington Post was
defamatory and cost the actor work.
But what about the US? We will talk about that in a second, but now, make sure
you hit the like button if you enjoy this video. It seems like the cases are moving
forward in Virginia. However, they have been expensive, with deposition
requests and more coming from both sides. Both Amber Heard and Johnny
Johnny are digging for additional information that can be used against each
other. Amber Heard, for example, has been looking into Disney and what the
company knew about Johnny Depp‚Äôs actions and behavior during his time on
the Pirates of the Caribbean films. Speaking of Johnny Depp, he has asserted
Amber Heard has lied on several occasions, including stealing her ex assistant's
s*xual as*ult story, and saying she would give their divorce settlement to
charity but didn‚Äôt. In addition, Amber Heard had asserted Johnny Depp was
violent against her but police body cam footage allegedly showed otherwise.
But here is a very interesting moment. According to the police officers who
arrived on the scene (when Amber Heard‚Äôs friends accidentally called 911
twice), there was no visual evidence that a crime had taken place at all. 
...
The court date for the main defamation date is in April 2022 and we will make
sure to be the first ones to deliver the latest news to you. So stay tuned and don‚Äôt
forget to hit the subscribe button not to miss all the details about Amber Heard
and Johnny Depp‚Äôs case. Thanks for watching this video, see you in the next
episode.

Binge Watch - Binge Watch is the best source of the latest celebrity news. Want to see what's trending today in the Hollywood life or hear about the newest celeb gossip? You're in the right place. 

Consider subscribing to not miss out on what's trending today in the life of the world's biggest stars.

snippet.title: Amber Heard to Johnny Depp: 'I do remember, I did mean to hit you'
snippet.description:
Ms Heard made the allegation in the High Court and claims she punched him during an incident in March 2015 as she feared that he might do the same to her sister Whitney. Eleanor Laws QC, Depp's lawyer,asked her about being violent towards Depp during the fight, Heard said: 'He pushed Kate Moss down the stairs, I heard this from two people, and this was fresh in my mind'. Ms Laws accused Heard of 'adding' the Kate Moss incident during her evidence as she had never mentioned it before. The court was then played an excerpt of Heard's deposition in August 2016, in which she talks about the March 2015 incident. Laws repeated her allegation that there is no mention of Kate Moss.

snippet.title: "Me Too Saved My Case" Amber Heard Admits Exploiting #MeToo Against Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
"Me Too Saved My Case" Amber Heard Admits Exploiting Me Too Against Johnny Depp
The Me Too Movement is a social movement that was adopted to advocate for females who underwent sexual violence to talk about their experiences. The goal of this movement has been to show the survivors of sexual violence that they are not alone.
 For the past years, this movement has helped to shine a light on the sexual violence taking place worldwide.
When Amber Heard spoke about her alleged sexual abuse, she used this movement to ensure her story was heard. Many people supported her and showed her love for speaking out.
However, as the court battle between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp continues, it is becoming more evident that Amber was the actual abuser in the relationship.
 If this is true, then it means that Amber took advantage of the Me Too platform to win her case.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp FINALLY Exposes Amber Heard For Lying
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp FINALLY Exposes Amber Heard For Lying.
Things appear to be going from bad to worse for Amber Heard as new revelations continue to appear on tabloids detailing how untrue most of her claims about her ex-husband were. Since last year when Johnny Depp decided to launch a series of law suits against her and The Sun Newspapers for defamation of character, her career has not remained the same. She used her allegations to cancel and ruin Depp's career, but now, karma has come full circle. Johnny Depp has come out to speak against Amber and her lies.

Just to give you a quick recap, Johnny Depp and his ex-wife split after been married for only a year and Amber Heard went on to claim that the Pirates of The Carribean actor had been violent towards her while in the relationship. She gave interviews across different media outlets including the Washington Post and The Sun and her story ruined Depp's reputation and affected his career negatively. Then came the publication by the Sun calling Johnny Depp names all based on Amber‚Äôs story. This was the final straw as Johnny Depp decided to take NGN (the owners of the Sun Newspaper) to court with a defamation lawsuit. He also filed a suit against Amber seeking damages for ruining his reputation.


Subscribe for celeb drama:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVRROqlaHIP92Oun1Cl8XAw?sub_confirmation=1

snippet.title: The Rum Diary Official Trailer 2011
snippet.description:
The Rum Diary - Official Trailer 2011 HD - Johnny Depp

The increasingly unhinged story of itinerant journalist Paul Kemp (Johnny Depp). Tired of the noise and madness of New York and the crushing conventions of late Eisenhower-era America, Kemp travels to the pristine island of Puerto Rico to write for a local San Juan newspaper run by the downtrodden editor Lotterman (Richard Jenkins). Adopting the rum-soaked lifestyle of the late '50s version of Hemingway's "The Lost Generation," Paul soon becomes entangled with a very attractive American woman, Chenault (Amber Heard) and her fiancee Sanderson (Aaron Eckhart), a businessman involved in shady property development deals. It is within this world that Kemp ultimately discovers his true voice as a writer and integrity as a man. The Rum Diary  trailer, official 2011 movie trailer, is presented in full HD 1080p high resolution. 

The Rum Dairy movie hits theaters on October 28, 2011 

The Rum Diary - Official Trailer 2011 HD
Genre: Adventure | Drama
Cast: Johnny Depp, Amber Heard, Aaron Eckhart, Giovanni Ribisi, Richard Jenkins, Amaury Nolasco, Michael Rispoli
Directors: Bruce Robinson
Writer: Bruce Robinson, Hunter S. Thompson

The Rum Diary movie trailer, official 2011 HD trailer, courtesy FilmDistrict.

Streaming Clips is your daily dose of everything movies. We bring you the best of official licensed movie trailers and movie clips.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Is In Serious Trouble After Johnny Depp's Lawyers Bring New Evidence
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Is In Serious Trouble After Johnny Depp's Lawyers Bring New Evidence
For years now, Johnny Depp and his ex-wife Amber Heard have been clawing back and forth to go and get an advantage over the other in the numerous cases that have been filed by them at each other. Johnny Depp for example filed a Defamation Suit against Heard for $50 million and she filed a countersuit worth $100 million. That case is still going on and has been delayed until 2022 due to the pandemic pushing back scheduling. But even though that‚Äôs going on, there are some things that aren‚Äôt adding up in Heard‚Äôs defense. We‚Äôll break it down for you. Be sure to like the video and subscribe to the channel!

Click HERE To Enter The GIVEAWAY! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbiT0LUIbQj6CQScvWHJeKQ?sub_confirmation=1

And there you have it, everyone! A look at the situation that is evolving due to Amber Heard not serving a subpoena to someone who might have information that can help her! But, what does it all really mean? Is she not doing so despite saying she will proof that he doesn‚Äôt have anything that will help her? Or, has she learned that he knows something about her that might come out if Johnny Depp‚Äôs team gets to cross-examine? Let us know in the comments below, be sure to subscribe and we‚Äôll see you next time on the channel!
