With Amber Heard‚Äôs beauty and Johnny‚Äôs amazing personality, talent, and success we were almost alluded to believe that this super couple may actually work. But if even the strongest couples like Brangelina can break up, this is probably next to nothing in front of them. 

So as the cliche series of events of any regular Hollywood love story goes, the couple were in love, dated for a while, and BOOM! married in a few years. But the year following came with quite a quick divorce leaving the couple and the showbiz world with nothing but pure messy drama!

And here we are, suckers for drama, trying to keep up with the latest gossip on what this couple is up to next.

What were the crazy events that took place after the divorce?
Honestly, the details of the events that took place after the divorce took so many turns that even Sherlock Holmes would‚Äôve been confused, resulting in him taking quite a long time to unravel the truth. For starters, the divorce involved Depp paying Amber a whopping 7 million.

For those of you who do not know who Mera is, Mera is the female protagonist of the DC billion-dollar grossing movie Aquaman which was such a huge success that Warner Bros. declared the news of there being a sequel almost immediately. 

But all this happened in 2018 when things for Amber were all playing out in her favor. Fast forward to 2020, the pandemic wasn‚Äôt the only concern for her as 2020 brought out so much evidence against her in the 50 million dollar filed by Johnny Depp that she was trapped, not knowing what step to take next. I think by now it is safe enough to say that this woman will stoop to any level to get things done her way. 

So back to her Aquaman debut in 2018, due to the film being quite a hit, Warner Bros. didn‚Äôt want to delay in releasing the sequel which is said to be out in 2022. But the famous petitions against her along with her making constant headlines have left us to wonder if she actually still has a spot on the cast list. For the sake of justice, we truly hope not just Warner Bros, but the entire showbiz industry thinks twice before casting her.

Has she been getting roles in the film industry considering the blow-up of the scandal?
Unlike Johnny being rejected for movies he has made his legacy with, Amber has been scoring quite a few films. In fact, she has a mini-series on Netflix currently running as well as her role in Aquaman 2.

So yes as far as we know she will be coming back on the big screens next year, but her time on screen may be cut short so as to not infuriate the fans further. But hey, did you guys hear about the rumors of Emilia Clarke being a suitable replacement for Amber on the cast?! 

What has Amber got to say about her actions and this situation as a whole?
The woman has been seen laughing it off on various occasions. If she is not holding up a strong facade, she is busy coming to her defense with ever-ready tales of lies. 
A while back she was seen getting frustrated at how the public has been going against her, causing her to reach an infuriated state hence causing her to state that what is being said is not fair and that no one could take the role of Mera from her. 

Let us keep all this aside and head on to talking about Jason Momoa. How does he fit into all of this? Aquaman is Jason Momoa! The hunk is known to have been the main reason why the first Aquaman movie was such a big hit and Warner Bros. is counting on him to do them proud with its sequel too. snippet.title: Amber Heard: Johnny Depp libel case 'incredibly painful'
snippet.description:
Actor says testifying as a witness in her former husband's libel case against the owner of the Sun newspaper was painful, particularly having to share some of the 'most traumatic and intimate details' of her life. Depp sued News Group Newspapers and the Sun journalist Dan Wootton over a 2018 article that called him a 'wife beater'. Depp said he was never violent towards Heard or any other woman and that she was the one who attacked him. Heard described in court multiple incidents when she said Depp assaulted her.

snippet.title: Video Shows James Franco With Amber Heard 1 Day After Fight With Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp is sending a subpoena to James Franco after surveillance video from the apartment Depp used to share with ex-wife Amber Heard allegedly shows Franco meeting up with Heard just 24 hours after the blowout fight that ended the couple's marriage.

The video, obtained by The Blast, was taken in the elevator of the downtown Los Angeles apartment once shared by Depp and Heard. The time stamp on the video shows it was taken on May 22, 2016, close to 11:00 PM.

snippet.title: Jason Momoa Tells The TRUTH On Why Amber Heard Was FIRED From Aquaman 2!!
snippet.description:
Jason Momoa Tells The TRUTH On Why Amber Heard Was FIRED From Aquaman 2!!

Subscribe to The Spotlight üëâ  https://bit.ly/3txAgy1

Please support this video by commenting #JusticeForDepp as well as subscribing and giving the video a like to improve the algorithm on Youtube and spread awareness for Depp! üèÜ

RELATED VIDEOS:üëá

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ShObyc9vqXM&t=6s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k-qJirGb3F4

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pZR2_v4UpgI


Jason Momoa is a name that is buzzing and has been buzzing in the world of showbiz for quite some time. In fact, when Aquaman was released earlier in the year 2018, he was the only talk of Hollywood! 

Due to Aquaman‚Äôs major success, soon after its release, the second sequel to the movie was announced to be premiered in the year 2022. Unfortunately, with the Me Too movement targeting so many A-listers, one of the cast members was accused of being a part of this bandwagon. Any guesses on who fell off the wagon and joined in amongst the list of abusers? Yes, it was Amber Heard!

Amber Heard has been making headlines regularly for almost 2 years now, especially after her divorce from Johnny Depp. Initially, people assumed her to be the poor victim in the chaotic scenario she had going on with Johnny Depp. At one point, we were pretty convinced that she was the victim after she posted her pictures of the scars that she had obtained due to being a victim of domestic violence. 
 
What were Amber‚Äôs claims?

Amber Heard proved to be the biggest victim of the year, with her constant rants on social media as well as her claiming Johnny Depp to be an evil man with anger issues. She kept throwing out lies until one day Depp was forced to sue her, hence causing the famous chaotic court case to make repeated headlines.

How did Ambers Claims backfire?
 
Johnny Depp was proven innocent to his ex-wife‚Äôs claims after a leaked conversation between the two was released, proving that in fact, it was Johnny Depp who was being victimized. This surely didn‚Äôt save the mess he was in but made the likes of big platforms such as Disney apologize to him for believing the allegations.

How did this news worsen?

The Me Too movement was trending and each day a new celeb was being called out for inappropriate behaviour of misconduct with the co-workers, especially the female ones. Due to this being embedded in the minds of all, Depp was the most likely candidate to get abuser-bashed for his immoral actions.

Due to her alleged accusations, Johnny Depp‚Äôs career was quite miserable. In fact, the production teams that loved working with his massive talent started to reject his role in the movies. And all this was due to the fault of Amber and her bunch of lies. Imagine not having Jack Sparrow in the next Pirates of the Caribbean sequel!

What‚Äôs the big question now?

What‚Äôs racing across everyone‚Äôs mind is what does Amber Heard‚Äôs co-star, Jason Momoa, have to say about this? 

As you may be aware, Warner Bros just like all other entertainment entities, have the contents of the contract that they sign with the actors, strictly specifying them to follow privacy protocols, leaving the actors with little to nothing left to say about what goes on with the production of their movie as well as any other activities that take place under the roof of the Warner Bros. 

Jason Momoa has been adhering to the protocol and has not stated anything about the scandal his co-star was involved in. It shows that he doesn‚Äôt care about this blow -up or change in the cast, or that he has been asked by Warner Bros. to keep this situation on the low.

But, was Momoa and Heard compatible in real life as much as they seemed on screen?

Rumor has it that the Momoa and Heard were not as compatible as they seemed on the screen. With them being actors from two different worlds, it is sure to be quite a clash in the studios. But others state that they were actually good together since they were complete opposites and that opposites attract. Even though they seem great together on the red carpet, always having fun, the truth behind this fact is still left unknown!

Would Momoa‚Äôs word and stance on this scenario change the fate of who plays the role of Mera?

Most probably, yes. Without Jason, there is no Aquaman. In fact, the entire success behind Aquaman was 90% due to Jason Momoa‚Äôs efforts in making the storyline as lively. Without him, reaching this milestone would have been highly impossible. On a serious note, it‚Äôs highly possible that rather than risking their biggest asset, Warner Bros. would not sacrifice their king for the sake of Amber!

snippet.title: The Chaotic Timeline of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard (2021 UPDATE)
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have had a chaotic relationship to say the least. Although they divorced in 2016, court battles have continued as accusations of domestic abuse have been claimed by both sides. Today, we take a look back at the timeline of their relationship and each of the disastrous mis-steps along the way.

00:00 - Intro
0:31 - Happy Beginnings: Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Meet in 2011
3:43 - Abuse Accusations: The Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Divorce Begins
8:36 - Recent Court Battles & Lawsuits

üö® SUBSCRIBE to the Trender channel for more videos:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-RQtY6MpSkCkaTRQP6G8PQ?sub_confirmation=1

Renowned actor Johnny Depp and young actress Amber Heard met in 2011 while producing the film "The Rum Diary". The two actually played a couple on-screen for this film, roles that even included a steamy make-out scene. From this point, it became very clear that the two were interested in each other romantically. Although they kept it quiet for some time, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard eventually admitted to being in a relationship.

This relationship came to light in 2014 when Johnny Depp began wearing a woman's engagement ring - a clear signal he was off the market. The story goes that Johnny Depp bought Amber Heard the engagement ring but it was too big to fit her finger. So, he bought her a new one, and decided to wear the original engagement ring on his own hand. Just a few months later, they would have a private wedding.

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard seemed to share a wholesome relationship at first. Depp was always eager to talk about her and they appeared together more often than not. They even appeared at charity events together and seemed to support each other. They started making headlines for the wrong reasons in 2015 when they flew their Yorkshire Terriers into Australia illegally. Amber Heard faced legal repercussions and the couple also released an apology video at this time.

In 2016, things went south as the couple officially filed for a divorce. However, things were just getting started. Just days after the divorce filing, Amber Heard filed for a restraining order, claiming that Johnny Depp had been physically abusive with her. This claim was accompanied by apparent bruises shown in photos, as well as a number of stories from Amber Heard. Johnny Depp, as well as many of his friends, family and exes came to his support saying that he would never get physical with a woman. Furthermore, the stories told by witnesses and the police didn't quite line up with Amber Heard's claims.

Eventually, Amber Heard dropped her claims and the divorce was settled. She was given $7 million in the divorce settlement and donated every cent of it to charity.

Amber Heard wasn't done though - she continued to speak out about domestic abuse and even published an op ed in 2018 that shared more details about her experiences. Johnny Depp responded with a defamation lawsuit, claiming that her actions would directly damage his career and image - AND that her accusations were false! 

This has developed into a number of court proceedings, cases and lawsuits in which both Jonny Depp and Amber Heard have taken the stand and testified on their experiences. More shocking details of their marriage have come out throughout these processes. For example, Johnny Depp reveals that Amber Heard actually cut off his finger by throwing a vodka bottle at him - an injury that kept him from working, as well as had many tragic complications throughout his recovery. Furthermore, Johnny Depp revealed that Amber Heard once pooped on his bed, a move she claimed was a "practical joke". 

Despite the evidence seemingly mounting against Amber Heard, Johnny Depp lost his lawsuit against the Sun who claimed he was a "wife beater". These ongoings have cost Depp his role in Fantastic Beasts and the Pirates of the Caribbean, as Warner Brothers have distanced themselves from his controversial case. Amber Heard seems to be taking things well, and no announcements have been made about her future films. However, with Aquaman 2 on the horizon, Johnny Depp supporters around the world are petitioning to have Amber Heard removed from the film. Many people see her equally or even more at fault of domestic abuse, and should therefore face the same career repercussions as Johnny Depp.

Amber Heard is scheduled to stand trial in early 2021.

#JusticeForJohnnyDepp #MeToo 

What're your thoughts on this controversial situation? Are you on Johnny Depp's side, or Amber Heard's side? Let us know in the comments!

Renowned actor Johnny Depp and young actress Amber Heard met in 2011 while producing the film "The Rum Diary". The two actually played a couple on-screen for this film, roles that even included a steamy make-out scene. From this point, it became very clear that the two were interested in each other romantically. Although they kept it quiet for some time, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard eventually admitted to being in a relationship.

This relationship came to light in 2014 when Johnny Depp began wearing a woman's engagement ring - a clear signal he was off the market. The story goes that Johnny Depp bought Amber Heard the engagement ring but it was too big to fit her finger. So, he bought her a new one, and decided to wear the original engagement ring on his own hand. Just a few months later, they would have a private wedding.

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard seemed to share a wholesome relationship at first. Depp was always eager to talk about her and they appeared together more often than not. They even appeared at charity events together and seemed to support each other. They started making headlines for the wrong reasons in 2015 when they flew their Yorkshire Terriers into Australia illegally. Amber Heard faced legal repercussions and the couple also released an apology video at this time.

In 2016, things went south as the couple officially filed for a divorce. However, things were just getting started. Just days after the divorce filing, Amber Heard filed for a restraining order, claiming that Johnny Depp had been physically abusive with her. This claim was accompanied by apparent bruises shown in photos, as well as a number of stories from Amber Heard. Johnny Depp, as well as many of his friends, family and exes came to his support saying that he would never get physical with a woman. Furthermore, the stories told by witnesses and the police didn't quite line up with Amber Heard's claims.

Eventually, Amber Heard dropped her claims and the divorce was settled. She was given $7 million in the divorce settlement and donated every cent of it to charity.

Amber Heard wasn't done though - she continued to speak out about domestic abuse and even published an op ed in 2018 that shared more details about her experiences. Johnny Depp responded with a defamation lawsuit, claiming that her actions would directly damage his career and image - AND that her accusations were false! 

This has developed into a number of court proceedings, cases and lawsuits in which both Jonny Depp and Amber Heard have taken the stand and testified on their experiences. More shocking details of their marriage have come out throughout these processes. For example, Johnny Depp reveals that Amber Heard actually cut off his finger by throwing a vodka bottle at him - an injury that kept him from working, as well as had many tragic complications throughout his recovery. Furthermore, Johnny Depp revealed that Amber Heard once pooped on his bed, a move she claimed was a "practical joke". 

Despite the evidence seemingly mounting against Amber Heard, Johnny Depp lost his lawsuit against the Sun who claimed he was a "wife beater". These ongoings have cost Depp his role in Fantastic Beasts and the Pirates of the Caribbean, as Warner Brothers have distanced themselves from his controversial case. Amber Heard seems to be taking things well, and no announcements have been made about her future films. However, with Aquaman 2 on the horizon, Johnny Depp supporters around the world are petitioning to have Amber Heard removed from the film. Many people see her equally or even more at fault of domestic abuse, and should therefore face the same career repercussions as Johnny Depp.

Amber Heard is scheduled to stand trial in early 2021.

#JusticeForJohnnyDepp #MeToo 

What're your thoughts on this controversial situation? Are you on Johnny Depp's side, or Amber Heard's side? Let us know in the comments!

snippet.title: Analysing the Argument between Johnny Depp And Amber Heard: Part 1
snippet.description:
In this video I look at the recorded conversation between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard. I talk about the dynamic between them as well as the traits I believe I can see in Amber Heard, that are consistent with some of the traits of Borderline Personality Disorder and of Narcissistic Personality Disorder.

I have a BSc (Hons) in Psychology, have trained and worked as an ABA therapist and I have a post graduate diploma in Integrative Counselling and another in Counselling Psychology. I have done extensive research on narcissism and the effects of narcissistic abuse. I work as a coach specifically with people who have experienced narcissistic abuse. Let me know in the comments section below what video you would like me to make about an aspect of narcissism that interests you and please subscribe to my channel!

snippet.title: Amber Heard's Overhauled Mustang Is Revealed
snippet.description:
The fourth and last season of the show Overhaulin‚Äô aired on 4th Nov 2015.

When Amber Heard moved to Los Angeles, she bought a 1968 Mustang, which she fell in love with. She said that it originally ate away at her wallet for many years, but she‚Äôs hung onto the car regardless. In the above video, Heard is surprised by her husband Johnny Depp, her dad and the show‚Äôs cast about getting her car restored. But, they all decide to pull a prank on her first, making her believe her car had been stolen.

And, in the video, we see the finished product once the car has been fully restored. The sight of the car brings Heard to tears.    Her husband (soon to be ex husband) is please for her.

Whee it all go wrong Amber ?
